de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nam mkha' la seng+ge'i 'od shin tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan
pa'i rgyal mtshan zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi ri bo rnam par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin
gshegs pa chos kyi nam mkha' sgrib pa med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan yid du 'ong ba'i me
tog gi yan lag shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po dam pa'i 'od kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen
bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgo'i
dbyangs mang po'i mdzod ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /
de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum gyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil
'khor dpal gyi ri bo snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi seng+ge'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og
tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi ri rab ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho thams cad snang bar
mdzad pa'i seng+ge zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa
shes rab kyi 'od kun tu gsal ba chos kyi grong khyer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de ltar rigs kyi bu / sangs rgyas brgya po 'di dag la sogs pa bskal pa
mdog dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig byung ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra
ba snyed po de dag thams cad kyi tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer ye shes kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur te/ de ltar rigs
kyi bu| kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyings kyi 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la sogs pa tha ma
chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer ye shes kyis rab tu snang ba'i bar de dag thams cad kho mos mchod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la kho mos rim gror byas so//
thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang thos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi bstan pa la yang kho mo rab tu byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi
bstan pa yang kho mos yongs su bzung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug
pa 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las thob pa'i tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu thob bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi zhabs kyi
drung du'ang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su smin par byas so/ /de tshun chad du bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la de
bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ kho mos chos kyi nan tan gyis mchod pa byas te/ rigs kyi bu/ de phyin chad du kho mos sems
can 'khor ba'i mun pa na 'khod cing mi shes pa'i gnyid kyis log pa rnams kyi mel tshe byas so/ /de dag gi sems kyi grong khyer yang yongs su bsrungs so/ /de dag
khams gsum gyi grong khyer nas gyen du bskyod cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong rdal du'ang rab tu bkod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa 'jig rten gyi tshig kyal ba rnam par zlog pa/ gnyis su smra ba med pa la rab tu 'god pa/ bden pa la rab
tu gzhog pa'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' dag gi lam gyi rang bzhin thams cad thogs pa med par shes pa/ sems kyi skad cig
re re la chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar dbang bsgyur ba/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad dang tshig rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ skad rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par 'du
bya ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad kyi grangs dang / ming rgya mtsho'i tshul dang chog la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i gzungs rgya mtsho la dbang
bsgyur ba/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul
bar spyod pa'i mthar phyin par byed pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ sems can thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i nan tan shes par bya ba'am/ byang
chub sems dpa'i lam bla na med par brtsams pa'i sbyor ba'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba khong du chud pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gter dang /
mdzod rnam par 'byed pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gtam la seng+ge'i khri yongs su gnan par bya ba shes par nus re ska na/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
skyes bu dam pa de dag ni/ chos thams cad kyi sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs yongs su gnon pa sha stag go /song rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
par snang mdzad kyi zhabs kyi drung 'di nyid du mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba 'dug ste/ kho mo dang rgyang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug
gi /de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du byed cing / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid du 'god par byed pa dris shig /de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / rnam par 'phrul ba zab mo la 'jug pa 'di nyid brnan te bstan pa'i phyir tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rnam thar gang gis
dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus dang / /chos dbyings kun tu 'byams klas mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /shes byed mtshan nyid kun gyi gzhir thug rtogs pa yi/ /rgyal sras rnams
kyi rnam thar zab cing blta bar dka'/ /tshogs las byung ba'i rnam thar tshul ni mtha' yas te/ /chos nyid thob pas tshad med bsam du med pa yin/ /yongs su 'phel zhing
kun tu chags med shugs drag par/ /dus gsum byams pa'i tshul gyi lam la 'jug par gyis/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas zhing rgyud rdul phran rab snyed kyi/ /bskal pa 'das
pa'i snga rol sngon gyi zhing byung ba/ /'jig rten khams ni chos 'od sprin gyi grong khyer dpal/ /bskal pa byung ba dri med mdog tu 'od chen no/ /bskal pa de gcig rgyal ba'i
gdung ni rgyud ma chad/ /sangs rgyas ri rab rdul phran rab snyed byung bar gyur/ /bde gshegs chos kyi rgya mtsho 'od dbyangs rgyal po ni/ /thog mar byung ste de dag bskal pa dang po
pa| |rgyal ba chos sprin grong khyer 'od snang rgyal po ni/ /bde gshegs de dag kun gyi tha mar 'jig rten byung / /de dag kun gyi spyan sngar phyin te kho mos mchod/ /de dag kun las
chos kyang dga' ba chen pos thos/ /kho mos thog mar mthong ba gser mdog 'od mnga' ba/ /rgya mtsho'i chos 'od sgrog pa'i gsung gi rgyal po ste/ /mtshan rab sum cu gnyis
kyis yongs brgyan ri bo 'dra/ /mthong nas bdag ni bde gshegs 'gyur snyam blo gros gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho mos mthong mod la/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid 'byams
klas 'byung ba'i rgyu rkyen gyis/ /mkha' dbyings rnam yangs de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin can/ /rgyal ba'i sems kyi dang po stobs ldan rab tu skyes/ /snying rje bdud rtsi rgya mtsho che las
byung ba des/ /dus gsum gshegs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kun/ /rgyal sras rgya mtshos bskor ba ma lus thams cad dang / /sems
can rgya mtshor bcas pa'i rgya mtsho'i zhing yang rgyas/ /lus kyis zhing rnams thams cad ma lus khyab bya dang / /'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa bzhin du lus bstan phyir/ /zhing
rnams ma lus bskyod cing snang bar bya ba dang / /'gro ba smin bya'i don du bdag gis sems kyang bskyed/ /rgyal ba gnyis pa'i spyan sngar kho mo phyin nas kyang / /zhing rnams rgya
mtsho bcu bzhugs rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong / /rgyal ba tha ma mthong nas zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rdul phran rab snyed bzhugs pa mthong / /de yi tshu rol bskal
pa zhing rgyud rdul snyed du/ /rgyal ba 'gro ba'i sgron ma ji snyed skyes gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad spyan sngar kho mo phyin gyur te/ /rnam thar rgya mtsho'i tshul 'di sbyong tshe mchod pa byas//
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho
mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho rgya chen po las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa'i snang ba chen po
rab tu thob pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rnam par 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa nges mtshan
mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /khyod kyi shes rab chos yangs
rgya mtsho kun la spyod/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' dbus med par khyod kyis spyad/ /ye shes lus mchog snying po tshe ring snyun bral ba/ /lha mo khyod ni 'khor 'dir byon cing rnam par
mdzes| |chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bur thugs chud de/ /dus gsum kun gyi tshul yang chags med thugs chud mdzad/ /thugs kyi skad cig gcig la tshad med bsam
yas pa'i/ /dmigs pa thams cad rtog pa mi mngar 'jal ba mdzad/ /ye shes spyan mnga' chos nyid sems can med gzigs kyang / /sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas thugs
rjes gzigs pa mdzad/ /thugs kyi rnam thar shin tu yangs la 'jug mdzad cing / /sems can tshad med 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad/ /khyod ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam
dpyad tshul mkhyen te/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shes bya'i tshul la rnam sangs rgyas/ /'phags lam dri ma med pa thams cad yongs bsgoms te/ /'gro ba ma lus rnam par sbyong zhing
yongs su 'byung / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dri med rtogs mdzad pas/ /khyod ni sems can rgya mtsho'i mchog las mngon par skyes/ /khyod ni
chos dbyings khong chud sems can kun khyab par/ /chos rab bstan cing 'jig rten 'jigs pa zhi bar mdzad/ /khyod ni rnam par snang mdzad smon lam lam tshul gyis/ /yang
dag bzhud cing chags med blo yangs dri med ldan/ /thams cad bgod pa'i rgyal ba'i stobs ni thugs chud cing / /zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul pa gzigs/ /
khyod kyi thugs ni mkha' 'dra thub par dka' ba ste/ /nyon mongs kun gyi dri mas ma gos snga nas dag /der ni dus gsum byung ba'i zhing rnams thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas sras
dang bcas pa sems can kun bcas 'dus/ /skad cig gcig gis nyin mtshan yud du zla ba dang / /skad cig yud tsam lo dang 'du 'jig bskal pa dang / /bskal pa rgya
mtsho ming grangs rgya mtshor bcas pa dang / /'gro ba rnams kyi 'du shes rgya mtsho'ang thugs su chud/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can skye 'chi ji snyed dang / /gzugs yod
pa dang gzugs med 'du shes yod med kyi/ /rnam spyod bden pa'i tshul ni thugs su chud mdzad cing / /de dag lam bstan byang chub mchog tu 'god pa mdzad/ /rnam par
snang mdzad smon lam dra ba'i rigs las byung / /bde gshegs kun gyi sku gcig tshul las yang dag 'khrungs/ /khyod ni chos sku yongs dag thugs la chags mi mnga'/ /
'jig rten kun tu sku gzugs yid bzhin ston pa mdzad/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal
la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/ mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la
spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te yang dang yang
bltas nas mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung nas song ngo / /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya
ba las| sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste/ bam po brgya gsum pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / rnam par
'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa de/ de bas kyang rgya cher sgom pa dang / yid ches par bya ba dang / shin tu rgyas par byed cing / mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas
pas bde bar gnas pa gang na ba der phyin nas mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa spos rin po che thams cad kyi
shing gi yal ga'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig na seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i shing gi myu gu'i snying po can zhig la 'dug ste/ mtshan mo'i lha mo stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor
cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mo/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/
ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / ji ltar slob pa dang / ji ltar spyod ji ltar slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba
bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo'i mthus ni/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na nyi ma nub tu cha ba'i tshe pad+mo shin tu rgyas pa rnams kyang rnam par 'dzum par 'gyur ro//
skyes pa dang bud med bza' shing gi ra ba na gnas shing dga' bar rtse ba la brtson pa dag kyang khyim du 'dong pa'i blo skyed do/ /lam dang srang na rgyu ba'i sems can rnams kyang zhag
gi gnas sems shing tshol te/ 'gro ba'i gnas thams cad du mngon par gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /nags tshal dang / gseb dang / phug la brten pa'i sems can rnams kyang
nags tshal dang / gseb dang / phug tu 'dong ngo / /shing la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang shing gi gnas la brten par mngon par gzhol lo/ /khung na gnas pa'i sems
can rnams kyang khung du 'dong ngo / /grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul du 'dong ngo //
chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang chur 'dong ngo / /phyogs gzhan gyi yul du phyin pa'i sems can rnams kyang nub mo bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa'i don du rang rang gi yul
gyi phyogs kyi bsam pa skyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang kho mo ni/ skyes pa dang / bud med gzhon nu dar la bab pa/ dar ba'i nyams drod kyis myos pa dang / glu dang / gar dang /
rol mo'i dga' bas myos pa dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan la dga' zhing brtson pa rnams la skye ba dang / rga shi dang / gti mug gi mun pa chen pos 'jigs pa'i gnyen por dag
ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi legs pa'i bsngags pa byed do/ /sems can ser sna dang ldan pa rnams ni/ sbyin pa la
rab tu sbyor ro/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams ni/ tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/ /ngan sems dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la ni/ byams pa'i
legs pa rjod par byed do/ /sems 'khrugs pa'i sems can rnams ni/ bzod pa la rab tu 'god do/ /le lo can gyi sems can rnams ni/ byang chub sems
dpa'i brtson 'grus brtsam pa la rab tu 'god do/ /sems rnam par myos pa'i sems can rnams ni/ bsam gtan la rab tu 'god do/ /shes rab 'chal ba can gyi
sems can rnams ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su sbyor ro/ /theg pa dma' ba la mos pa'i sems can rnams ni/ theg pa chen po la rab tu 'god do/ /
khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor
la spyod pa la rab tu 'god do/ /dmigs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can las dang nyon mongs pas rab tu mnar ba/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs med pa rnams
ni| byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /mi shes pa'i mun nag gis khebs pa'i sems can bdag tu bya ba dang / bdag gir bya bas
ma rig pa'i mun nag tu 'thom pa rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang kho mo ni/ byang chub
sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba thob pa'o/ /nor bzang gis smras pa/ lha mo/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
dga' ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rnam par thar pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams
kyis sems can yongs su sdud pa'i ye shes dang thabs snang ba dang ldan pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba nyams su myong ba ji snyed cig
yod pa de dag thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi mthus byung ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag gi tshul gyis byung ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i gsung la nan tan du byas pas byung ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab pas byung ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ba'o/ /de bzhin
gshegs pas bstan pa'i lam la nan tan du byas pas byung ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dang tshul 'dra ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas byung ba'o/ /de
bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa'i mthun pa'i rgyus byung ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi nyi ma snang bas byung ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
rigs kyi chos dkar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snang bas ni/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba yongs su 'byung ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu/ kho mos byang chub
sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba 'di la 'jug pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho rjes su dran par byed cing / 'jug pa dang khong du chud par byed pa'i
tshe 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzhugs pas sems can bdag tu bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba la mngon par zhen pa/ ma rig pa'i
mun pas 'thom pa/ lta ba thibs po'i lta bas dgon par 'khyams pa/ sred pa'i dbang du gyur pa/ 'dod chags kyi bcings pas glags pa/ zhe sdang gis khong khro
ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ gti mug gis sems kyi rgyud 'khrugs par gyur pa/ phrag dog dang ser sna kun nas 'khor ba/ nyon mongs pas rab tu dkrugs pa'i sems dang
ldan pa| 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong bar gyur pa/ 'khor ba na phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis rab tu gzir ba/ sangs rgyas blta ba las phyir phyogs
par gyur pa thams cad gzigs nas thugs rje chen po'i thugs skyes par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gro ba thams cad la yo byad dang rin po ches yongs
su bsdu zhing yongs su sdud pa'i thugs dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i yo byad yongs su sgrub pa'i thugs dang / dngos po thams cad la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i
thugs dang / yul thams cad la ye rngam pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs dang / dga' ba thams cad la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs dang / longs spyod thams cad la yongs
su ma zhen pa'i thugs dang / sbyin pa thams cad la rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i thugs dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad la bzhed pa mi mnga' ba'i
thugs dang / rgyu dang rkyen la ma rmongs pa'i thugs dang / legs par btsal ba'i chos la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i thugs dang / sems can thams cad kyi
don la gzhol bar bya ba mngon par sgrub pa'i thugs yang dag par skyes par gyur to/ /de de ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la yang dag par
zhugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad du byams pa chen pos snyoms par zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyis rgyas
par dgang ba'i sbyor ba mnga' ba/ sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad kun nas khebs pa'i chos kyi gdugs chen po'i dkyil 'khor mnga' ba/ sems can thams cad
kyi nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i mtshon cha mnga' ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bde ba yongs su sgrub pas dgyes pa'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i
thugs mnga' ba/ sems can thams cad la bde ba phul du phyin par mngon par sgrub pa'i smon lam gyi thugs mnga' ba/ bsam pa dang smon pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems
can thams cad la nor gyi char rab tu dbab pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong zhing snyoms par sbyor ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ 'phags pa'i
nor gyis sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che phul du dri ma med pa thob par mdzad pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ byang
chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa chen po'i stobs dang shugs rab tu brnyes pa de/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyi sprin chen pos sems can gyi
khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste sems can thams cad la mngon par gyur par bzhugs shing sbyin pa'i
dmigs pa thams cad kyi sprin gyi char chen po rnam pa thams cad du dbab pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin chen po'i char mngon par 'bebs pa mdzad de/ 'di ltar
sems can thams cad so so'i tshul dang ji ltar mthun pas longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa dang / yo byad rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa la
spyad par bya ba dang / sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul dang / dngos po yongs su gtang ba rnam pa du ma la yongs su spyad pa dang / yo byad kyi rnam
pa dang / rgyan gyi 'du byed brjod du med pa dang / sbyin pa'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su
tshim par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i tshul mtha' yas pa thugs su chud pas sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su tshim par bya ba/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dngos po
thams cad gtang ba dang / yongs su gtang ba dang / sbyin pa bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad pa las yongs su
bskyab pa'i tshul du bya ba rnams sems can thams cad la lan la re ba mi mnga' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du 'byung ba'i thugs mnga' bas 'gro ba
thams cad kyi sems rin po che yongs su sbyong ba mdzad cing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho gcig tu gyur pa las byung ba'i yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul
'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yo byad kyi char dbab pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par
'phel bar mdzad pas thugs kyi skad cig re re la sems can ma lus pa thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnam
par dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub pa mdzad pa dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ma lus pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar
nyon mongs pa med cing bla na med pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pas rnam par klubs shing rab tu brgyan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi
tshul rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par dgang bar rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gtos ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par dgang
ba'i ye shes kyi tshul yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la sems can dang dus ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rnam par dag par bya
ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad rnam par 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la dus ma
lus pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs la mkhas
pa ma lus par yongs su bstan pas 'gro ba thams cad la phan thogs par bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i grangs su bya ba'i rgyud
dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bstan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas
pa sna tshogs brjod du yod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par gnas pa sna tshogs kyis mtshams rnam par 'dul ba/ gzhi sna tshogs dang / lhun du mar brjod du
yod pa/ rnam par phye ba sna tshogs kyi bskal pa rnam pa tha dad pa bstan du yod pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par dag
cing kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / gcig tu yongs su dag pa dang / gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / che ba dang / yangs pa dang / tshad med pa dang / dog pa dang / phra ba dang /
rgya che ba dang / gzhi mnyam pa dang snrel zhi dang / spyi'u tshugs dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su mngon par bltas pa dang / phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su yongs su
gzhol ba/ sgo sna tshogs nas bstan cing sgo mtha' yas pa'i dbyibs rnam pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa'i rnam par phye ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod de/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa yongs su mnan nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul
pas rgyas par dgang bar bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ma lus pa thams cad sems can pha rol gyi sems dang bsam
pas rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar mdzad de/ mngon par sgrub
pa mdzad par gyur pas mngon par shes so/ /rjes su dran no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe 'jig rten gnas pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang bral ba/ sems can byas pa drin du mi gzo bas yongs su gang ba/ mi shes pa'i mun pas
chod pa| bdag tu bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba la mngon par zhen pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa rab rib kyis bsgribs pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin par rnam par rtog pa la zhugs
pa| lta ba thibs po bas dgon par mgo brlags pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo rmongs pa/ nyon mongs pa dang las kyi dbang du gyur pa/ 'khor ba'i mya ngam chen po'i sdug bsngal
gyi sa'i 'og tu lhung ba/ phongs pa'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong bar gyur pa rnams la thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ pha rol tu phyin pa sbyang ba'i sprin chen po
mngon par bsgrubs te dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten par gnas pa/ yongs su bsngags pa dang sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i phongs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog pa
dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po la mngon par mos par bya ba dang / rgyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mngon par bstan pa dang / las dang chos su mi 'gal
ba'i phyogs rab tu brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bsdu ba'i phyogs snang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad
kyi mos pa'i phyogs rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi zhing yongs su sgrub pa'i phyogs legs par bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi rigs mi gcad pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i phyogs yongs su gzung ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad
kyi phyogs rnam par bzlog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi phyogs yongs su brjod pa mdzad de/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin chen pos sems can gyi khams
thams cad rgyas par bkang ste mngon par bsgrubs nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can tshim par 'gyur bar chos kyis shin tu bsdu ba la sems can rab tu
dgod par mdzad do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs la yang dag par bskul to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po la rab tu btsud do/ /'phags
pa'i nor thams cad rab tu thob par bya bas nye bar bstan to/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'dun pa'i shugs kyis sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho rnam par
'phags par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgor yang de dag rab tu btsud de/ phung po shin tu zhi ba'i bde bas yongs su bsdu ba bsdus te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che ba la mngon du mos par byas nas byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba'i ye shes la rab tu bkod do/ /nor bzang gis smras pa/ 'phags ma
khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas ji srid cig lags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gnas 'di ni/ yid ches par dka' ba ste/ shes
par dka' ba'o/ /mos par dka' ba'o/ /'jug par dka' ba'o/ /brjod par dka' ba'o/ /khong du chud par dka' ba ste/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang rang
sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang khong du chud par mi nus so/ /gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba ma
gtogs te/ gnas 'di ni/ sems can 'khor ba'i bde ba thams cad la mngon par 'dod pa med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba la lhag par dmigs pa/ sems
can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba la zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i nan tan la mngon par mos pa/
chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa/ nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ mos pa yangs pa'i lam gyis rnam par dag pa/
'khor ba'i rgyun las phyir phyogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mngon par mos pa/ chos kyi grong khyer du 'gro bar gcig tu chad pa/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yongs su gnon pa'i brtson 'grus can/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'i rgyud rnam par gnon pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs
par bya ba la mngon par mos pa/ stobs bcu rab tu thob par bya ba'i mthar thug pa rnams kyis bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs yangs pas nye bar bsten pa'i
sems dang / bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang ma zhum pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang ma yo ba dang / ma nyams pa dang / ma 'chums pa dang / mun pa med pa'i sems dang /
ye shes kyi snang ba kun tu snang bas snang bar gyur pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya bar shin tu 'dun pa'i sems dang / bdud kyi
'khor dang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par bya bar skabs phye ba'i sems kyis kyang khong du
chud pa dang / 'jug pa dang / yid ches par bya ba dang / gzung ba dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/ shes par bya ba mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ gnas
'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su ma non na/ sems can gzhan thams cad kyis lta ci zhig smos/
'on kyang sems can cang shes rnams kyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam
pa dbang du 'gyur bar bya ba dang / khyod kyis bsam pa thag pa nas yongs su dris pa'i lung bstan pa'i chos nyid rab tu 'byung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
pa'i byin gyis bstan to/ /de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas de'i tshe don de nyid brnan te bstan pa'i phyir dus gsum du
byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par bltas te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas sras po khyod kyis gang dris pa/ /de ni bsam yas zab
mo sangs rgyas yul/ /bsam yas zhing gi rdul phran rab snyed kyi/ /bskal pa mang pos de kun brjod mi nus/ /sems can 'dod pa'i sems ldan sdang ba dang / /de bzhin
gti mug mun pas bsgribs pa dang / /'chab dang dregs pas bsam pa nyams gyur pas/ /rgyal ba'i chos nyid zhi ba shes mi nus/ /phrag dog
'jungs pa'i dbang gi rjes 'brang dang / /g.yo sgyus bsam pa rnyog par gyur pa dang / /nyon mongs las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas yul 'di shes
par mi nus so/ /phung po khams dang skye mched gnas pa dang / /'jig tshogs mang la gnas par gyur pa dang / /lta sems 'du shes phyin ci log gyur pas/ /zhi ba'i
sa 'di shes par mi nus so/ /rgyal ba'i yul ni shes dka' zhi ba ste/ /rang bzhin dri med rnam par rtog pa med/ /srid par brten cing 'khor la chags pa yis/ /
chos 'di yang dag shes par mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan gang skyes pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs shing / /chos kyi rgyal po'i
gdung rabs yongs 'dzin pa/ /drang srong de dag yul ni 'di yin no/ /dkar chos rgya mtshos mi ngoms sems ldan zhing / /gang rnams dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs
bzung ste/ /thub pa'i stobs la dmigs pa'i sems sprin can/ /de dag 'di thos bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ /gang rnams bsam pa dri med rnams rtog med/ /bar snang
mkha' bzhin phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su/ /mun pa rnam bsal blo gros sgron ma'i sprin/ /dri med de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/ /snying rje'i bsam pas 'gro ba rgya mtsho rnams/ /
dus gsum byung ba gang rnams rgyas byed cing / /sems can ma lus rjes 'brang byams pa can/ /de dag rgyal ba'i tshul 'dir 'jug par 'gyur/ /gang rnams 'dzin med dga'
ba'i sems ldan zhing / /rtag par bdog pa thams cad sbyin brtson la/ /sems can kun la mnyam par zhugs gyur pa/ /chags med de dag spyod yul sa 'di yin/ /nyon mongs
med sems bskyod med spyod ldan zhing / /gang rnams 'gyod pa rnams bsal la sems ldan te/ /sangs rgyas gdams ngag nan tan byed ldan pa/ /dri med de dag spyod yul 'di
yin no| |gang rnams mi sgul sems ldan mi bskyod sems/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i sems ldan zhing / /las kyi rgya mtshor mi 'gal sems ldan pa/ /mi bzad de
dag rnam thar 'di yin no/ /gang rnams mi skyo'i sems dang mi ldog sems/ /brtson 'grus mthu dang rtsal du ldan pa rnams/ /thams cad mkhyen tshogs brtson 'grus
mtha' yas pa/ /brtul zhugs bzang ldan de dag yul 'di yin/ /zhi ba'i sems ldan mnyam par bzhag pa gang / /shin tu zhir gyur rim dang bral ba rnams/ /kun
mkhyen bsam gtan yan lag mchor spyod pa/ /rab tu zhi ba de dag tshul 'di yin/ /gang rnams chags pa kun las sems grol zhing / /
chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud sems can/ /rgyal ba'i chos dbyings rtogs par khong chud pa/ /shes rab sgron ma de dag tshul 'di yin/ /sems can rang bzhin rtogs
sems ldan gyur cing / /gang rnams srid pa'i mtsho la chags med sems/ /sems can sems la gzugs brnyan zla 'char ba/ /lam mkhan de dag rnam thar 'di
yin no| |dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams/ /smon lam gang chen mtsho rgyud skyes pa yi/ /zhing rnams kun tu phyi ma'i mthar spyod pa/ /kun tu bzang po de
dag tshul 'di yin/ /gang rnams chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho yis/ /'gro ba rgya mtsho 'du dang 'jig pa yi/ /bskal par bcas pa khong du chud pa rnams/ /rtog
med de dag rnam thar 'di yin no/ /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran thams cad la/ /sangs rgyas grangs med shing rgyal drung bzhugs shing / /byang chub 'tshang rgya 'gro 'dul
mthong ba yi/ /chags med dmigs can de dag tshul 'di yin/ /khyod ni bskal pa rgya mtsho rgya chen du/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po bsnyen bkur te/ /chos
'dod chos tshol mi skyo 'dir phyin pas/ /thos nas de ni yongs su gzung bar nus/ /khyod kyi bsam pa yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir/ /bde gshegs byin rlabs bsam gyis
mi khyab pas/ /rnam par snang mdzad tshad med yul 'di yang / /kho mo'i tshig las chags pa med par 'byung / /rigs kyi bu/ sngon byung ba'i dus bskal pa 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de'i yang pha snga zhig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i ri spos rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu/
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i ri spos rnam par snang ba der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ri bo'i 'od chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i gzi brjid rgyal po zhes
bya ba byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi ri bo'i 'od chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i gzi brjid rgyal po de/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i ri spos rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa dang ri rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams
klas pa bstan du yod pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud re re zhing yang bskal pa'i grangs shin tu bstan pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
ldan pa| bskal pa re re zhing yang bskal pa bar ma shin tu bstan pa du ma dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bar ma re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam
pa tha dad du bya ba bstan pa du ma dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan du yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba re re zhing yang
mdo sde yang dag par bstan pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed brjod du yod pa/ mdo sde re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa 'jig rten gyi
khams brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bstan du yod pa/ sems can 'dul ba mtha' dang dbus med pa shin tu bstan pa tha dad pa'i tshul gyis bsgrubs pa/
sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'dul ba dang ldan pa yongs su sbyangs te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser
rin po che'i ri spos rnam par snang ba der 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud phyogs kun tu mngon par bltas pa'i sgo rgyal mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba
byung ste| rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud phyogs kun tu sgo mngon par bltas pa rgyal mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa der 'jig rten gyi khams rin
po che thams cad kyi mdog kun tu snang ba'i dpal yon bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi dang / mtshams kyi rgyan rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi snying po byang chub rab tu snang ba las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog rgya mtsho la gnas pa/ lhun rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul
pa'i gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa las bsgrubs pa/ lha'i grong khyer gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa byang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi
khams der gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to/ /gling bzhi pa'i ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag gi gling bzhi pa
dbu ma rin po che sna tshogs kyi rtse mo'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byung ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna tshogs kyi rtse mo'i rgyal mtshan der gling mchu zhang du
dpag tshad brgya phrag stong yod pa bzhi byung nas gling re re la yang grong khyer chen po stong phrag re re byung ngo / /gling bzhi pa de'i gling gi dbus su rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'i gnas
rin po che'i sa las rnam par brgyan pa sprin gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba grong khyer stong phrag bcu'i 'khor dang ldan par byung ngo / /de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling de'i mi rnams kyang tshe'i tshad lo
stong phrag bcu thub par gyur to/ /rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'i sa las rnam par brgyan pa sprin gyi sgron ma der 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chos
thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab
tu sgrog pa de'i blon po ni/ lnga brgya byung ngo / /btsun mo ni/ stong phrag drug byung ngo / /sras ni/ kun kyang dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang
ldan pa| blta na sdug pa/ gzi brjid che ba/ stobs che ba brgya phrag bdun byung ngo / /rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de'i
tshe la dzam+bu'i gling thams cad kyang gdugs gcig gis bskyangs par gyur te pha rol gyi 'khor dang dgra thams cad kyang shin tu chom par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi
khams der bskal pa bar ma ni/ zad du cha/ rnyog pa lnga 'jig rten du byung / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni/ nub par gyur nas sems can mi dge ba bcu'i lam la
spyod pa phal cher ngan song du yang 'dong bar gyur to/ /de dag mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyus tshe thung ba dang / longs spyod chung ba dang / gzugs
ma legs pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / lus ma legs pa dang / bde ba'i rnam pa nyung ba dang / sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa mang ba dang / phan tshun slu zhing
'drid pa'i rang bzhin can dang / phan tshun dbye ba la zhugs pa dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig la spyod pa dang / 'chal ba'i tshig tu smra ba dang / 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis
non pa dang / zhe sdang ba'i yid kyi rtog pa dang ldan pa/ lta ba'i thibs po sna tshogs kyi mya ngan du 'khyams par gyur nas de dag chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags la zhen cing
'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non la/ log pa'i chos kyis kun nas 'khor bas sa la shing rtsi dang / lo zas skye bar 'gyur ba'i char yang dus su mi 'bab par 'gyur te/
sems can de dag kyang rtswa dang / gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / sdong po dag kyang bskams par gyur nas nad sna tshogs kyis thebs shing
phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su skyabs med pas phan tshun khod mi myong zhing g.yen spyo bar gyur te/ de dag kun kyang gcig tu 'dus nas rgyal ba'i gnas rin po che'i sa
las rnam par brgyan pa sprin gyi sgron ma gang na ba der dong ste kun tu bskor nas la la ni/ lag pa gyen tu bsgreng / la la ni/ thal mo sbyor/ la la ni/ lus shin tu 'dar/
la la ni/ gyed/ la la ni/ bub/ la la ni/ lus thams cad kyis phab cing phyag 'tshal/ la la ni/ pus mo sa la 'dzugs/ la la ni/ lag pa nam
mkha'i dbyings su g.yo ba/ la la ni/ gos med cing sgren mor 'khod/ la la ni/ kha mig mi sdug par gyur cing rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil
'khor rab tu sgrog pa la mngon du bltas shing / snying rje rje skad du 'o dod chen po 'bod de/ lha chen po/ bdag cag ni/ nyam thag go /bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal
gyis rab tu gzir to/ /'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis g.yen spyo'o/ /bdag cag la skyabs su yang ma mchis so/ /bdag cag la mgon dang dpung gnyen ma mchis so/ /
sdug bsngal gyi shing thags kyis 'khor to/ /srog chad la thug go /'chi bar gyur ma khad do/ /zhes te/ smre sngags sna tshogs su bla zhing dbyangs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs
dang / tshig sna tshogs kyis kha gdong mi sdug par gyur par 'du shes dang / tshig sna tshogs kyi tha snyad dang / cho 'brang dang / skad kyi gdangs don sna tshogs rjod pa'i tshig
dang / ngag gis 'o dod bos so/ /rgyal po'i gnas de'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo bkres pa dang / skom pas mnar ba/ lus la rgyan med pa/ sgren
mo gos med pa/ kha dog mi sdug pa/ lus gas shing rtsub pa/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la mi dga' ba de dag thams cad kyang bde ba ni/ mngon par 'dod/ sdug bsngal
gyi 'jigs pas ni/ brla khyer nas rgyal po shes pa'i skyes bu chen po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de la bde ba thams cad thob par bya ba'i
'du shes dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang mi 'grogs par bya ba'i 'du shes dang / 'tsho ba'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing gter thob par bya ba'i 'du shes dang / mu stegs
mthong bar bya ba'i 'du shes dang / lam chen po la nan tan du bya ba'i 'du shes dang / gru chen po'i 'du shes dang / ye shes kyi gling chen po'i 'du shes dang / don chen po rab tu
thob par bya ba'i 'du shes dang / mtho ris kyi dga' ba dang / bde ba thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i 'du shes kyis mgon dang skyabs tshol bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chos thams
cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas 'khor kun nas slong ba mang po snying rje rje skad du 'bod pa'i 'o dod chen po de thos nas de snying rje chen po'i sgo brgya stong grangs
med pa phrag bcu la zhugs par gyur to/ /de snying rje chen po'i tshul yid la bab pa'i sems su gyur nas yud tsam zhig rtse gcig tu bsam ste snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i tshig
bcu brjod do/ /bcu gang zhe na/ kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni/ 'khor ba'i g.yang sa chen por lhung yang skyabs med pa lta na/ bdag nam zhig
'khor ba'i g.yang sa chen por lhung ba'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'god pas gnas su 'gyur/ kyi hud kyi sems can 'di dag ni/ nyon mongs pa'i
gnod pas gtses shing skyabs med pa lta na/ nam zhig bdag sems can nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang gnod pas gtses te skyabs med pa rnams kha na ma
tho ba med pa'i las kyi mtha' la 'god pas skyabs su 'gyur/ kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni/ 'jig rten na rga shi'i 'jigs pas tshar chod cing mgon med pa lta na/ nam
zhig bdag sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par sel bas mgon du 'gyur/ kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni/ 'jig rten gyi
'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses te rten med pa lta na/ nam zhig bdag sems can 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams shin tu bde zhing skyon med
pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la dgod pas rten du 'gyur/ kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni/ ma rig pa'i mun par 'thom ste the tshom dang / yid gnyis kyi rab
rib kyis bsgribs pa lta na/ nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel bas sgron mar 'gyur/ kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni/ snang ba dang
bral ba lta na/ nam zhig bdag ye shes kyi sgo rab rib med pa yongs su ston pas ye shes chen po'i snang ba 'byin par 'gyur/ kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni/ phrag dog dang /
'jungs ba dang / g.yo dang / sgyu'i rnyog pas bsam pa rnyog pa can du gyur te ye shes kyi mdog gsal ba med pa lta na/ nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad shin tu dag
pa la rab tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni/ 'khor ba rgya mtsho'i yul gyi rgyud du zhugs shing 'dren pa med pa lta na/ nam zhig bdag sems
can chos thams cad chos rgya mtsho'i tshul la 'dzud par gyur cing 'dren par 'ong / kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni/ ma dul zhing rnam par 'dren pa med pa lta na/ nam zhig bdag
sems can thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rnam par gdul ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dus las mi 'da' zhing rnam par
'dren par 'ong / kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni/ dmus long du gyur te yongs su 'dren pa med pa lta na/ nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i thams
cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul la 'dzud cing yongs su 'dren par 'gyur/ de skad du des snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i tshig rnam pa bcu brjod nas
rgyal po'i gnas der dril chen po brdungs te gtong ba chen po'i rnga bo che'ang yongs su brdungs nas su ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin gyi/ 'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su tshim par
bya'o| |zhes sgra brjod nas des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal po'i gnas thams cad dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / grong rdal thams cad
du yo byad thams cad kyi mdzod phye ste/ lam gyi mdo dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / srang thams cad du'ang yo byad sna tshogs kyi rnam pa mang po bkod de/ 'gro ba thams
cad nye bar 'tsho bar bstabs so/ /mdzod dang bang ba thams cad kyang phye ste/ rin po che'i gter chen po dang / tshogs kyang yongs su bstan to/ /rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs
kyi phung po du ma yang spungs so/ /zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhen pa dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos rin po che
kha dog sna tshogs kyi mdzod phye nas khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khyim mang po mal cha dang / stan dang / gos kyis yongs su brgyan te nor dang dbyig thams cad
phun sum tshogs par byas nas nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i gzi brjid rnam par bkod pas mun pa rnam par sel ba bshams nas des sems can de dag ci 'dod pa'i
bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir khyim de dag re rer yang rang gi lus dang 'dra ba'i sprul pa'i lus mngon par sprul te kun tu bkod do/ /sems can thams
cad kyi nad thams cad gso ba'i phyir sman pa dang / sman dang / rim gro pa dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad sna tshogs kyi rkyen phun sum tshogs pa yongs su bshams so/ /rin po che sna tshogs
kyi snod rnam pa tha dad pa yo byad sna tshogs kyis ci rigs su bkang pa dag kyang nye bar bkod de/ 'di ltar rin po che rdo rje'i snod ni/ spos kyi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs
su bkang / spos kyi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod ni/ gos kha dog dam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ngo / /shing rta mang po dbyibs dang mdog sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ rin
po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ rta dang glang po dang ba lang cang shes la bcas pa/ rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs rgyal po'i rkyen du rung ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi longs
spyod dang ldan pa/ stan sna tshogs bting ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ bla re sna tshogs bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba bres pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal
mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas brgyan pa dag gis kyang yul gyi phyogs gang bar bkod do/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul thams
cad sbyin par yang 'o dod kyis bsgo'o/ /bza' shing gi ra ba dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal sna tshogs yongs su gtang ba dang / khyim dang / chung ma
dang | bu dang / bu mo thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / rin po che rin thang med pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / rang gi snying dang / rkang dang / rgyu ma dang / mkhal ma
dang | tshil dang / sha dang / khrag dang / pags pa dang / rkang lag dang / rna ba dang / mig dang / sna dang / so dang / mchu dang / mgo yongs su gtang ba nas phyi nang gi dngos
po thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su gtang bar yang 'o dod kyis bsgo'o/ /des yo byad de lta bu yongs su gtang ba'i rnam pa mang po bshams te bsags nas rgyal
po'i gnas rin po che'i sa las rnam par brgyan pa'i sprin gyi sgron ma de'i shar phyogs logs na grong khyer rin chen rtse mo'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i mdun rol nas gzhi
mnyam pa'i phyogs yangs pa mchu zheng du rgya che zhing mnyam pa/ mthon dman med pa/ rnam par dag cing gzhi mnyam pa/ ngam grog dang / g.yang sa dang / sdong dum
dang | tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo thams cad med pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi khams las grub pa/ gzhi rin po che thams cad las byas shing rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad bkram
pa| nor bu rin po che'i rgyan rnam pa du mas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis gang ba/ phye ma sna tshogs dri shin tu zhim pa'i rdul ldang ba/ bdug spos sna tshogs kyis
bdugs pa/ rin po che'i sgron ma dpal gyi gzi brjid can rab tu 'bar ba/ spos dang bdug spos thams cad kyi na bun dang / sprin gyis nam mkha' kun tu khebs pa'i rgyan dang
ldan pa| rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba legs par bkye bas mdzes par brgyan pa/ khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su
brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ rin po che'i snam bu lding ba/ rnam par snang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi dra bas kun nas khebs pa/ rin
po che spos thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor can/ gser gyi dra ba las rin po che'i dril bu 'khrol ba dang ldan pa/ bla re rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam
par mdzes par byas pas khebs par bres pa/ spos kyi rgyal po sna tshogs kyi phye ma rnam par bkram pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog sil mas dga' dga' ltar gang ba/
rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs rnam par dag pas
rnam par brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa zhig yod pa de'i dbus su seng+ge'i khri chen po rin po che sna bcu las grub pa'i sa'i gzhi sna
tshogs la gnas pas rin po che'i khri 'phang sna tshogs bcu'i 'khor gyis rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i shing yal ga can bcus stegs bu'i mtshams rnam
par klubs pa'i rgyan mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i sa'i gzhi mi shigs pa la rkang pa rab tu brten pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs dang mdog yongs su
'dzin pa'i stan gyi 'khor lo can/ rin po che du ma las byas pa'i bog re'i rgyan brgya phrag du mas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshom bu rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyan gyis shin
tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan kun nas rnam par phye ste 'phel ba bsgreng ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi ba dan dbyangs pa/ rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i
dril bu'i dra bas brgyan pa'i lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs dang / gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs rnam par bres pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi dra ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal
po chen po'i dra ba dang / gos rin po che sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dra ba ci rigs su kun nas bkab cing mdzes par byas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ spos rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa'i
tshogs las snyim pas bcus shing sprin mngon par gtor ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog dang dri bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba'i dbyibs yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs dang / spos
thams cad kyi na bun dang sprin 'byung ba/ gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi spos dang bdug spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i stan reg na bde ba kha dog
bzang po du ma can legs par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo dang glu snyan pa yid du 'ong pa brgya stong du ma'i sgra kun nas 'byung ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi them skas kyi phreng ba gdan
gyis rnam par klubs pas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i 'bru'i gzugs rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par snang
bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa mngon par grub ste/ de la rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa gzugs bzang pa/ shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug
pa| kha dog bzang po dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ mi chen po'i mtshan rnam par dag pa rab tu thob pa/ rin po che rnam par snang ba'i cod pan can/ rdo rje mthu bo che ltar mkhregs
shing mi shigs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ rtsib ma'i mtshams thags bzang zhing brtan par 'brel ba/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs
su bzang ba/ kun nas bzang ba/ kun nas mdzes pa/ kun nas sdug pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po'i rigs su byung ba/ yo byad
thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbang shin tu rnam par dag pas rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur ba/ tshig gi dkyil 'khor kha ma bab pa/ mi 'khrugs pa'i
ye shes dang ldan pa/ chos kyi sbyor ba ma nor ba shin tu brtan par byas pa/ yon tan dang legs pa mtha' yas par brjod du yod pa de 'dug par gyur to/ /rgyal po chos
thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de seng+ge'i khri chen po la 'dug pa dang steng gi spyi bo'i thad ka'i bar snang la gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
rin po che sna tshogs rnam par 'brel ba'i yu ba can/ nor bu rin po che dam pa'i mdzod kyi snying po dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shar bu brgya stong legs par bres pa/
rin po che du ma'i 'od 'phro ba dpal gyi gzi brjid rab tu 'bar bas rnam par brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser 'od 'tsher zhing gsal la rnam par dag pas bla nas
bkab pa/ rin po che sna tshogs spa bar spel bas spras pa'i gser gyi dra bas nang shun gyi rgyan byas pa/ mu tig sna tshogs kyi se mo do mngon par dpyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra
bas kun nas bkab pa/ rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba las gser rin po che'i dril chen rin po che'i chun po'i lda ldi la brgyus pa mngon par dpyangs pa/ nor bu rin po che dam pa'i phreng
ba kun nas mngon par dpyangs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba'i gdangs grags par 'byung ba/ sems can thams cad dag pa'i las kyi lam la skul ba'i
dril gyi sgra rnam par grags pa byung bar gyur te/ rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de/ rin po che'i rdul yab kyis mngon par g.yab cing
lha'i dbang po brgya byin bas kyang lhag par gzi brjid rab tu 'bar bas shin tu mdzes so/ /de seng+ge'i khri de la 'dug ma thag tu 'gro ba mang po de dag thams cad mngon du gyur te
thal mo sbyar nas rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de'i drung du slong ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong sna tshogs dngos po sna tshogs yongs su len pa/ yo byad sna tshogs la mos pa/ rigs sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba'i rgyun sna tshogs su gtogs pa/ 'dod
pa sna tshogs kyi sems dang ldan pa/ smon pa dang bsam pa sna tshogs can/ phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus pa/ yul gyi spyod pa sna tshogs la gnas
pa| longs spyod sna tshogs la mngon par smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bsam pa dang yongs su rtog pa sna tshogs can/ mi'i ris sna tshogs su gtogs pa/ rigs
kyi skye gnas sna tshogs su skyes pa/ yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa/ sgra skad dang tshig gi 'du byed sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'byin pa/
dngos po sna tshogs kyi don du gsol ba 'debs pa/ tshig dang ngag sna tshogs brjod pa/ bsod nams kyi ri rab chen po de 'ba' zhig gi gdong du lta ba/ 'di 'ba' zhig
shes pa'i skyes bu chen po yin zhes nges par sems ba/ bsod nams chen pos brtan pa'o/ /skyes bu chen po'i zla ba'o/ /gtong ba chen po'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'o/ /zhes
bya bar 'dun pa'i sems kyis rtog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi sems kyis 'dug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi sems kyis sprul pa'i slong mo
pa'i tshogs chen po de mthong nas slong mo ba de dag la sems dga' ba dang / sems mos pa dang / sems spro ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i 'du shes su
gyur to| |snying rje chen po'i shugs drag po shin tu yangs pa yang byung bar gyur to/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par slong mo ba thams cad yongs su tshim par bya ba las phyir mi ldog
pa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs drag po yang skyes par gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad du snyoms pa'i sbyor bas yongs su gtang ba'i sems kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i sprin kyang
mngon par byung bar gyur te/ rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa des slong mo ba de dag mthong ba'i mod la de'i rgyus ches dga' bar
gyur gyi| bskal pas mtshams med pa'i mthas klas par stong gsum gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po thob pas ni/ ma yin no/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
mang po'i mthas klas par brgya byin gyi dbang la gnas pas ni/ ma yin no/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i mthas klas par rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po'i dbang
la gnas ba thob pas ni/ ma yin no/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i mthas klas par rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po'i dbang la gnas pas ni/ ma yin no//
bskal pa tshad med pa'i mthas klas par rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po'i dbang phyug gi dbang la gnas pa thob pas ni/ ma yin no/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
mthas klas par dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i dbang rab tu thob ste lha'i bu mo bzhin bzang mo yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur bas ni/ ma yin no/ /bskal
pa brjod du med pa'i mthas klas par tshangs pa'i gnas kyi bde bas tshangs pa'i thabs la gnas pa thob pas ni/ ma yin no/ /bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i mthas klas par
gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bde ba thob pas ni/ ma yin no/ /bskal pa dpag tu med cing mi zad par dge rgyas kyi lha'i bde ba thob pas ni/ ma yin no/ /bskal pa mu med pa'i
mthas klas par gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba'i bde ba la rnam par spyod pa thob pas ni/ ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu sred
pa la spyod pa pha ma dang / phu nu dang / bu sring dang / mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / gnyen bshes dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang / yun ring mo zhig tu bral la/ 'brog
dgon par 'khyams te/ de dag mthong bar 'dod 'dod pa las de dag dang phrad na/ de dag mthong bas mi ngoms shing dga' ba dang / chags pa chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas slong mo ba de dag mthong par gyur pa'i mod la dga' ba'i shugs
chen po skyes so/ /sems kyi dga' ba'i ro ba de ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /sems spro ba'i shugs rab tu byung ngo / /rab tu dga' ba chen po'i shugs yongs su skyes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi
byang chub tu dad pa dang mos pa'i shugs kyi stobs rgya chen po 'phel to/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtsa ba brtan pa'i dad pa rnam par 'phel to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la
lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs mngon par 'phel to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po las su rung ba yongs su byung ngo / sems dga' bas rgyas pas mos pa'i shugs
chen po skyes par gyur to/ /sems spro ba'i shugs yangs pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dbang po dang bsam pa shin tu gus par gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chos thams
cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs pa la brtson pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi lam dang sgo la mngon du bltas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par bya ba'i yid la bya ba la brtson pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i nan tan
la 'dun pa/ bdud dang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba la brtson pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdams ngag mthun par blang ba la
sta gon du gnas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho sgra kun nas yongs su bsdu ba la brtson pa'i snying po can/ mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du
'phags pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i spyod yul can des slong mo pa de dag la bu gcig
pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /pha dang ma'i 'du shes dang / sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang / dkon pa'i 'du shes dang /
dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes dang / mang po byas pa'i 'du shes dang / phan 'dogs pa dam pa'i 'du shes dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i 'du shes dang / mkhan
po'i 'du shes dang / ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar des slong mo pha de dag don ci la 'ongs pa dang / don ci la phyin pa dang / dus ci tsam na 'dus pa
dang / yul gang dang gang na gnas pa dang / dngos po ci dang ci slong ba dang / rnam pa gang 'dod pa dang / bsam pa ci 'dra ba dang / ci dang ci la smon pa dang / ci dang ci 'dod
pa dang / dngos po gang dang gang tshol ba de dag thams cad tshul bzhin du mi dga' ba med pa'i byams pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / slong mo pa'i 'gro ba las phyin
phyogs su ma bltas pa'i gtong ba chen po'i 'od zer dang / sems can thams cad la snyoms par sbyor ba'i gtong ba'i sgos yongs su tshim par byas so/ /des zas 'dod pa
la ni| zas byin no/ /skom 'dod pa la ni/ skom byin no/ /gos 'dod pa la ni/ gos byin no/ /me tog 'dod pa la ni/ me tog byin no/ /de bzhin du spos dang / bdug spos
dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rin po che dang / rgyan dang / stan dang / mal dang / khyim dang / gzhal
med khang dang / gtsug lag khang dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / rta dang / glang po dang / shing rta dang / rkang thang dang /
dgal ba dang / khyogs dang / bzhon pa dang / gser dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dag kyang
byin par gyur to/ /rang gi khyim dang / gzhal med khang dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / g.yog 'khor dang / rgyal po'i mdzod thams cad kyang phye ste bgos nas rab tu
btang bar gyur to/ /su ci 'dod pa de dag de khyer cig ces nas yul 'dod pa dag kyang yul byin no/ /grong 'dod pa dag kyang grong byin no/ /grong khyer 'dod pa dag kyang gron
khyer byin to/ /sems can thams cad la snyoms par zhugs pa des slong mo pa de dag thams cad la ci bdog pa yongs su btang ste/ dngos po
thams cad yongs su btang bas mngon par bstod do/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste/ bam
po brgya bzhi pa/ de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin cen 'od ces bya ba bu mo drug cu'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po'i
dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pa/ skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ dri zhim po yid du 'ong ba dang ldan
pa| tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ gos bzang ba/ rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rig pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / dga' ba dang /
ngo tsha shes pa dang / spyod pa dang / cha lugs phun sum tshogs pa/ bla ma la sri zhu dang ldan pa/ shes bzhin gyi dam pas spyod pa/ byed rgu zab pa/ chos blang ba dang /
gzung ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba la yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par byas pa/ chos kyis mngon par brlan pa'i sems kyi rgyud rab tu
dang ba| dge ba'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa/ mos pa yangs pa/ nam mkha'i spyod yul can/ gzhan la phan par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i
phyogs la rnam par bltas pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon par 'dun pa zhig mchod sbyin gyi rab chen po der 'ongs te tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin cen 'od ces
bya ba de rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa'i seng+ge'i khri chen po'i g.yas rol ha cang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ rgyal po de la
phyag 'tshal nas phar ci la'ang len pa med do/ /de phyogs gcig na 'dug cing sems 'di ltar bskyed par gyur te/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'di lta bu mthong
zhing 'grogs su yod pa ni/ bdag gis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo/ /snyam ste/ des rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de la
dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang / ston pa'i 'du shes dang / snying brtse bar byed pa'i 'du shes dang / phan 'dogs pa'i 'du shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes
bskyed de g.yo sgyu med pa'i sems kyis dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / spro ba'i shugs rab tu yangs pa thob pas rang gi rgyan rnams lus las bkrol te/ rgyal po chos thams
cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa gang na ba der mngon par bltas te gtor ba dang / de dag de'i seng+ge'i khri'i 'og /khri'i
'phang gi sa'i steng du bkram par 'gyur to/ /de rgyan de dag de ltar gtor nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor
rab tu sgrog pa 'di sems can mgon med cing mun pa'i nang na 'thom pa rnams kyi mgon skyabs su gyur pa de ltar bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'gyur bar shog
cig /'di chos gang shes pa de dag kyang bdag gis kyang shes par shog cig /'di theg pa gang gis 'byung ba des bdag kyang 'byung bar shog cig /'di lam gang na
zhugs pa de nas bdag kyang 'jug par shog cig /ji ltar 'di gzugs blta na btang mi bral zad mi shes pa'i longs spyod dang ldan te/ g.yog 'khor mtha' yas la
gzhan gyis mi thub cing thub par dka' ste thub pa med pa de bzhin bdag kyang shog cig /'di gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der bdag kyang skye bar 'gyur bar
shog cig /snyam pa dang / de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa la brtson pa rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas shes nas de la
bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ khyod la ci dgos pa khyer cig /bu mo/ nga ni/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ste/ sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par bya

ba la zhugs pa'o/ /de skad ces byas pa dang / de'i yid la'ang bdag ni/ rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas thugs su chud par gyur to| |snyam nas de bas kyang mos par gyur to/ /de de ltar yod pa'i sems su gyur te dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs shing rgya che ba'i shugs yongs su skyes nas rgyal po chos thams cad
kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa la de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sngon chad sa las rnam brgyan sprin 'di ni/ /rgyal po seng+ge khyod 'khrungs
ma gyur tshe/ /mdangs dgar ma gyur gzi brjid ma mchis te/ /yi dwags 'jigs pa'i gnas dang ci mi 'dra/ /mi rnams kun kyang srog gcod mos par gyur/ /ma byin
len la tshul dang sbyor ma mchis/ /brdzun du smra zhing brlang ba'i tshig kyang brjod/ /phra ma kyal ba'i tshig kyang rab tu smra/ /gzhan gyi nor la chags pa'i sems dang ldan/ /
gang zag gzhan la kun kyang ngan du sems/ /lta ba'i rnam gnas sdig to'i spyod yul can/ /log pa'i sbyor bas ngan pa'i 'gro bar ltung / /chos ngan chos la spyod pa'i mi yi
rnams| |ma rig gti mug mun pas bsgribs pa dag /lta ba log zhugs phyin ci log mthong bas/ /dgung lo mang por dgung char bab ma gyur//
dgung char ma bab sa bon chab 'tshal te/ /lo tog mi 'khrungs zhugs shing 'khrungs ma gyur/ /mtsho dang lu ma chu bran rgyud kyang bskams/ /nags tshal rtsi shing kun kyang
de bzhin te/ /rnam dag spyan khyod 'khrungs par ma gyur bas/ /chab klung kun kyang ma lus bskams par gyur/ /bza' shing ra ba kun kyang ri dgon 'dra/ /rus pa dkar
pos dogs bltams par gyur/ /gang tshe khyod la slong ba mang 'dus te/ /slong ba thams cad yongs su tshim mdzad pas/ /phyogs bzhi kun nas sprin chen 'dus par
gyur| |thang dang gshong rnams kun kyang ngoms par bgyis/ /slan chad rkun chom g.yon can chad par gyur/ /dgum pa ma mchis su yang gzung ma mchis/ /mgon med
gang yang 'gum par mi 'gyur te/ /khyod ni 'gro ba mngon med kun gyi skyabs/ /srog gcod pa la mngon par mos pa'i mi/ /gzhan rnams bkum zhing de yi khrag 'tshal
la| |gcig la gcig gi sha 'tshal gyur ba dag /khyod kyi sbyin pa chen pos byams sems gyur/ /brgya stong grangs su bgrang bar gyur pa las/ /de tshe 'ga' zhig rad pa
'tshal gyur gyi/ /gzhan ni rtswa dang lo ma rad pa 'tshal/ /de tshe kun kyang yi dwags bkres mnar bzhin/ /'gro ba mgon med mgon du khyod 'khrungs nas/ /sa bon ma btab ma rmos
'bras kyang byung / /dpag bsam shing las mdzod rnams rnam par thon/ /skyes pa bud med mkhas pa gda' bar gyur/ /zla ba zla phyed don du sngon chad ni/ /lam nor gnas pa
gsog cing sri zhu ra bgyid/ /deng sang rad pa rab 'tshal rgyan mang ldan/ /dga' ba'i gnas na rtse ba'i lha yang 'dra/ /sngon chad log pa rnams la mi bzad zhugs/ /chos ngan
'dod chags mi rnams zhen cing chags/ /na chung gzhon nu gzhan gyis bsrungs pa rnams/ /nan gyis 'phrog rlom chab 'tshal ma rung bgyis/ /lha mo bzang mo'i kha dog gzugs
ldan pa| |gos bzang rgyan ldan deng sang mthong 'gyur te/ /gzhan gyi bud med spos dri gda' mchis kyang / /dga' ldan ji bzhin mchis brang rgyan gyis 'tshal/ /sho be brlang
pa phra ma rkyal ba rnams/ /sngon chad g.yo sgyu'i dbang gis ngag tu brjod/ /deng yang tshig gi nongs pa bzhi spangs shing / /lta ba ngan spangs chos la kun kyang spyod/ /tshangs dbyangs
ka la ping+ka'i sgra byung ba'i/ /khyod kyi gsung mchog 'di yi cha shas la'ang / /rol mo'i sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pa dang / /lha rdzas glu dbyangs 'di dag nyer mi 'gyur/ /khyod kyi spyi
gtsug dbu steng gdugs lding ba/ /rin chen brgyus bgyis gser gyi dra bas bkab/ /dpal gyi snying mdzod yu ba bai DUR+Ya/ /kun nas rin chen mchog
gi dril gyis 'khor/ /dril las byung ba'i sgras kyang ma lus pa'i/ /'jig rten sgra dbyangs ma lus zil mnan cing / /sangs rgyas gsung gi yan lag 'dra bar 'khrol/
dam pa'i chos kyi sgra dbyangs zhi ba sgrog /de thos sems can nyon mongs zhi bar bgyid/ /ma lus phyogs kyi zhing rnams brgyud pa yi/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho'i bde gshegs
rgya mtsho dang / /blo ldan rgya mtsho'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo rnams/ /sngon mtha'i zhing rnams gcig nas gcig brgyud du/ /gang mtshan gang dang gang lags rim bzhin
dang / /ma lus phyogs su dam chos 'khor lo yang / /khyod kyi byin gyis dril rnams rab tu sgrog /khyod kyi dril sgra thogs pa ma mchis par/ /tshangs dbang lha dbang 'gro
ba'i bdag po rnams/ /rang rang las kyi tshul ni kun rjod cing / /'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan khyab par kun tu sgrog /dril gyi sgra las lha dang mi rnams kyis/ /rang rang las kyi
tshul rgyud thos gyur nas/ /sdig to rnam spangs dge ba spyod par gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog la kun kyang gnas/ /khyod kyi yab ni mi bdag skar ma'i 'od/ /de yi
btsun mo pad+mo khyod kyi yum/ /rnyog pa lnga rnams shin tu rgyas gyur du/ /chos 'grib rgyal srid des ni bzhes par gyur/ /de yi bza' shing ra ba yangs byung ba/ /me tog rgyas
brgyan rin chen sgron ma ste/ /shing mang brgyas bskor rdzing bu lnga brgya yis/ /de ni shin tu brgyan pa byung bar gyur/ /de dag so so re re'i dogs su yang / /ka ba stong ldan gzhal
med khang bzang byung / /stegs bu bzang po sna tshogs stong gis brgyan/ /zla gam dra bas kun nas mdzes par bgyis/ /chos ngan stobs ni rab tu 'phel gyur bas/ /dgung
lo mang por dgung char bab ma gyur/ /rdzing bu kun gyi chab dang zhugs shing rnams/ /de tshe lo ma mdog dang bcas te bskams/ /dgung bdun na ni khyod bltams 'gyur ba'i
tshe| |de tshe ngo mtshar rmad byung ltas byung ste/ /de dag mthong nas sems can nges rtogs par/ /bdag cag skyob pa nges par 'byung zhes mchi/ /dgung gi gung la bab nas rnam
drug tu| |khams kyi dogs yongs su g.yos par gyur/ /ma smad shin tu bzang ba'i rdzing de yi/ /dbus su gdugs dang mnyam pa'i 'od cig byung / /chab bzang yan lag
brgyad ldan rgyas par gyur/ /rdzing bu lnga brgya kun kyang de bzhin te/ /zhugs shing kun kyang lo ma 'khrungs par gyur/ /me tog 'bras bu kha dog mdog dang ldan/ /rdzing bu de rnams
chab kyis bltams gyur pas/ /nags tshal ma lus de dag ngoms par bgyis/ /chab chen de las byung ba'i rgyud 'phros pas/ /'dzam bu'i rgyal
mtshan chab kyis bltams par gyur/ /zhugs shing sman dang lo tog ldum bu yang / /'khrungs gyur zhugs shing me tog 'bras bu rgyas/ /dog sa'i steng na mchis rgu'i sa
bon rnams/ /kun kyang chab kyis brlan pas rnam par 'khrungs/ /chab kyis bangs gyur dog sa'i phyogs rnams kyang / /de tshe thams cad rab tu mnyam par gyur/ /sgang
gshong dog sa'i phyogs rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag kun kyang de tshe mnyam par gyur/ /g.yang sa grog po mi bde'i phyogs kyi rnams/ /de tshe yud kyis kun kyang mnyam par
gyur| |tsher ma gseg ma la sogs ma mchis gyur/ /rin chen bzang po'i 'byung gnas yongs su thon/ /skyes pa bud med tshogs rnams dga' bar gyur/ /skom pas
gdungs pa kun kyang chab la 'tshal/ /kye ma de ring bde na su mthu zhes/ /snyan par brjod pa de skad chad du brjod/ /ngog sa'i mnga' bdag skar 'od sras dang bcas/ /sras
mo blon po'i tshogs bcas de yi tshe/ /skye bo bye ba stong gis yongs bskor te/ /bza' shing ra bar dgyes par gshegs pa mdzad/ /mdangs dga' rdzing chen yongs su
ma smad pa/ /spos chus bltams pa dbus na mchis gyur ba'i/ /de yi dbus su chos stegs bzang po yi/ /pho brang steng gshegs btsun mo bcas pas bzhugs/ /dgung
bdun lon par gyur nas de yi chab/ /dgung gi gung la gyen du lud par gyur/ /ri dang gzhal med khang gi phreng bcas pa'i/ /dog sa'ang de'i tshe yongs su g.yos par gyur//
yongs su ma smad de yi dbus nas kyang / /pad+mo chen po lo ma stong ldan 'khrungs/ /gdugs stong mdor gsal sprin gyi dra ba can/ /ri rab rtse mo man chad 'od kyis 'gengs//
chu ba rdo rje nang rim dri bda' ste/ /rin chen dbang po'i lo ma rnam dag yangs/ /'dzam bu chu klung gser bzang snying po can/ /ze ba spos rab 'bar ba phun sum tshogs/ /mgon
po khyod ni de yi snying po las/ /skyil mo krung bcas sku ni byung bar gyur/ /mtshan gyis rnam brgyan yan lag shin tu mdzes/ /lha mang brgyas kyang mngon par mchod pa bgyis//
rgyal po pho brang steng nas shod gshegs te/ /phyag gnyis brkyangs te legs par khyod blangs nas/ /btsun mo'i mgo la bzhag ste 'di skad gsungs/ /khyod kyi bu 'di
yin gyi dgar gyis shig /'jig rten mgon khyod de ltar bltams gyur tshe/ /bye ba'i gter rnams rab tu thon par gyur/ /zhugs shing kun kyang mngon par kha 'bus te//
steng gi mkha' las rol mo'i sgra yang byung / /'dzam bu rgyal mtshan sems can thams cad kyang / /khyod la mngon lta 'dud cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /
thal mo sbyar cing kye ma mgon med pa'i/ /mgon zhig byung zhes dga' ba'i tshig kyang brjod/ /khyod kyi sku las 'od zer mang 'byung bas/ /dog sa kun tu rab tu snang bar
gyur| |'gro ba'i mun pa kun kyang rnam bsal nas/ /nad mang ma lus rab tu zhi bar gyur/ /gnod sbyin grul bum sha za mang po'i tshogs/ /rnam par 'tshe ba de dag
bsal bar gyur/ /shin tu gdug pas sems can 'gums pa yi/ /sbrul gdug kun kyang de tshe yong mi rgyu/ /thob med sman pa mi snyan sdug bsngal dang / /nad rlangs
nad mang gnod par 'tshe ba dag /mdor bsdus kun kyang zhi zhing ma mchis gyur/ /'jig rten kun tu rab dga' byung bar gyur/ /phan tshun ma dang 'dra ba'i 'du shes
kyis| |khong nas byams pa de tshe 'gro kun gyur/ /shar gnyer sems bral 'tshe ba ma mchis te/ /thams cad mkhyen lam nan tan ldan par gyur/ /ngan song rgyud rnams
rnam par rab tu bzlog /mtho ris lam chen kun kyang btod par gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam yang shin tu bstan/ /de ltar khyod kyis 'gro don yangs pa mdzad/ /
rgya mtsho che 'dra yongs su gtong mdzad pa/ /khyod mthong bdag ni thob pa dam pa thob/ /yun ring 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba mgon bral du/ /khyod ni rmad du byung ba'i mgon zhig gshegs
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od kyis rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par
bstod de snyan par bkur nas rab tu bsngags te lan brgya phrag stong du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu gus pa'i tshul gyis 'dug
go /de nas rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ de
ltar khyod sems can pha rol gyi yon tan gyi khyad par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa la zhugs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /bu mo/ 'jig rten thams cad na'ang sems
can gang sems can pha rol gyi yon tan la mos pa de lta bu ni/ dkon te/ bu mo/ sems can mun pas bsgribs pa/ phan gdags pa la drin du mi gzo ba/ blo phyin ci log
la zhugs pa/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa/ rgyud 'dzings par gyur pa/ mun pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bsam pa ngang gis log pa/ nan tan dang mi ldan pa/ sems
can pha rol gyi yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par mi shes pa rnams kyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan la 'jug par bya ba'am/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i yon tan la brtag par bya ba'am/ yon tan thams cad shes pa'i khyad par mngon par shes pa thob par bya bar mi nus so/ /bu mo/ de ltar khyod sems
can chen po mngon par shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu la 'jug pa ni/ gdon mi za bar byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'o/ /de
ltar nga'i khams su khyod lta bu ye shes de 'dra ba dang ldan pa skyes pa ni/ dzam+bu'i gling du ngas sems can yongs su bsdus pa'i mthu don yod do/ /de nas rgyal po chos
thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang med pa dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od sna tshogs dang / gos
rin po che rin thang med pa bdag gis lag bdar te blangs nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od la byin no/ /de'i 'khor gyi bu mo thams cad kyang gos rin po che sna
tshogs kyis khyad par byin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ gos rin po che 'di khyer la bdag gis yongs su spyad pa gyis shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo
rin chen 'od 'khor dang bcas pas pus mo gnyis sa la phab ste gos rin po che dag lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas spyi bo la blangs te phyir byung nas rin po che de dag bgos so//
de'i 'khor gyi bu mo thams cad kyis kyang so so nas rang rang gi gos rin po che de dag bgos nas des gos rin po che de dag bgos pa'i 'og tu rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga
ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa la bdag gi 'khor bu mo de dag dang bcas pas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas so/ /de dag thams cad kyi gos rin po che
de dag la rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur te/ de dag mthong nas 'gro ba'i tshogs mang po 'di skad ces 'dzer te/ bu mo/ khyod kyi 'khor bu
mo 'di dag ni/ mtshan mo'i lha mo skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa ltar shin tu mdzes pa ste/ khyod de dag gis bskor bas gya nom par mdzes so/ /de nas mtshan mo'i lha
mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
na rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni/ de ltar mi blta ste/ bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'di ni/ de'i tshe rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i
gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po skar ma'i 'od kyi btsun ma pad+mo'i 'od ces bya ba/ rgyal po chos thams
cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa'i yum du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na yang de ltar mi blta ste/ lha mo sgyu ma 'di ni/ de'i tshe rgyal
po'i btsun mo pad+mo'i 'od ces bya bar gyur te/ rdzus te byung ba'i gzhon nu thu par len len pa'o/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po skar ma'i 'od ces bya
ba| rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa'i yab tu gyur pa byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na'ang de ltar mi blta ste/
rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po skar ma'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od ces bya
ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na'ang de ltar mi blta ste/ kho mo ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od ces bya bar gyur to/ /yang rigs
kyi bu| khyod de'i dus na sems can dzam+bu'i gling der skyes shing rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs
su bsdus pa de dag gzhan dag cig yin pa snyam du sems na ni/ de ltar mi blta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du 'dus te bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bkod de/ la la ni/ sa dang po la bkod/ la la ni/ sa gnyis pa la/ la la ni/ sa gsum pa/
la la ni/ sa bzhi pa/ la la ni/ sa lnga pa/ la la ni/ sa drug pa/ la la ni/ sa bdun pa/ la la ni/ sa brgyad pa/ la la ni/ sa dgu pa/ la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
sa bcu pa la bkod par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' smon lam sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / tshogs sna tshogs
dang / yang dag par sgrub pa sna tshogs dang / spyod pa sna tshogs dang / 'byung ba sna tshogs dang / lam gyi rgyan rnam par dag pa sna tshogs dang / rnam par 'phrul ba dang / khyu
mchog gi mthu phyung ba sna tshogs dang / lam gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su byung ste rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di
ni| chos kyi gzhal med khang sna tshogs na rnam par spyod pas 'khod cing rnam par spyod pa 'di dag yin no/ /de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad
kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba 'di nyid brnan te bstan pa'i
