pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu gcad pa'i sems kyi stobs shugs drag po dang ldan pa rab tu thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu mig 'phrul gyi gzhi'i dpe dang 'dra ba/ 'od kun tu 'byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ chos de dag thob par gyur nas kyang mi zad pa'i tshul du mngon par sgrub cing /sgom pa dang / shin tu rgya che bar bya
ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing rnam pa bcus mngon par dga' bar byed do/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la phangs par mi rtsi ba dang / 'khor
ba'i yo byad don du mi gnyer ba dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par lta ba dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i yid dang / gnas med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' la mi gnas mi rten pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la bsgribs pa med pa dang / zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du rab tu 'dal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa shin
tu sbyangs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing mngon par dga' bar byed do/ /de nas shAkya'i bu
mo go bas don de nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis phyogs bcur bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rlabs chen dri med blo ldan gzhan gyi don zhugs
shing / /dge bshes dam pa bsnyen brtson g.yo dang sgyu med pa/ /ston pa'i 'du shes thob cing skyo med brtson 'grus can/ /de dag spyod pa 'jig rten mig 'phrul 'dra 'di yin/ /gang rnams
mos pa rlabs chen mkha' dang 'dra ldan zhing / /de yi khongs su dus gsum 'jig rten chud pa dang / /zhing dang sems can chos dang sangs rgyas de bzhin pa/ /ye shes 'od byed de dag spyod pa
'di yin no/ /gang rnams bsam pa mkha' 'dra mtha' dang dbus med la/ /kun nas nyon mongs dri mas mgos rab dag cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yon tan 'byung gyur pa/ /
de dag spyod pa mig 'phrul gzhi yi rnam pa 'dra/ /kun mkhyen ye shes rnam yangs tshad med bsam yas dag /yon tan rgya mtshos yid bsal ldan pa nyer brten pa/ /de dag bsod nams rgya
mtsho'i lus ngag snying po ste/ /'jig rten spyod kyang 'jig rten dri mas gos mi 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i gsung gi yan lag sgra skad tshul kun gyis/ /chos kyi 'brug sgra nyan kyang gang rnams mi ngoms
shing / /chos tshul rjes su snyegs pa'i shes rab 'od kyi sgron/ /de dag 'gro bar 'od gsal byed pa'i spyod 'di yin/ /gang rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa/ /gzhan
dang gzhan dag sems kyi skad cig kun sems shing / /bde gshegs rgya mtsho thams cad lta zhing shes byed pa/ /sangs rgyas sems ldan de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/ /rgyal ba rnams
kyi rnam par yangs pa'i 'khor mthong zhing / /de dag ting nge 'dzin tshul rgya mtsho mang bo dang / /smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med tshul 'jug pa/ /mig 'phrul lta bu de dag spyod pa 'di yin
no| |phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus kun gyis byin brlabs te/ /phyi mtha'i bskal par spyod byed kun tu bzang po'i rnams/ /zhing rnams 'byams klas kun tu
gzugs brnyan byung gyur pa/ /chos 'od byed pa de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/ /gang rnams ye shes nyi ma snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/ /'gro ba nyams nyes mthong zhing chos kyi 'od
snang bas/ /'gro ba'i mun pa bsal cing brtan pa 'char 'byung ba/ /nyi ma lta bus de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/ /skye rgu srid pa'i rgyud na 'dre ldog mthong gyur nas/ /yid gsal 'khor
ba'i rgyud rnams phyir zlog rab gnas shing / /chos kyi 'khor lo kun nas yongs su sgrub byed pa/ /spyod pa kun bzang dam pa'i blo can rab tu spyod/ /tshul 'di bslab pa de dag mtha'
dang dbus med pa'i/ /lus rnams bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar nyer bstan te/ /gzugs brnyan mig yor 'dra ba'i rang lus tshad med pas/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag na 'gro mang yongs
smin byed/ /byams tshul shin tu yangs pas 'gro mang rgyas bkang ste/ /mos pa sna tshogs 'gro la rnam par spyod bstan nas/ /'gro bar bsam pa ji bzhin chos kyi char 'bebs
shing / /brtan pa byang chub don du sems can khrag khrig 'dul/ /de nas shAkya'i bu mo go pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras
so| |rigs kyi bu/ kho mos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul thob pa'o/ /nor bzang gis
smras pa| 'phags ma/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul la rnam par lta ba'i yul de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs
kyi bu| kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di la snyoms par zhugs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed mthong
zhing khong du chud do/ /bskal pa de dag gi sems can lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /sems can de dag gi shi 'pho dang / skye ba'i sgo ji
snyed cig yod pa de bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /mngon par 'grub pa'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa dang / las mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su sgrub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / las rnam par smin pa sna
tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /de dag gi las yongs su blangs pa dge ba yang rab tu shes so/ /mi dge ba dang / 'byung ba dang / mi 'byung ba dang / nges pa dang / ma nges
pa dang / log par nges pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang bcas pa dang / bag la nyal ba med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgud par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa
ba yongs su zin pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su zin pa dang / de dag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su 'dus pa
dang / sdig to'i chos yongs su 'dus pa'i las yongs su blangs pa yang rab tu shes so/ /bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi mtshan rgya mtsho yang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu
shes so| |thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba
rnams kyi drung du gshegs pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /'byung ba'i rgyan rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can yongs su smin
par mdzad pa dang gdul ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya ba mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul
pa yang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba
dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag na nyan thos ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gi 'byung ba'i tshul yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang rab tu shes
so| |lam bsgoms pa sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so/ /ye shes thob par bya ba phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa'i bye brag kyang rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
gis sems can ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes

so| |rang sangs rgyas de dag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khong du chung ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi zhi ba'i rnam par spyod pa la rnam par rtse

ba'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs
rgyas de dag gis sems can ji snyed cig yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gis chos bstan pa ji snyed cig brjod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /
rang sangs rgyas de dag ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod cing rnam par thar pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par rtse ba ji snyed cig yod pa de
dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis thog ma dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bdag kyang rab tu
shes so| |thog ma sems pa skyed pa'i smon lam dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /smon lam rnam par dag pa tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas
'byung ba'i rgyan thams cad mngon par sgrub pa rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs rnam par dag par bya ba rnam pa tha dad pa yang
rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lam la nan tan du bya ba'i rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa
yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzem pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i
ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yongs su gnon pas rnam par rtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
sa yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par spyod pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa sgom pa'i rgyud
dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su sbyangs pa'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba dag kyang
rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i mtshan ma dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dbang dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas
sar 'phar pa'i ye shes dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su bsdu ba'i ye shes dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su smin par bya ba'i
ye shes dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgya
yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rnam par rtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems
dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i chul rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho sna tshogs
thob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba'i tshul thob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi glog gi snang ba'i sprin dag
kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thob pa'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa dag kyang rab tu
shes so| |byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing rgya mtshor rjes su bgrod par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /chos rgya mtsho'i tshul la 'jug pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /sems can
rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dam par spyod pa'i tshul thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /smon lam gyi tshul
sna tshogs rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ji ltar mi mjed kyi
'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho la zhugs te khong du chud pa de bzhin du phyi ma'i mtha' gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyun mi 'chad
pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i
'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig
nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas
gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig
tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji
ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag na gnas
pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /phyogs bcu kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gcig nas
gcig tu brgyud pa dag la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /phyogs bcu kun tu 'od rnam par
snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal ba rgya mtsho rnams rab tu
shes pa de bzhin du gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dir gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho
dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams tshul du bya ba rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / 'jig rten
gyi khams kyi bye brag rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi klong rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'khyil pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
ri rab dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sdong po dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rta babs dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming du

bya ba rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di ji ltar shes par gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu mtha'
yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho dag kyang

rab tu shes so/ /rjes su dran no/ /sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag la'ang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon yongs su bsgrubs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag la yang shes shing khong du chud do/ /bskal pa
mtha' dang dbus med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bzhugs pa mdzad pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /zhing yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes
shing khong du chud do/ /sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
la bsnyen bkur mdzad cing gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul
dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis chos bstan pa yongs su bzung ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon gyi byang chub sems
dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /yo byad la dbang sgyur ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon gyi de bzhin
gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la nan tan du mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /
byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mngon par sgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
bzod pa brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs drag po rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /bsam gtan gyi
yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes
shing khong du chud do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas thams cad du sku'i gzugs brnyan yongs su bstan pa mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /kun tu bzang
po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /zhing rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dag kyang shes shing khong
du chud do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las ye shes snang bar gyur pa
rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi byang chub yongs su gnas pa mdzad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs te thugs su chud pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes
shing khong du chud do/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par rol
pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag gi byang

chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /thog ma'i smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sems can yongs
su smin par byed pa dang 'dul ba'i thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe sems can rgya mtsho

yongs su smin par mdzad pa de dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sems can de dag gi sems kyi skad cig re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing

khong du chud do/ /ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rab tu thob pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /spobs pa'i ye
shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag
kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /spyod pa'i dra ba mngon par sgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /mthar gyis yongs su sgrub pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi
tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /de dag gi dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
par 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho chos kyi
dbyings thams cad du byung ba shes shing khong du chud do/ /mngon par sgrub pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho dang / ye
shes kyi sgyu ma'i dra ba mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa/ sgo mtha' yas pa nas shin tu bstan par bya ba/ phyi ma'i mtha' bskal par gnas pa
la 'jug pas bstan par bya ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par byung ba thams cad kyang ma 'dres par shes shing
khong du chud do/ /mngon par sgrub bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par lta
ba'i yul gyi yul ni| de lta bu ste/ de'i phyir de la snyoms par zhugs na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i tshul rab tu shes so/ /sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i tshogs
kyang rab tu shes so/ /sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i ye shes kyi tshul rnams kyang rab tu shes so/ /sems
can thams cad kyi las sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sa yang rab
tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa zhi bas rnam par 'phrul pa yang shes shing khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i
tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar
pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis shAkya'i bu mo go pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma/ khyod kyis byang chub sems
dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul 'di brnyes nas ji srid cig lags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sngon
'das pa'i dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa 'das pa'i pha rol gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jigs pa byed pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi
khams de'i bskal pa 'gro ba'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de'i dbus su gling bzhi pa bde ba yod pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su rgyal

po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal zhes bya ba grong rdal stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i phul du bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal de dang / grong rdal stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de
dag kyang so so nas sa'i gzhi bai DUR+Ya sngon po las grub pa la gnas rin po che bdun las byas pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba/ 'obs spos chus yongs su gang ba/ gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal
ba| ut+pal dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / me tog puN+Da rI ka shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam kha dog dang 'od kyi dra ba sna tshogs shing dri zhim pas kun nas khyab pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/
rin po che las byas pa'i stegs bu'i khri 'phang bdun las ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas dkrigs pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing gi nags tshal gyi phreng ba dkrigs pas kun
nas bskor ba/ steng nas gser gyi dra ba bres pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par phye ba'i mig mang ris mdzes par rnam par bres pas sa'i gzhi shin tu spa bar gyur pa/ dngos grub can
gyi tshogs rnam par rgyu ba/ bya btsun pa'i khyus sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa phyung ba/ bza' shing gi rab bye ba brgya phrag stong gis mdzes par byas pa/ shin tu skyid cing phun sum
tshogs par gnas pa/ skyes pa dang bud med brgya stong rab tu dga' bas gang ba/ ser bu bde zhing yid du 'ong bas bskyod de me tog gi char mang po rgyun mi 'chad
par rab tu 'brul ba/ sa'i bdag po dam pa brgya phrag stong gi gnas su gyur pa dag ste/ grong rdal chen po de dag gi rin po che'i shing thams cad dang / gser gyi dra ba'i rgyan la sogs pa
rlung gis bskyod de rol mo mang po'i sgra dang / snyan pa'i sgra skad byung ba dag las yid du 'ong ba'i tshig 'di skad byung ngo / /gsol cig /mnobs shig /chos la spyod cig /byang
chub tu sems skyed cig /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mnga' thob mdzod cig /khyed rnams bde bar gyur cig /ces zer ro/ /rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal der khams kyi
rgyal po nor gyi bdag po zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la btsun mo'i 'khor bud med stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod do/ /blon po brgya phrag lnga yod par gyur te/ rgyal po nor gyi bdag po
de la bu lnga brgya yod pa de thams cad kyang dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/ shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/
kha dog bzang po'i mchog shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /rgyal po nor gyi bdag po de'i btsun mo dam pa ni/ pad+mo'i dpal dam pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste/ bud med stong phrag
brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nang nas gtso mor bya ba'o/ /de'i bu gzi brjid kyi dbang po zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan pa zhig yod par gyur te/ de la mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag yod par gyur to/ /de'ang 'di ltar rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi
bdag po de rkang pa'i mthil shin tu gnas pa dang ldan te/ sa chen po la rkang pa'i mthil 'dor na mnyam par 'dor la/ 'deg na mnyam par 'deg ste/ gzhog na rkang pa'i mthil
kun gyis sa chen po la mnyam par reg go /de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ lte ba dang bcas pa/ mu khyud dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad du
shin tu tshang ba/ shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa dag kyang byung bar gyur to/ /de'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis kyang shin tu rgyas par gyur to/ /rkang pa'i steng gi mdog shin tu gsal
la shin tu mdzes te/ me tog dam pa bas kyang lhag par mdog bzang zhing gsal bar gyur to/ /de'i rkang lag gi sor mo dra bar 'brel bar gyur te shin tu mdzes pas rnam par
bye ba| bu ga med pas zag pa med pa ni/ dper na/ ngang pa'i rgyal po gnas srung lta bur gyur to/ /de rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa/ shin tu dag la shin tu gsal ba/ rin po che thams
cad kyi 'od rab tu 'gyed par grub pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i sor mo rnams kyang ring zhing zlum la tshigs bar mnyam zhing yangs pa dang ldan par gyur te/
de dag mnyam par sa la 'jog go /mnyam par sa las 'deg go /de'i rkang pa dang lag pa'i mthil yang ka tsa lin+da bas kyang lhag par reg na bde bar gyur te/ des skyes pa'am/
bud med dam/ khye'u dang bu mo gang la reg kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad bde ba dang / yid dga' ba'i dam pas tshim zhing yid shin tu bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i byin pa ri dwags
e na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug par gyur te/ rim gyis gzhol ba dang / shin tu mdzes pa dang / legs par grub par gyur pas/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po e na ye ltar de la sus
kyang bsnyegs pa'am sleb par mi nus te/ 'gro bas ngal zhing dub par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi dbang po de bdun shin tu mtho ba dang yang ldan par gyur te/
de'i rkang pa gnyis la shin tu mtho ba zlum la shin tu legs pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / tshigs mi snang ba dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang / blta na sdug pa gnyis grub par
gyur to| |lag pa la gnyis/ thal gong gi lhun la gnyis/ ltag pa la gcig ste/ de ltar bdun no/ /de'i mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa grub par gyur te/ de'i gsang
pa'i gnas sbubs na 'dug pa shin tu mi mngon la nang du nub cing kun nas yog par 'dug pa ste/ dper na/ glang po cang shes sam/ rta cang shes ltar 'dug pas de gos ma gyon par
'dug kyang bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mo'am/ rgan pa'am/ dar la bab pa'am/ bla ma'am/ bla mar bya ba rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ste/ gzhan du na bdag longs
par spyod pa'am/ ched du bstan par bya ste/ 'dod pas spyad pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de ro stong seng+ge ltar 'dug pa dang ldan par gyur te/ lus rim pas
rgyas la ro stod shin tu yangs shing rdzogs pas/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po bas kyang mdzes par dbyibs shin tu legs pa'i ro stod dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i thal gong rgyas shing lus shin
tu rgyas pa/ lus rnam par phye ba/ lus kyi cha thams cad rkyen du 'bab par mnyam pa/ lus la dma' ba med pa/ lus la mtho ba med pa/ lus la zhum pa med pa/ lus la dgu pa
med pa| lus rin po che'i gtan pa shin tu phyis pa bas kyang lhag par gsal bar gyur to/ /de dpung mgo shin tu zlum zhing sha rgyas la shin tu mdzes par gang ba dang ldan par gyur
to/ /des mi chen po'i mtshan lag pa shin tu ring ba thob par gyur pa/ des lus ma btud de lus drang por 'dug kyang pus mo'i lha nga gnyis la nyug cing reg go /des mi chen po'i mtshan
lus che zhing drang ba'ang thob par gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan la/ lus tshul dang 'dra bar mnyam pa dang / lus rab tu mnyen pa
dang / lus shen tu lci ba dang / lus rab tu gsal ba dang / lus shin tu sim par byed pa dang ldan par gyur te/ des mi chen po'i mtshan mgul dung lta bu yang thob par gyur te/
mi dma'i mgul dang / de'i mgul gyi 'khor thams cad dang / bzhin gyi 'khor thams cad na rtsa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shin tu mnyam par gyur te/ kun kyang
rab tu tshang bar gyur to/ /mi chen po'i mtshan seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu yang thob par gyur te/ za 'gram shin tu mkhregs pa dang / bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rgyas pa dang / bzhin
gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu legs shing yongs su dag pa dang / kha'i sgo shin tu yangs pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /mi chen po'i mtshan so mnyam pa bzhi bcu dang yang ldan par gyur te/
so ma tshang ba med pa la zas shig za na yang lan gcig bldad pas chung du na 'bras can gyi 'bru 'ga' yang ma zhig par za ba med do/ /so thags bzang zhing mnyam pa rab tu thob ste/
mtshams chu sgo med pa dang / shin tu mnyam pa dang / rkyen rkyen du shin tu mdzes pa ste/ de kha zas shig za na yang 'go ba dang / 'chags pa dang / zhen pa dang / ljan ljin du 'gyur
ba'am| thogs par 'gyur ba'am/ gseb 'gang bar 'gyur ba med do/ /mi chen po'i mtshan so mnyam pa rab tu thob par gyur te/ so mnyam zhing rnga rngo med pa dang / so lhag med pa dang /
so zhum pa med pa dang / so gyes pa med pa dang / so thog drung mnyam pa dang / so rngo ba med par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de'i mche ba shin tu dkar bar gyur te/ mche ba skyon med pa/ mche ba
shin tu gsal ba/ mche ba shin tu dag pa/ mche ba shin tu brtan par gyur to/ /mi chen po'i mtshan lce shin tu yangs pa yang rab tu thob par gyur te/ de'i lce ni/ shin tu yangs la srab cing
mnyen te/ shin tu 'jam pa dang / las su rung ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / bsgyur na bde ba dang / gdong gi dkyil 'khor kun 'gebs pa dang / bden zhing phan par 'gyur ba'i don dang /
yi ge dang / ngag dang / nges pa'i tshig thogs pa med par rjod par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur te/ dbyangs yid du 'ong ba dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / klu'i
nga ro dang / sil snyan gyi dbyangs dang / sgra skad dang / brjod cing smra ba'i tshig gi las yid du 'ong ba brjod pas/ ngag gi lam mngon par dga' ba bskyed pa/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon
par 'dun par 'gyur bar tshangs pa las kyang lhag pa'i dbyangs kyis ngag rjod de/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor las kyang gud du mi 'da' bar thams cad kyi yid dang mthun par byed pa dang
ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni/ mig dkar nag 'byes par gyur te/ mig shin tu dang ba dang / mig yongs su dag pa dang / mig la 'od chags pa dang /
mig rnam par gsal ba dang / mig mngon par mdzes pa dang / mig blta na sdug pa dang / mig yid du 'ong ba dang / mig 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni/ rdzi ma ba'i
rdzi ma lta bu dang ldan par gyur to/ /mig gi skye mched rin po che pad+ma rA ga ltar shin tu dag pa/ mig gi sprin mnyam pa/ mig gi sprin mtshungs pa/ mig gi sprin legs pa/ mig
gi sprin yangs pa/ mig gi sprin rdzogs pa/ mig gi sprin shin tu brtan par gyur to/ /de'i smin mtshams su mdzod spu skyes par gyur te/ 'jam pa/ las su rung ba/ shin tu mnyen
pa| shing bal ltar reg na bde ba/ dang ba/ gsal ba/ 'od yod pa/ chab rom lta bu kha ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ 'od zer dkar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od rab tu snang ba dang ldan par
gyur to| |de'i spyi bo la gtsug tor mngon par grub par gyur te shin tu legs pa/ kun nas zlum pa/ dbus su bab pa/ skra'i rgyan du gyur pa/ rin po che'i pad+mo 'dab ma bye ba brgya phrag
stong dang ldan pa ltar snang ba/ kun nas cha mnyam par gnas pa/ rin thang gdab tu tshad med pas gces pa'i gtsug tu gyur pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de pags pa shin tu
'jam pa dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i lus la rdul tam/ dri ma'am/ rdul tam/ ser ka'am/ gnyer ma'am/ lhod pa'am/ 'khums pa'am/ 'phyang ba'am/ slod bag tu
gnas pa med par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni/ mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi mdog lta bu dang ldan zhing 'od kun tu 'dom gang ba
dang / gser ltar gcig tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes par brgyan pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas dri zhim po'i 'od zer 'byung bas lus kyi rgyan rab
rib med cing 'od gsal ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni/ ba spu re re'i byung ba dang ldan par gyur te/ ba spu'i bu ga re re nas ba spu re re skyes par gyur pa/ bai DUR+Ya sngon
po'i kha dog lta bu/ g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba/ legs par skyes pa/ mthang la zhi bar 'dug pa/ shin tu legs par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de'i spu yan
lag gyen du 'khyil bar gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i spu dang / mi ldog pa'i spu dang / ma 'dres pa'i spu dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de mi chen po'i mtshan skra mthon mthing du 'dug
pa thob par gyur te/ de'i skra nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i mdog ltar mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ 'jam pa/ snum pa/ legs par 'khyil ba/ g.yas phyogs su 'khyil
ba| drung shin tu ran pa/ zad zed med pa/ 'jam 'jam ltar 'dug pa/ mi 'dzings pa/ dbyibs mnyam zhing mthun par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu de shing
gro d+ha ltar mchu zheng gab pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan rab tu thob par gyur te/ kun nas rkyen du ran pa dang / kun tu bzang ba dang / kun tu mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te/ de ni/ mdun nas
bltas na'ang ngoms mi shes shing / blta na yid du 'ong ba/ rgyab dang / g.yas g.yon dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 'greng ba dang / nyal ba dang / smra ba dang / mi smra bar
'dug pa la bltas na'ang ngoms mi shes shing yid du 'ong la blta na sdug par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
gnyis po de dag gis yongs su brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis blta na yid du mi 'ong ba'i bag med pa/ blta na bsam pa thams cad yongs
su rdzogs par byed pa/ blta na sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su 'byung ba de lta bu zhig skyes par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de nas lan gcig cig rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid
kyi bdag po de yab kyis gnang nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal gyi bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba der sa bzang po blta ba'i
phyir bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dang lhan cig tu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang dpal gyi bskal ba bzang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyis byung nas skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs kyis kun nas
dga' bar bya zhing / dzam+bu chu klung gi gser gyi shing rta rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo chen po bzhi dang ldan pa/ rdo rje mthu bo che'i srog shing sra ba/ tsan+dan dam pa las bsgrubs pa'i yu ba
bzang po dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po spos sna tshogs kyi shing thags rnam par bkye ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che thams
cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ seng+ge'i khri rin po che dam pa'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi snying po can dbus su bshams pa/ bu mo lnga brgyas rin po che'i srad bu'i lnga ldi nas yongs
su bzung ba/ nam mkha' la chags pa med pa'i rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i rta cang shes stong dang bcas pa la zhon nas gdugs chen po rim gyis gzhol zhing blta na sdug pa/ steng
g.yogs rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUR+Ya dkar po las byas pa/ 'od dri ma med pa tshad med pa 'byung ba/ rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba sna tshogs thams cad kyis
spa bar spras te rnam pa thams cad du mdzes par brgyan pa/ yu ba rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUR+Ya sngon po las bsgrengs pas ni/ bskyabs/ srog chags brgya stong mang pos ni/ yongs
su bskor/ rol mo brgya stong mang po lha rdzas kyi dbyangs yid du 'ong ba snyan pa dang ldan pa dag ni/ rab tu blangs/ me tog gi char chen po ni/ mngon
par 'bab/ lha rdzas kyi spos dri zhim pa'i bdug spos kyi snod bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis ni/ rab tu bdug cing 'gro bar gyur to/ /de de ltar 'gro ba'i tshe lam yang rgyud brgyad
dang ldan par gyur te/ mthon dman med pa dang / gseg ma dang gyo mo med pa dang / gser dngul dang rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyi khams kyis sa'i gzhi rab tu bsgrubs pa
dang / gser gyi phye ma bkram pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog sil mas chal bar gang ba dang / g.yas g.yon nas rin po che'i shing gi phreng bas dkrigs pa dang / rin
po che sna tshogs kyi kha ran bkye ba dang / steng nas rin po che'i dra ba bres pa dang / rin po che'i gnam yol sna tshogs kyis bkab pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
dang / snam bu brgya stong rab tu brgyan pa du ma bsgrengs shing dpyangs pas mdzes par brgyan pa dang / g.yas g.yon nas rin po che'i stegs bu'i phreng ba rnam par bkod pas rnam
par brgyan pa ste/ rin po che stegs bu la la la ni/ slong mo pa'i tshogs la yongs su bstab pa'i don du rin po che'i snod sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba
bkod| stegs bu la la la ni/ rgyan 'dod pa'i slong mo pa rnams brgyan pa'i don du rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa yongs su bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni/ sems can thams cad
kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni/ su ci 'dod pa de dag la de sbyin pa'i don du kha zas dang / btung ba dang / bro
ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba'i snod mang po bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni/ rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu zhim pa'i ro dang / kha dag dang / dri dang / bro ba dang / reg bya yid du 'ong
ba dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi kha zas kyi rnam pa bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni/ ro bro ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi shing thog sna tshogs thams cad spungs/ stegs bu la la la ni/
gos 'dod pa rnams yid bzhin du spyod du gzud pa'i phyir lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ mdog bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang / ri mo sna tshogs shin tu spa
bar rnam par phye ba/ shin tu btsun pa la 'os pa/ shin tu phra ba/ rab tu 'jam pa/ thags su ma btags pa bye ba brgya phrag stong snyed yongs su bkod par gyur to/ /stegs bu la la la ni/
byug pa 'dod pa'i sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyod du gzud pa'i phyir lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rnam pa kha dog dang / dri rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa dag
bkod par gyur to/ /stegs bu la la la ni/ sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyod du gzud pa'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi phung po dag
bkod par gyur to/ /stegs bu la la la ni/ na chung gzugs bzang ba/ rab tu mdzes pa/ shin tu sdug pa/ cha lug sdug gu sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i gos sna
tshogs dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i gos sna tshogs gyon pa rgyan thams cad kyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ byug pa sna tshogs kyis tshul sdug gur brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa'i
lus dang ldan pa/ bud med kyi bzo dang / sgyu dang / shes nyen gyi tshul la mkhas pa dag bkod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal de nyid na sbrul tshong ma'i
dam pa rgyal po'i longs spyod du 'os pa/ blta na mdzes pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'i bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ shin tu
mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi thung / ha cang yang mi sbom/ ha cang yang mi phra/ ha cang yang mi dkar/ ha cang yang mi sngo ba/ skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa/
mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ bzhin yid du 'ong pa/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ 'jam zhing snyan par smra ba/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ shes nyen gyi tshul thams cad la mkhas pa/
gtsug lag thams cad la shes pa/ brtson pa/ le lo med pa/ rim gro yod pa/ mos pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa'i sems bdog pa/ khong khro ba mi mnga' ba/ blta na mi ngoms shing
yid du 'ong ba/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug chung ba/ ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa/ drang zhing mnyen pa/ g.yo dang sgyu med pa zhig yod de/ de ma dang lhan cig tu bu mo
du ma zhig gis bskor te rin po che'i shing rta la zhon nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal nas byung ste rgyal pos bka' stsal nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i mdun nas
phar rgyal bu gzhon nu de la glu len cing 'dong 'dong ba las/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po mthong nas 'dod chags kyi sems shin tu mi bzad pa zhig g.yos te/ rgyal bu
gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po shin tu yid du 'ong ches nas rjes su 'brang zhing sems la rang dbang med pas/ blta na sdug pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ma 'di ltar mkhyen par mdzod
cig /gal te bdag rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la ma btang na ni/ 'gum pa'am/ srog la 'bab pa'i sdug bsngal gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ bu mo/ de lta bu'i sems
ma skyed cig/ gzhon nu 'di ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de'i yab nor gyi bdag po mi bzhugs par 'gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la gnas par
'gyur ba'i gnas yod de/ de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bas de'i bud med rin po che nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ bu mo bdag
cag kyang sbrul tshong ma dag cig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar byed pa yin gyi/ yu bus sems can 'ga' zhig la nam 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur mi byar mi rung ba'ang med de/ yu
bu ni| rgyal po nor gyi bdag po'i bkas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i rim gror 'dong 'dong bar zad kyi/ de lta bu'i sems brtan par ma byed cig /gnas de ni/ thob par
yang shin tu dka'o/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku nyi ma dam pa zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
pa| 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i snying po byang chub
chos kyi sprin shin tu sdug pa'i 'od ces bya ba yang bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba de'i nang du byung ste/ der bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa thog ma mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun lon pa de bu mo shing rta la zhon bzhin du yur zhing 'chog 'chog pa'i rmi lam du mthong
nas sad par gyur pa dang sngon gnyen bshes su gyur pa'i lha mo zhig gis bstan pa/ bu mo/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa de snying po byang chub chos kyi sprin shin tu sdug pa'i 'od ces bya
ba rnam par spyod cing thog ma mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun lon te byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za
dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas shing bzhugs te/

der sa'i lha mo thams cad kyang kun nas 'dus/ chu'i lha mo dang / me'i lha mo dang / rlung gi lha mo dang / rgya mtsho'i lha mo dang / chu'i klung gi lha mo dang / ri'i lha mo dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / skya

rengs 'char ba'i lha mo dang / nags tshal gyi lha mo dang / shing gi lha mo dang / sman gyi lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo dang / grong khyer gyi lha mo dang / rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha mo dang / snying po

byang chub kyi lha mo dang / lus kyi 'od zer gyi lha mo dang / sems can gyi ris kyi lha mo dang / nam mkha'i lha mo dang / phyogs thams cad kyi lha mo dag kyang bcom ldan 'das sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhal
blta ba'i phyir kun nas 'dus so/ /zhes nas de ltar des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thos pas bag tsha med pa thob par gyur te skabs su bab nas
rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i mdun du de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gzugs kyi mchog gis 'jig rten khyad par 'phags/
yon tan rnams kyis thams cad phyogs su grags/ /shes rab stobs kyi bdag dang 'dra ma mchis/ /sgyu rtsal dga' ba sgyu ma'i tshul kun 'tshal/ /srog chags mang po stong 'phrag
du ma yis/ /'dod chags dbang gis bdag la rab bltas kyang / /gzhon nu bdag ni 'jig rten gang la yang / /glo ba chags par gyur pa gcig ma mchis/ /sems can
gang la'ang zhen par gyur pa'am/ /gang la'ang khong khror bdag gi sems ma gyur/ /gang la'ang dgra mi bgyid de zhe mi sdang / /bdag ni sems can sman par dga' ba lags/ /
sku gzhon sku mchog yon tan rab mnga' khyod/ /gang tshe bdag gis gsal bar mthong gyur pa/ /de tshe dbang po kun kyang nyams su bde/ /rgya che yangs par shin tu dga' bar gyur/ /
khyod kyi dbu bzang lcang lor 'khyil ba 'am/ /rin chen rnam snang mdog tu mthon mthing gsal/ /zhal gyi smin sdug 'phral ba shangs su mdzes/ /khyod kyi zhal sngar lus 'di
bdag 'bul lo/ /mtshan gyi rab 'chang gzi brjid che mnga' ba/ /sku gzugs gser gyi ri bo bzang po 'dra/ /khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag lta mi mdzes te/ /zil du rlog pas snag tsha'i
gzugs kyang 'dra/ /spyan gsal ring la dkar nag 'byes pas mdzes/ /shin tu zhal rgyas seng+ge'i za 'gram can/ /khyod kyi gsung ni thogs pa ma mchis na/ /gsung mchog mnga'
bas bdag ni gzung du gsol/ /khyod kyi zhal na ljags yangs mnga' ba ni/ /mdog dmar yangs pa rin chen mchog gi 'od/ /tshangs dbyangs yan lag mchog gi gsung mnga' bas/ /gsung

zhing 'gro ba rab tu dga' ba mdzad/ /khyod kyi zhal na thags bzang tshems mnga' ba/ /dung ltar dri med shin tu rnam par gsal/ /'dzum zhing bzhad pa rnam par ston mdzad kyang / /skyes bu dpa' khyod 'gro
ba dga' bar mdzad/ /khyod kyi sku la mtshan rab mdzes pa rnams/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis dag cing 'od kyang gsal/ /sku gzugs bzang po yongs su des brgyan pas/ /mi yi dbang po 'khor los bsgyur
ba byon| |shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste/ bam po brgya brgyad pa/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos
bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ /khyod su'i/ khyod la yongs su srung ba ni/ gang zhig yod/ bu mo/ /nga la ni/ gzhan gyis yongs su bzung
ba'i bud med bdag gir byar mi rung ngo / /zhes nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /blta sdug gzugs kyi yon tan legs ldan pa/ /mtshan bzang bsod nams rnam
par dag pa'i lus/ /khyod la dri ba'i don 'di nga la smros/ /lus mchog khyod ni su yis yongs su bzung / /khyod la pha dang ma ni yod dam med/ /khyim thab
med dam khyod ni su zhig dbang / /gzugs mdzes khyod la sems can gzhan nam gcig /bdag gi yin par 'du shes byed med dam/ /khyod kyi yid ni gsod la mi dga' grang /
gzhan las ma byin 'phrog par mi byed dam/ /'dod pas log par g.yem la mi dga' grang / /rdzun du brjod smrar yid ni mi smros sam/ /khyod kyi blo gros mdza' dbyen mi 'jug gam/ /
tshig brlang gzhan la gnod par mi smra grang / /gzhan gyi nor la chags par sems med dam/ /'gro ba rnams la gnod par mi sems grang / /lta ba'i 'brog dgon lam du ma zhugs
grang / /las kyi rgyud la ye rngam sems med dam/ /g.yo mdog sgyu yi dbang du mi 'gro 'am/ /mi 'thad 'jig rten gnod par mi byed grang / /pha ma gnyen dang mdza' bshes bla ma
la| |sri zhu rim gro bya ba'i tshul 'chang ngam/ /phongs par gyur pa yongs su bsdu don du/ /khyod kyi yid la sbyin pa'i sems yod dam/ /chos dang mthun par dus su 'doms byed
cing / /lus dang sems yid yongs su dag byed la/ /yang dag las su rung ba skyed byed pa'i/ /dge bshes rnams la dga' ba'i sems yod dam/ /sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror
byed ldan nam/ /sangs rgyas sras la dga' mchog yod dam med/ /gang las bde gshegs sras rnams skyer 'gyur ba'i/ /chos kyi dam pa de ni shes mi shes/ /chos yid mchog la
gnas par khyod byed grang / /chos min spyad pa'i blo gros med grang ngo / /legs pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho la/ /gus pa'i sri zhu dga' sems mchog yod dam/ /skye bo mgon
med phongs par gyur pa yi/ /'bren pa rnams la byams pa'i yid yod dam/ /ngan song 'gro ba'i lam la zhugs pa yi/ /shin tu nyam thag snying rjes sems grang ngo / /gzhan gyi phun
sum tshogs pa mthong gyur na/ /khyod ni dga' ba mchog dang ldan 'gyur ram/ /skye bo nyon mongs rnams kyis 'khol gyur la/ /shes rab mthu bskyed btang snyoms byed mi byed/ /mi
shes gnyid log skye bo mang mthong na/ /byang chub dam par smon lam 'debs byed grang / /bskal pa mtha' yas spyad pa spyod pa na/ /smon lam dam pas skyo bar mi 'gyur grang / /de
nas bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa'i ma sbrul tshod ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu/ bdag gi bu

mo 'di ni/ rdzus te byung ba pad+mo'i nang nas skyes pa ste/ sngon chad khyim gyi nang nas phyi rol tu ma byung ngo / /zhes nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /bu mo 'di la khyod kyis gang
smras pa| |de ni bdag gis rim pas khyod la brjod/ /ji ltar bu mo 'di skyes bskyed bskyed pa/ /bdag gis khyod la gsol gyi gsan du gsol/ /gang tshe dgung
sangs khyod ni bltams gyur pa/ /de tshe bdag gi bu mo 'di skyes te/ /rdzus te dri med pad+mo'i sbubs nas byung / /yan lag kun tshang mig yangs 'di yang skyes/ /dus kyi nang na sos
ka dus mchog la/ /sman dang lo tog myu gu thon pa'i tshe/ /sA la'i ra ba bza' shing rab mchog tu/ /bdag ni rtse dga' de khrod mchi mchi ste/ /sna tshogs yal ga'i lo ma rgyas gyur
cing / /zhugs shing me tog sdug rgyas sprin gyi mdog /bya bran sna tshogs sgra snyan zhugs shing nang / /nags khrod mya ngan ma mchis dgar mchis mchis/ /rgyan dang ldan zhing shin tu
yid 'ong la/ /rin chen rat+na sna tshogs 'tshal ba rnams/ /rol mo glu la shin tu bslab pa yi/ /bu mo brgya phrag brgyad dang bdag kyang ldan/ /spos mchog ldan pa'i puN+Da rI ka dang / /
rdzing 'gram me tog sil mas gtams pa yis/ /sa phyogs de na bud med mang po dang / /bdag cag de na dga' bar mchis mchis na/ /chab dbus de nas rin chen pad+mo'i mchog/
'dab ma stong dang ldan pa byung bar gyur/ /lo ma rin chen yu ba bai DUR+Ya/ /snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gser las bgyis/ /spos mchog rin chen dam pa'i ze ba can/ /'od chen dzam+bu'i
rgyal mtshan kun tu 'phro/ /de tshe dgung la gdugs shig shar tam zhes/ /skye bo kun kyang yid gnyis 'tshal bar gyur/ /dgung sangs rgyur nas pad+mo chen po de/ /gdugs kyi 'od kyis
rab tu rgyas bgyis nas/ /snang ba de dang sgra snyan rab kyang bkye/ /'di 'byung de ni sngon gyi ltas su byung / /bud med rin chen 'di 'dra 'jig rten du/ /tshul khrims dam pa rnam par dag
pas byung / /sug las bgyis pa chab 'tshal mi 'gyur bas/ /'di ni sngon chad legs par spyad pa'i 'bras/ /skra ni mthon mthing mig yangs ut+pa la/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan kha
dog rnam dag ldan/ /phreng ba rgyan mchog cha lugs dbyibs su shis/ /dpal ltar dri med pad+mo'i mchog las skyes/ /lus ni rnam dag yan lag rkyen du mnyam/ /lus kyi dbyibs legs
yan lag yongs su tshang / /gser gyi gzugs la nor bus phyis pa 'dra/ /phyogs kun 'od kyis rnam par gda' bar gsal/ /lus las tsan+dan rgyal po'i spos kyi dri/ /phyogs su rgyas par 'di
yi lus las 'byung / /sgra snyan lha rdzas yid du 'ong brjod tshe/ /kha nas ut+pa la yi ngad kyang ldan/ /'di ni gang tshe 'dzum zhing dgod pa'i tshe/ /rol mo'i sgra snyan de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
bud med rin chen 'jig rten 'dir byung ste/ /tha ma la kun gyi dbang du 'gyur ma lags/ /khyod ma gtogs par mi yi 'jig rten na/ /'di yi bdag po gzhan ni gcig ma mchis/ /mtshan
rab brgyan pa'i sku gzugs mdzes mnga' ba/ /khyod kyi zhal sngar bu mo 'di bzhes gsol/ /'di ni ha cang mi ring mi thung ste/ /ha cang mi spo ma ha cang phra ma
lags| |lto ni gzhu 'dra nu ma shas kyang rgyas/ /yan lag skyon bral 'di ni khyod la 'os/ /grangs dang yi ge shes bgyi tshul rnams dang / /lag brda'i tshul dang gtsug lag tshul
la mkhas/ /'jig rten kun na bzo rnams ji snyed pa/ /ma lus de la 'di ni pha rol phyin/ /mda' gzhu'i tshul la'ang rnam pa brgyas su mkhas/ /'phong gi cho ga rnam pa rangs par
rtogs| |dgra yid bzho zhing dbab pa kun la yang / /'di ni mchog tu pha rol phyin par gyur/ /lus rnams kun nas rin chen rnam dag pa'i/ /'od mchog 'khor gyis shin tu
mdzes pa ste/ /sngon gyi legs pas shin tu sdug par brgyan/ /'di ni khyod kyi phyag rjed khyod la 'os/ /mi yi 'jig rten gnas rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag gso ba'i tshul gyi cho ga
'tshal| |de dag ma lus thams cad zhir bgyi na'ang / /ma nor sman gyi cho gas gso la mkhas/ /dzam+bu'i rgyal mtshan skad rnams thams cad dang / /skye bo'i nges tshig ma lus bye
brag dang / /'jig rten tha snyad brjod pa'i mtshams sbyar ba/ /sna tshogs kun la'ang 'di ni pha rol phyin/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par sgrub pa'i tshul/ /de dag bye brag tshul la'ang
rab tu zhugs/ /'jig rten glu gar rnam pa ji snyed pa/ /ma lus de rnams kun gyi tshul yang 'tshal/ /rol mo sil snyan dag gi thabs rnams dang / /bzhad gad rol mo'i tshul la rnam par
mkhas| |chags dang ma chags mi rnams mngon 'tshal kyang / /khong khro chags par 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /'jig rten bud med sgra rnams ji snyed pa/ /khyad par nang du de la ma lus
'tshal| |bud med skye bo'i skyon du bgyi ba rnams/ /grangs med de dag 'di la gcig ma mchis/ /thil gyis blta dang zur gyis blta ba dang / /yan lag bstabs dang yan lag rnams
bstan dang / /shes nyen kun la mkhas pa'i mthar phyin te/ /khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/ /'di ni phrag dog ser sna ma mchis te/ /'dod pa zhe dug mi ldang
sdig mi bgyid/ /bzod cing drang la mnyen zhing des pa ste/ /mi khro mi brlang shin tu mkhas pa lags/ /ldang ba'i ngang tshul yid du 'ong ba'i ngag /rtag tu bla ma'i thugs dang sbyor ba ste/ /sku
nyams gar bde lta zhing sri zhu che/ /khyod kyi spyod mthun rjes su snyegs tshul dang mthun/ /rgyas shing gtugs dang nad dang ldan pa dang / /phongs pa shin tu sdug bsngal gyur pa dang / /mig
dang bral zhing mgon skyabs ma mchis la/ /'di ni snying brtse rtag tu skyed pa lags/ /'di ni rtag tu gzhan don sems la brtson/ /bdag la sman pa sems par bgyid ma mchis/ /'jig
rten kun la sman par dga' ba ste/ /rlabs chen sems kyi yon tan kun gyis brgyan/ /mchis sam nyal lam mchi 'am 'greng yang rung / /smra'am
mi smra 'dzum zhing dgod kyang rung / /rtag tu bag mchis dran pa shes bzhin te/ /'di ni 'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu bsngags/ /bsod nams ldan pas kun tu rnam par
snang / /'gro ba kun kyang rtag tu dga' ba ste/ /'di la lta bas 'jig rten ngoms mi 'gyur/ /'di ni gang la'ang chags par 'gyur ma mchis/ /dge ba shes rnams la sri
zhu 'di che ste/ /de dag mthong bar rtag par rab tu dga'/ /rjes su ci 'byung lta zhing skyon med tshul/ /sems bdag brtan pa ri rab ri dang 'dra/ /'di ni bsod nams
mchog gis rtag tu brgyan/ /mi mdza' dgrar len 'di la yong ma mchis/ /'di yi shes 'dra bud med gcig ma mchis/ /rgyal sras khyod la 'di ni tshul dang mthun/ /de nas
rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung bar phyin te/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa'i ma sprul tshong
ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug ba'i mdun du bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ nga ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu zhugs pa yin te/ de bas na/ ngas thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshogs ni/ tshad med pa zhig bsag par bya dgos/ bskal ba mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig tu byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa spyad de pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ni/ yongs su rdzogs par bya dgos/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal ba'i mur thug par ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod par bya
dgos te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa ni/ yongs su gzung bar bya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni/ yongs su sbyang bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
ni| mi gcad par bya/ sems can gyi rgyud thams cad ni/ yongs su smin par bya/ sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ni/ rnam par bzlog par bya/ mtha' las
rgal bar bde ba la ni/ sems can rab tu dgod par bya/ sems can thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mig ni/ yongs su dag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsgrub pa
la ni| brtson par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la ni/ gnas par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni/ yongs su bsgrub par bya/ sems
can gyi khams thams cad ni/ yongs su sbyang bar bya/ sems can thams cad kyi phongs pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir bdag gi nor thams cad ni/ gtang bar bya/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur
thug pa'i bskal par spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe kha zas dang btung ba'i spyin pas ni/ sems can yongs su tshim par bya/ yo byad kyi dngos
po thams cad yongs su btang bas ni/ slong ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs su tshim par bya dgos te/ de ltar bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la nan tan nyams su len
pa'i tshe phyi nang gi dngos po gang ci yang rung ste/ yongs su mi gtang ba de lta bu med pas de ltar ngas bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma yang sbyin par bya dgos/ /mig dang / mgo dang / rkang lag
dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad kyang yongs su gtang dgos na/ de'i tshe khyod gzhan la byin na/ /nga'i sbyin pa'i bgegs su 'gyur ro/ /bu yid du 'ong ba yongs su btang na/
yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal yang mang po zhig nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /nga la bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar byas na/ ser sna'i
sems su 'gyur ro/ /nga'i yan lag dang / nying lag gtubs shing slong mo ba rnams la gtong ba'i tshe yid mi dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /nam zhig na ngas khyod bor te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de/ de'i tshe'ang khyod yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes nas rgyal bu gzi brjid bdag pos de'i tshe bu mo
dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ngas ni 'gro kun snying rje rab bskyed de/ /yun ring mchog nas byang chub rab zhugs pas/ /yang dag byang chub
tshogs chen rgya mtsho rnams/ /tshad med thams cad yongs su rdzogs bya dgos/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med par/ /mkha' ltar tshad med smon lam rnam sbyang zhing / /de bzhin
gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i sa yi rnams/ /bskal pa mtha' yas yongs su sbyang yang dgos/ /rgyal ba dus gsum 'byung ba thams cad kyi/ /pha rol phyin pa'i lam la ngas bslab ste//
ye shes bla na med pa'i tshul chen gyis/ /byang chub lam mchog rnam par sbyang yang dgos/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams thams cad kyang / /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par sbyang bar bya/ /
'jig rten kun gyi mi khom thams cad dang / /ngan song kun kyang rnam par bzlog dgos so/ /nyon mongs bsgribs shing gti mug mun 'thoms pa'i/ /sems can kun kyang ma lus
rnam sbyang dgos/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis yongs su sbyangs byas te/ /thams cad mkhyen lam tshul la dgod kyang dgos/ /chags med sa rnams kun kyang ngas sbyangs te/ /bskal ba
rgya mtshor rgyal ba mchod par bya/ /'gro ba ma lus kun la byams bskyed de/ /'jig rten dag tu ma lus sbyin gtang dgos/ /slong ba kun nas 'dus shing 'ongs mthong nas/ /thams
cad gtang bar rtag tu brtson gyur na/ /de'i tshe khyod ni nga sems mi mthun te/ /zhum zhing dma' la 'jungs par mi 'gyur ram/ /nga yi mgo 'dod 'ongs par
ngas mthong ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod gyur na/ /de tshe khyod ni sdug bsngal gdungs 'gyur gyi/ /'di 'dra'i don thos rab tu brtan par gyis/ /nga yi rkang lag gtubs pa
mthong gyur na/ /khyod ni mi dga' de tshe slong ba la/ /bud med ngang gis tshig drag mi bzod smra/ /don 'di thos shing sems la yongs su soms/ /phangs pa'i dngos dang de bzhin bu
rnams dang / /khyod kyang slong ba'i tshogs la sbyin dgos kyi/ /don 'di thos te mi dga' med na lta/ /khyod dga' thams cad de bzhin bya la rag /de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo dga'
ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu ji skad gsung ba de ltar bgyi'o/ /bdag ni/ khyod ci dgyes pa dang / ci
bzhed par longs spyod pa dang / gang du dgyes par mchi ba dang / thams cad du yang slad nam las pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / rtag tu zham ring sleb pa dang / don thams cad la brtson
pa dang / thugs dang mthun par spyad pa dang / med par nyams su blang ba dang / mi mthun pa ma mchis par nan tan du bgyi ba'i tshul la spyad par bgyi'o/ /zhes nas bu mo dga' ba'i
'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas rgyal po'i sras gzi brjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gi lus 'di sems can dmyal ba yi/ /zhugs kyis yongs gdungs zhu bar
gyur kyang rung / /khyod spyod skal ba mnyam pa'i phyag rjed du/ /tshe rabs rgya mtshor bdag gis spro bar bgyi/ /tshe rabs mtha' yas skyes pa re re zhing / /bdag gi lus ni shin tu gtubs
gshags kyang / /brtan dam sems kyis rab tu spro bar bgyi/ /ngang dge khyod kyis bdag gis khyim thab mdzod/ /khor yug ri yis bskal ba mtha' yas su/ /bdag gi mgo ni yongs
su btags gyur kyang / /sems la mi bde ma mchis dad par bgyi/ /khyod kyis rtag par bdag gi khyim thab mdzod/ /khyod kyis tshe rabs grangs med thams cad du/ /bdag la thugs brtan
thugs kyis mnga' mdzad de/ /yan lag sha gtubs gzhan la stsal ba mdzod/ /khyod kyi chos la bdag kyang brtan gzhag gsol/ /bdag gi lus ni slad na ma las par/ /skyes bu lha yi sras
po khyod la dbul/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ /skye bo slong ba rnams la dgyes par stsol/ /sems can kun la thugs rje mtha' yas pa/ /bskyed de sems can rgya
mtsho bsdu slad du/ /byang chub dam pa mchog tu khyod zhugs pas/ /de slad bdag kyang thugs rjes bzung ba mdzod/ /longs spyod don dang nor gyi don ma lags/ /'dod spyod dga' ba
bskyed pa'i don slad du/ /sems can mchog khyod khyor 'tshal ma lags kyi/ /khyod dang spyod pa mthun par spyad slad du'o/ /spyan gsal mdzes shing
byams pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /khyod ni 'jig rten gzigs pa ci tshul lags/ /thugs rje che yi 'dod chags thugs mi mnga'/ /de las thub dbang 'gyur ba gdon mi
'tshal| |khyod kyi zhabs kyis bcags pa'i sa rnams kyang / /dri med rin chen 'od du gnas pa las/ /khams gsum kun tu 'khor los bsgyur bar yang / /mtshan
rab yongs kyis brgyan byon gdon mi 'tshal/ /bdag gis g.yar lam mthong ba dgung zhig la/ /chos bzang sprin 'od byang chub snying po yi/ /shing dbang drung na de bzhin gshegs
pa bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas sras mang du mas mdun du bdar/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po sku mchog nyi ma de/ /dzam+bu chu klung rin chen 'tsher ba 'dra/ /g.yar lam mthong bar phyag gis
bdag mgo byugs/ /de nas sad nas glo ba rab tu dga'/ /dga' ba'i 'od ces bgyi ba rnam dag lus/ /sngon chad gnyen bshes gyur pa'i lha mo yis/ /bdag la bstan pa bde
gshegs de nyid ni/ /snying po yang dag byang chub yongs la zhugs/ /sngon yang gzhon nu gzi brjid khyod blta zhes/ /bdag gi sems bskyed de ltar bsam par gyur/ /mdang sum
dgung la lha mo dge ba yis/ /gzhon nu de ni mthong bar 'gyur zhes bstan/ /bdag gis bde gshegs g.yar lam rmis pas mthong / /yongs su dag pa'i sems can khyod kyang
mthong / /yid bzhin bsam 'grub khyod dang bdag bcas pas/ /de ring rgyal ba de la mchod par bgyi/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi
ma dam pa'i mtshan thos te/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i skabs byung nas dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs chen po skyes te bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la nor bu rin po
che lnga brgyas mngon par gtor nas gtsug gi rin po che dpal gyi 'od 'bar ba zhes bya ba'ang de la byin no/ /me'i mdog ltar 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dam pas brgyan pa'i gos rin po
ches kyang de bkab bo/ /de de ltar rim gro byas kyang dga' bar gyur pa'am/ nyams bde bar gyur pa lta bu'ang med la/ dga' ba dang mos par ma gyur gyi/ gzhan du na thal mo sbyar cing mig
mi 'gebs par gzhon nu gzi brjid bdag gi gdong la lta zhing gnas par gyur to/ /de nas sprul tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su
bcad de smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni khyod gsal bgyi snyam nas/ /yun ring snga nas bdag gis bsam bsam ste/ /gzugs mdzes de yang de ring khyod la phul/ /bsod nams legs brgyan
yon tan rab dang ldan/ /tshul khrims blo dang yon tan gzhan gyis kyang / /bu mo dam pa 'di dang 'dra ba ni/ /mi yi 'jig rten gang na'ang ma mchis te/ /'jig rten
kun gyi bud med nang na mchog /pad+mo'i sbubs nas skyes pas rigs smos su/ /skyon gyi dri mas ma gos 'thad ma lags/ /ma lus skyon gyis ma gos sems dang ldan/ /rtag par
khyod kyi spyod tshul mthun par 'gyur/ /reg na bde la kun nas 'phags pas na/ /'di yi lus ni shin tu 'jam pa ste/ /bro 'tshal nad pa gang la reg gyur kyang / /de yi mod la bro dang bral
bar 'gyur/ /'di yi lus las spos kyi ngad 'byung ba/ /spos mchog gzhan rnams mngon par zil gyis gnon/ /de yi dri zhim tshor na rnam dag pa'i/ /tshul khrims gnas par
mi rnams kun kyang 'gyur/ /'di yi lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ste/ /pad+mo'i mchog ltar rnam par rab tu gsal/ /khros pas bltas na byams pa'i sems ldan par/ /
sems can ma lus kun kyang rab tu 'gyur/ /'di yi tshig snyan yid du 'ong ba ste/ /nyams su bde bas 'gro ba nyan par dga'/ /thos na de rgyus skyon gyi mun pa dang / /mi dge'i sug
las bgyid par mos mi 'gyur/ /'di ni bsam bdag yid la dri med de/ /'di la kun tu g.yo dang sgyu ma mchis/ /ci smra de dag yid la'ang de bzhin te/ /tshig dbyangs des ni 'gro
ba tshim par bgyid/ /sgyu yis sems can 'drid par mi bgyid de/ /nor gyi don du 'gro ba yongs mi slu/ /yid bsdams khrel gyis 'dzem dang ldan pa ste/ /rgan nam gzhon la'ang rtag tu sri
zhu spyod| |rigs rgyud gzugs kyis dregs pa ma mchis te/ /'di ni 'khor gyis dregs pa'ang yongs ma mchis/ /nga rgyal rlom sems yongs dang bral ba ste/ /'gro ba rnams la rtag
tu gus par 'dud/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang / bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dang / 'khor thams
cad dang bcas par bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo nas 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba de nas byung ste snying po byang chub chos kyis 'phags pa'i 'od gang na ba der bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa gang na ba der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur
ba'i phyir dong ste/ de rta babs sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas babs te rkang pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i drung du song ngo / /de nas rgyal po gzhon nu gzi
brjid kyi bdag pos rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs
zhi ba| dbang po bsdams pa/ glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dwangs shing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal ba mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas de'i
sems mngon par mos par gyur to/ /de ltar sems mngon par mos par gyur nas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dga' ba dang / mos pa'i shugs chen po rnam par spel te dga'
ba dang / mos pa dang / spro ba chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas bu mo dga' ba'i
'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la sogs pa 'khor thams cad dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te rin po che dam pa'i pad+mo stong phrag lnga
brgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mngon par gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug lag khang lnga brgya nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po spos sna tshogs las byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal
po sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa lnga brgya brtsigs so/ /gtsug lag khang re re zhing yang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po stong phrag lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan de bzhin
de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pas gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas mdo sde sgo kun tu lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan to/ /des
de thos nas chos thams cad kyi tshul la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho phrag bcu thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/ /dus gsum snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du gyur par
'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/ /sems can 'byams klas pa thams cad rab tu snang bar bya ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/ /
'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/ /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa snang ba'i
sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i ye shes kyi sprin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/ /'gro ba thams cad
yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la mngon du gyur pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i
sgra rnams dmigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa'i smon lam gyi sprin ces bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa chos kyi tshul thams cad la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho phrag
bcu rab tu thob par gyur to/ /bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas kyang ye shes thub par dka' ba rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sems nges par gzhag pa rab
tu thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas bu mo dga' ba'i 'od
kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa dang / 'khor thams cad dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal gang na ba dang / rgyal
po yab nor gyi bdag po gang na ba der dong ste drung du phyin nas rgyal po yab nor gyi bdag po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te don 'di brjod do/ /lha'i zhal snga nas mkhyen par
mdzad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku nyi ma dam pa zhes bgyi ba/ mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
pa| 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ khyod kyi khams 'di de nyid kyi snying
po byang chub chos kyi sprin shin tu stug po'i 'od na rnam par spyod de/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lags so/ /de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos gzhon nu gzi
brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu khyod la don 'di lha'am/ mi'am/ su zhig gis sbran/ des smras pa/ bdag la bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas
sbran to| |de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos sangs rgyas byung bar thos nas sangs rgyas skye ba la ni/ gter rab tu thob pa tsam du sems/ sangs rgyas rin po che dang phrad par ni/
dga' bar sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas ni/ ngan song gi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par ldog par sems/ nyon mongs pa'i nad chen po rab tu zhi
bar bya ba la ni/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po dang phrad pa tsam du sems/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las ni/ yongs su 'grel ba yin par sems/ shin tu bde zhing ldan
pa la ni| rab tu gzhog par sems/ rab rib med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba ni/ yang dag par ston par sems/ ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba la ni/ sgron ma chen po byung ba tsam
du sems/ 'jig rten mgon med pa las ni/ chos kyi tshul gyi mgon dang phrad par sems/ 'jig rten 'dren pa med pa las ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi theg pas 'dren pa skyes par sems shing / sangs rgyas byung bar thos pas mos pa dang / spro ba chen po skyes nas rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / ljongs kyi mi dang / yul mi
dang / blon po dang / zham ring ba dang / gzhon nu dang / rgyal phran dang / khams kyi bdag po dang / 'khor thams cad kyang kun nas bsdus nas sangs rgyas byung bar sgra snyan pa sgrog pa'i
gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la rgyal po'i srid de yang chos kyi dga' bar byin no/ /de ltar gzhon nu de rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas srog chags stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig tu
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa gang na ba der song ste spyan sngar phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar rang gi 'khor dang bcas te 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa sku nyi ma dam pas rgyal po nor gyi bdag po dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la gzigs nas de'i tshe mdzod spu nas 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi sgron ma zhes
bya ba rab tu bkye'o/ /de phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad mngon sum du bkod nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi
khyab pa yongs su bstan to/ /sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyangs nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs bsam
gyis mi khyab pa'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi sku 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pas
gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas par yang dag par bstan to/ /de nas
rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos gzungs kyi sgo de thos nas chos thams cad la chos kyi snang ba chen po skyes par gyur to/ /'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed kyis kyang chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma'i gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to/ /khrag khrig drug cus ni/ nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par
grol lo| |srog chags stong phrag bcus ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sems can grangs med pa zhig gis ni/ sngon
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yongs su bskyed do/ /phyogs bcur yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis
mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa des sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis dul bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag po chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa
de'i yid la 'di snyam ste/ khyim na gnas pas ni/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyang khong du chud par mi nus la/ ye shes rnam pa 'di lta bu yang sgrub par mi nus kyi/ bdag ni/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du rab tu 'byung ngo / /snyam nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag bcom
ldan 'das kyi zham ring du rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi tshul la mchis par ci gnang zhes nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/
de'i dus la bab par shes na rung ngo / /de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag po srog chags stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zham ring du rab tu
byung ngo / /de ltar rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas par yongs su bsgrubs so/ /
bsgoms so/ /shin tu bsgoms so/ /de snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo yang rab tu thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu yang rab tu thob bo/ /tha dad pa yang dag par
shes pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la'ang yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'gro bar thogs pa med pa'i spyod yul zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su
dag pa yang rab tu thob ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blangs so/ /yongs su bzung ngo / /gtam gyi skyes bu yang byas so/ /chos smra ba chen po
yang byas so/ /bstan pa yongs su bzung ba yang byas so/ /mngon par shes pa thob pa'i stobs kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste bsam pa ji lta ba
bzhin du sems can rnams la lus yongs su bstan nas sangs rgyas byung ba de rab tu brjod pa dang / sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrubs pa'i chos nyid mngon
par brjod pa dang / sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu de dag yongs su brjod par bya bas bstan pa yongs
su bzung pa byas so/ /rgyal po'i sras gzi brjid kyi bdag pos kyang de'i nyin par zla ba nya ste rgyas pa'i tshe rin po che bdun rab tu thob par gyur te/ de khang pa'i steng na bud med kyi tshogs
kyis bskor cing 'dug ba'i mdun du 'khor lo rin po che chen po shugs la thogs pa med pa zhes bya brtsibs stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa/ rin po che thams
cad kyis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi dzam+bu chu klung gi gser las grub pa/ 'od kun tu 'byung ba/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa byung bar gyur to/ /glang po rin po che sna
chen po rdo rje rin po che'i ri'i gzi brjid ces bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /rta rin po che ri sngo rlung gi shugs zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /nor bu rin po che chen po nyi ma'i snying po 'od sprin
rgyal po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa de yang bud med rin po cher byung bar gyur to/ /khyim bdag rin po che nor gyi phung po mang po zhes bya
bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /blon po rin po che mig dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yang byung bar gyur te/ de ltar bdun no/ /de de ltar rin po che bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba/
gling bzhi la dbang ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ yul gyi mthu dang brtson 'grus su ldan par gyur to/ /de la bu dpa' ba rtul phod cing
yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yod par gyur te/ des sa chen po 'di skyon med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'tshe ba
med pa dang / skyid pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / mdangs dga' ba dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos yongs su gang ba yang ri dang rgya mtsho'i mthas klas par
chos kyis mngon par rgyal te gnas par byas so/ /des 'dzam bu'i gling de'i rgyal po'i gnas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag tu yang rgyal po'i gnas re rer gtsug lag khang lnga brgya lnga
brgya byed du btsud de/ thams cad kyang rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag go /longs spyod dang yo byad kyi rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go /bza' shing
gi ra ba dang / khang pa dang / 'chags dang / dus thams cad du bde bar spyad pa'i nags tshal gyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa sha stag go /gtsug lag khang re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mchod rten brtsigs pa ni/ lhun gyi rgya shin tu che bar byas pa ste/ nang rin po che rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa sha stag ste/ rgyal
po'i gnas de thams cad du'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa 'khor dang bcas pa grong khyer du gshegs par bya ba'i phyir spyan drangs so/ /rgyal po'i gnas de
dag kun tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pas mchod de/ sangs rgyas grong khyer du gshegs pa'i cho
'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pas sems can tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir gshegs su gsol to/ /der yang sems can
ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni/ dad pa thob par gyur to/ /dad pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams ni/ sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel
bar gyur to/ /dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i sems can rnams ni/ byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par
dag pa'i sems can rnams ni/ snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par gyur to/ /sems can la phan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
yongs su btsal ba la brtson par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams ni/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par khong du chud par
bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/ /chos mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir sems mngon par
gzhol bar gyur to/ /dus gsum gyi ye shes snang ba thob pa'i sems can rnams ni/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i don du ye shes
snang ba la zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par bya ba la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i don du sems
mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la brtson pa'i sems can rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam bskyed
par gyur to/ /lam gyi mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir ye shes snang ba
bskyed par gyur to/ /chos rgya mtsho rnam par dbye ba la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams ni/ zhing gi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i don du sems mngon
