la rnam par spyod pa/ gang de dag sangs rgyas gcig dang sangs rgyas thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad dang sangs rgyas gcig tu mi gnas la rnam par spyod pa/
gang de dag dus thams cad la skad cig gcig gis 'jug pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/ gang de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis zhing thams
cad du 'gro ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/ gang de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan snang ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/ gang de dag
'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems kyi gnas la rnam par spyod pa/ gang de dag thob par bya ba thams cad rang la rag las pa'i gnas la rnam
par spyod pa de dag gi gnas so/ /'di ni/ gang de dag 'jig rten gyi gnas thams cad las gyen du 'phags kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya
ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas na snang ba dang / gang de dag zhing thams cad la mi gnas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir zhing
thams cad du rjes su spyod pa dang / gang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhing thams cad du rjes su spyod kyang gnas nas
g.yo ba med pa dang / gang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su mngon par zhen pa dang bral ba dang /
gang de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la brten pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang 'gro ba thams cad na de'i ye shes la mnyam zhing 'dra ba med pa dang / gang de
dag bdud kyi gnas thams cad na spyod kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi dga' ba dang bral ba dang / gang de dag 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i gnas thams cad la rnam par spyod kyang
'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba'i yid dang ldan pa dang / gang de dag 'gro ba thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan yang bdag dang sems can du gnyis
su bya bar mi spyod pa dang / gang de dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khong du chud pa'i lus dang ldan yang chos kyi dbyings tha dad du bya ba'i gnas la rnam par mi
spyod pa dang / gang de dag ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan yang bskal pa ring pa dang thung ba'i 'du shes kyi rnam pas rnam
par mi spyod pa dang / gang de dag skra'i rtse mo gcig nas mi g.yo yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba de lta bur sgrub dka' ba'i chos kyi phyogs la 'jug par
rnam par spyod pa de dag gi gnas so/ /'di ni/ zab mo'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/ mi gnyis pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'i gnas la
rnam par spyod pa/ gnyen po med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/ mi dmigs pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/ spros pa med pa'i gnas la
rnam par spyod pa/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chud par dka' ba'i gnas la
rnam par spyod pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i gnas la
rnam par spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas dang mthun pa'i
gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so/ /gang de mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med par mi 'jug pa
dang / gang de dag chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang mi skye ba'i chos nyid du mi ltung ba dang / gang de dag mi sdug pa'i gnas la rnam par
spyod kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid mngon du mi byed do/ 'dod chags kyi chos dang yang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang / gang de dag byams pa'i gnas la
rnam par spyod kyang zhe sdang gi dri ma'i rjes su stong ba'i sems med pa dang / gang de dag rten cing 'brel pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang chos thams cad la shin tu rmongs
pa med pa dang / gang de dag bsam gtan bzhi'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye ba dang / gang de dag tshad med pa bzhi'i gnas la rnam
par spyod kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du gzugs kyi khams kyi lam gyi rgyud du mi 'dong ba dang / gang de dag gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
bzhi'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pas gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lam gyi rgyud du mi 'dong ba dang / gang de dag zhi gnas dang lhag
mthong gi gnas la rnam par spyod kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdag gis rig pa'i rnam par grol ba mngon du mi byed pa dang / gang de dag btang
snyoms chen po'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su mi gtong ba dang / gang de dag stong pa nyid kyi gnas la rnam par spyod kyang lta ba'i rnam
pa la mi gnas pa dang / gang de dag mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan yang mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems can rnam par gdul ba la brtson pa dang / gang de
dag smon lam thams cad dang bral ba yin yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / gang de dag las dang nyon mongs
pa thams cad la dbang bsgyur yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du las dang nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'brang bar snang ba dang / gang de dag shi 'pho dang skye ba
yongs su shes kyang tshe'i shi 'pho dang skye ba yongs su ston pa dang / gang de dag 'gro ba thams cad las rnam par log kyang sems can gdul ba'i dbang gis 'gro ba thams
cad du 'dong ba dang / gang de dag byams pa la rnam par spyod kyang gang la yang chags par rnam par spyod pa med pa dang / gang de dag snying rje la rnam par spyod kyang gang
la yang chags par lta bas rnam par spyod pa ma yin pa dang / gang de dag dga' ba la rnam par spyod kyang sems can sdug bsngal ba la rnam par lta bas rtag tu mi
dga' ba dang / gang de dag btang snyoms la rnam par spyod kyang gzhan gyi don la rtag tu 'bad pa dang / gang de dag mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la
rnam par spyod kyang 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba la mi smod pa dang / gang de dag skye ba thams cad la mi gnas par rnam par spyod kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya ba
la rnam par mi spyod pa dang / gang de dag rnam par thar pa gsum la rnam par spyod kyang nyan thos kyi rnam par thar pa thob par bya ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang / gang de dag 'phags pa'i
bden pa bzhi rnam par blta ba la rnam par spyod kyang 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir rnam par mi spyod pa dang / gang de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo brtag pa la rnam par spyod
kyang shin tu 'gog par ltung ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang / gang de dag 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad sgom pa la rnam par spyod kyang shin tu 'byung ba la rnam par mi
spyod pa dang / gang de dag so so'i skye bo'i sa las shin tu 'das par rnam par spyod kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang / gang de dag nye bar
len pa'i phung po lnga yongs su shes pa la rnam par spyod kyang phung po shin tu 'gog par ltung ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang / gang de dag bdud kyi lam bzhi las shin tu 'das par
rnam par spyod kyang bdud du rtog pa la rnam par mi spyod pa dang / gang de dag skye mched drug las shin tu 'das par rnam par spyod kyang shin tu mngon par grub pa la rnam par mi
spyod pa dang / gang de dag de bzhin nyid la rnam par spyod kyang yang dag pa'i mthar ltung ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang / gang de dag theg pa thams cad kyi 'byung ba yongs su
ston pa la rnam par spyod kyang theg pa chen po las nyams pa la rnam par mi spyod pa de dag de lta bur yon tan gyi gnas thams cad la rnam par spyod pa
rnams kyi gnas so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'di la thugs rje chen po brnyes pas rnam dag pa/ /byams pa
shes gnyen dpal chen 'jig rten phan brtson pa/ /dbang bskur sa gnas rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo ste/ /sangs rgyas yul la rjes su dgongs shing rnam par spyod/ /rgyal
ba'i sras po grags pa chen po mnga' ba rnams/ /ye shes chen po'i spyod yul rnam thar bzhugs pa dag/ gang rnams chos dbyings kun tu thogs med rnam rgyu ba/ /dpe zla
med pa de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra yin/ /dul sbyin tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus stobs kyis 'phags/ /bsam gtan mngon shes stobs kyi mthar phyin shes rtogs
pas| |shes rab thabs dang smon lam stobs la gnas pa rnams/ /theg chen pha rol phyin pa rnams kyi gnas 'di yin/ /'di ni chags med blo gros bsam pa rgya chen te//
nam mkha'i spyod yul ldan pa mi gnas mi rten pa/ /dus gsum thams cad rgyas 'gengs bsgribs pa med pa rnams/ /srid kun dngos po rnam par bsgoms pa rnams
kyi gnas/ /gang rnams chos kun mi skye'i tshul la zhugs pa rnams/ /chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i dngos nyid rtogs mdzad la/ /ci la'ang gnas pa mi mdzad nam mkha'i bya bzhin
te| |mkhyen pas bsnyengs pa mi mnga' de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rang bzhin dngos/ /rtog pa'i rgyus bskyed phyin ci log las byung mkhyen
nas| |'dod chags bral ba'ang rnam par rtog par mi mdzad pa/ /zhi dang nye bar zhi ldan de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams rnam par thar dang bden tshul 'phags lam dang //
phung po de bzhin khams dang skye mched rten pa'i dngos/ /yongs su rtogs mdzad mkhas pa zhi bar mi ltung ba/ /shes rab thabs la mkhas pa de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams
sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes phyogs bzhugs shing / /rgyal ba'i zhing la yongs rtog rnam rtog kun zhi la/ /chos rnams dngos po'i rang bzhin med par rtogs mdzad pa/ /zhi bar gzhol
ba de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/ /gang rnams chags med spyod pas chos dbyings 'di dag tu/ /dngos dang bral bar rnam spyod mkha' yi rlung 'dra ba/ /dngos po kun dang bral zhing
dngos med rnam spyod pa/ /mi gnas blo mnga' de dag gnas ni 'di yang 'dra/ /gang rnams ngan song rgyud du 'gro ba song gyur te/ /sdug bsngal nad pa mi bde nyams su myong
gzigs shing / /byams pa'i 'od kyis ngan song thams cad zhi mdzad pa/ /byams dang thugs rje'i thugs mnga' de dag gnas 'di yin/ /nyam nga'i 'khor
na gnas shing 'phags lam gol gyur te/ /'gron po dmus long dmigs dang bral bar gyur 'dra ba'i/ /'jig rten gzigs shing bar lam rab la 'god mdzad pa/ /'gron
po'i bsel rab 'dra ba de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams skye dang mya ngan rga shi dbang gyur pa'i/ /'gro ba bdud kyi zhags pas yongs su bcings gzigs shing / /rnam
par bkrol nas mi 'jigs phyogs bder 'don mdzad pa/ /dpa' bo de dag thub par dka' ba'i gnas 'di yin/ /nyon mongs nad pa'i 'gro mang gang gis gzigs gyur
cing | |ye shes bdud rtsi sman chen yongs su bsdu mdzad nas/ /thugs rje chen po bskyed cing yongs su 'grol mdzad pa/ /sman pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dra ba'i gnas 'di
yin| |gang gis 'gro mang sdug bsngal mgon med gyur pa rnams/ /nyon mongs gtos su lhung ste tsham gyi mtshor lhung ba/ /gzigs shing dge ba'i chos kyi gru chen yongs
sbyar te/ /sgrol mdzad mnyan pa'i bu 'dra de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang gis nyon mongs rgya mtsho spyod pa'i 'gro gzigs shing / /thams cad mkhyen thugs rin chen
dgongs dag sems can mchog /srid pa'i rgya mtshor gshegs shing mngon par 'dren mdzad pa/ /mnyan pa'i bu ltar spyod pa de dag gnas 'di yin/ /smon lam gnas na bzhugs
shing thugs rje byams spyan gyis/ /gang rnams sems can gnas su rnam par gzigs mdzad cing / /srid pa'i rgya mtsho gnas pa'i 'gro mang mngon 'don pa/ /mkha' lding
gzhon 'dra de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/ /gang rnams chos dbyings mkha' la nyi zla 'dra tshul du/ /sems can gnas su 'od kyis khyab par rnam spyod pa/ /smon lam dkyil
'khor ye shes dri med bzang po'i 'od/ /'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams sems can gcig ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /phyi mtha'i
bskal pa bye ba zad du brtan gnas la/ /sems can gcig la ji bzhin de bzhin 'gro ba kun/ /'jig rten mgon du gyur pa de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams 'byams
klas zhing gcig mtha' yi bskal par yang / /'gro don brtson 'grus skyo med spyod pa rnam spyod pa/ /zhing gcig ji bzhin de bzhin phyogs rnams kun tu ste/ /bsam pa
rdo rje bzhin brtan de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs rnams kyi chos sprin la/ /stan gcig gnas bzhin rmongs pa med pa 'thung byed
kyang / /phyi mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig bgrangs par mi ngoms sems/ /blo chen rgya mtsho lta bu'i gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/ /gang rnams zhing mang rgya mtsho
brjod du med 'dod zhing / /mgon po'i 'khor rnams rgya mtshor yongs su 'jug byed la/ /rgyal ba'i mchod pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho rab byed pa/ /chags med spyod yul
mnga' ba de dag gnas 'di yin/ /brtan pa grangs rnams smon lam rgya mtshor 'jug byed cing / /spyod pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med zhugs gyur te/ /'gro la phan
phyir bskal pa rgya mtsho mang spyod pa/ /yon tan 'byung gnas de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/ /gang rnams skra rtsa gcig tu zhing rnams thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas
thams cad bskal pa mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /'dzud cing de yi tshul la 'jug kyang rmongs med pa/ /chags pa med pa'i mig can rnams kyi gnas 'di yin/ /gang
rnams sems kyi skad cig gcig la rgya mtsho yi/ /bskal pa 'dzud byed zhing dang sangs rgyas 'gro ba rnams/ /de bzhin 'dzud byed bsgribs med ye shes dran gnas
pa| |yon tan mthar phyin de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/ /gang rnams zhing mang thams cad rdul du bgrangs byas shing / /chu ba ma lus thams cad thigs pas tshad bzung
ste| |de snyed grangs su smon lam mngon par sgrub byed pa/ /chags med bgrang ba de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra 'o/ /smon lam gzungs dang ting 'dzin sgo la 'jug bya ba/ /bsam
gtan rnam thar smon lam sgo rnams de bzhin te/ /bskal pa mtha' yas mngon par sgrub cing rnam spyod pa/ /bde gshegs sras po dgongs ldan de dag 'dir 'dong ngo / /'di
na gnas pa rgyal sras rnam pa sna tshogs te/ /tshig dang don ldan gtsug lag mang po mngon par sgrub/ /'gro la bder 'gyur bzo yi gnas su bya ba dag /rjes su bsam shing
dam pa'i gnas na rnam par spyod/ /'di na gnas pa mngon shes thabs dang ye shes kyis/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can 'gro rgyud sna tshogs ji snyed pa/ /kun tu skye zhing 'chi
ba'i khyad par rnam par ston/ /rnam thar sgyu ma'i tshul gnas chags med spyod dang ldan/ /'di na gnas pa thog mar sems bskyed nyer bzung zhing / /chos bzang mthar thug
chos kyi spyod pa yongs su ston/ /sprul pa'i sprin gyis chos dbyings yongs su rgyas bkang zhing / /de bzhin rnam 'phrul brgya mang kun kyang nye bar ston/ /gang rnams sems
kyi cha gcig byang chub rnam sangs rgyas/ /ye shes blo gros mtha' dang dbus med la 'jug pa/ /thos te rnam par bsam na 'jig rten rmongs su rung / /thub par dka'
ba de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/ /'di ni chags med blo gros rnams/ /chos dbyings bsgribs pa med pa rnam par spyod byed pa/ /dmigs pa med pa'i
spyod yul can/ /dri med bsam pa'i blo gros gnas yin no/ /gang rnams chags pa med spyod cing / /zhing rnams kun tu gnas pa med par rnam spyod pa/ /mi gnyis
shes la spyod pa yi/ /mnyam pa med pa de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang / /mnyam pa'i chos rnams gnas med zhi ba rtogs gyur te/ /
gang rnams mkha' yul rnam spyod pa/ /rdul dang bral ba de dag gnas 'di yin/ /'di ni snying rje'i sems ldan pa/ /gnas shing 'gro ba sdug bsngal gzir ba mthong
gyur nas/ /'jig rten phan par bsam brtson te/ /snying rje chen po brnyes pa rnam par spyod/ /'di nas mi snang med gsal bar/ /sems can kun gyi gnas su thogs
pa med par snang / /nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /'khor ba'i zhags pa kun las rnam par grol/ /rgyal sras de dag 'di na gnas/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi zhabs
drung thams cad kun na yang / /zhing rnams kun tu rab tu snang / /mtha' yas bskal pa rnams kyang zad par mdzad/ /'di nas 'gro ba'i lus mnyam dang / /rgyal
sras kun gyi lus dang grangs mang mnyam pa yi/ /sprul pa'i sprin gyis phyogs kyi rnams/ /ma lus thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par mdzad/ /'di na bzhugs pa'i dpa'
bo rnams/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul thams cad yongs su 'jal byed cing / /bskal pa bye bar rnam spyod kyang / /yongs su ngoms par 'gyur ba'i dus med do/ /'di ni ting
'dzin bye ba rnams/ /brjod du med pa skad cig re rer rtogs byas shing / /ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas yul rnams rnam par ston pa mdzad/ /'dir ni skad cig
brjod med pa'i/ /bskal pa zhing rnams sangs rgyas mtshan la rab zhugs te/ /shin tu yangs pa'i blo ldan pa/ /bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i mthar yang 'byin/ /'di na
gnas shing tshad med pa'i/ /bskal par sems rgyud gcig gis rab tu 'jig pa byed/ /yongs rtog 'du shes med bral yang / /'gro ba'i 'du shes dbang du ston pa
byed| |de dag ting 'dzin 'di gnas su/ /zhugs kyang dus gsum thams cad gsal bar mngon du mthong / /skad gcig yud la gnas brten cing / /rnam thar gnas
la rnam par spyod pa mdzad/ /de dag rnam spyod gnas 'di na/ /ma g.yos lus kyis skyil mo krung du 'khod bzhin du/ /zhing rnams thams cad kun tu yang / /thams
cad khyab par gcig car yongs su snang / /khyu mchog de dag 'di na gnas/ /bde gshegs rnams las chos kyi rgya mtsho yang dag 'thung / /
ye shes rgya mtshor rab tu zhugs/ /mi zad yon tan rnams kyi pha rol phyin/ /'di na zhing rnams kun grangs dang / /bskal pa'i grangs dang de bzhin chos kyi grangs
rnams dang / /rgyal ba kun gyi mtshan gyi grangs/ /sgrib med sems pa rnam par dgongs pa mdzad/ /rgyal sras de dag 'di na gnas/ /dus gsum zhing mang
bgrangs pa thams cad ma lus par/ /de dag skad cig gcig gis kyang / /yongs su 'byung dang 'jig pa rnam par 'byed/ /rgyal sras de dag 'di na gnas/ /
rgyal ba'i spyod pa smon lam 'gro ba'i dbang po rnams/ /gnas na rnam par spyod byed kyang / /rgyal sras blo la thogs pa med pas mthong / /rdul phran gcig
la gang yod pa'i/ /'khor rnams rgya mtsho zhing mang sems can de bzhin du/ /bskal pa rdul phran kun mnyam pa/ /sgrib pa med par mthong ba rnams kyis
mthong / /rdul phran kun rtser de bzhin du/ /'khor dang zhing dang bskal pa thams cad ma lus par/ /kun kyang gzugs brnyan thabs tshul du/ /shin tu
rnam phye yongs su mthong ba yin/ /'di nas de dag chos rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin zhing rnams kun dang dus dang bskal pa dang / /yang dag sangs rgyas de bzhin te/ /rang bzhin
dngos bral 'byung ba'i tshul gyis mkhyen/ /'di nas sems can mnyam nyid dang / /chos rnams mnyam pa nyid dang sangs rgyas mnyam nyid dang / /zhing dang smon lam mnyam
pa nyid| |dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la'ang de bzhin 'jug /sems can khrag khrig rnam par 'dul/ /sangs rgyas khrag khrig rnams kyang de bzhin gzhan mchod byed/ /
gzhan rnams chos la rnam par rtog /'on kyang brtan pa gnas mchog 'di na 'khod/ /bskal pa khrag khrig mang pos kyang / /de dag smon lam ye shes yul blo'i
rnam pa dag /bdag gis brjod par mi nus te/ /mtha' yas blo mnga' rnams kyi shin tu yang / /de dag smad pa mi mnga' ba/ /bsgribs med spyod yul rab la shin
tu dgyes pa yi/ /pho brang 'di la thal sbyar te/ /bdag kyang lus btud gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po'i sras kyi thu bo ste/ /bsgribs med spyod pa mnga' ba 'phags
pa byams pa de/ /rnam dag blo mnga' dpe med la/ /de yi rjes su bsam ste phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis khang pa brtsegs pa chen po
rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa gzhan tshad med pa dag
gis kyang mngon par bstod de/ shin tu btud nas phyag 'tshal te rab tu gus par bltas nas rim gror byas te mngon tu byas nas mchod de khang pa brtsegs pa chen po
rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i sgo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la blta bar ni/ mos/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang phrad par ni/ dga' zhing sdod sdod pa las/ des byang chub sems dpa' byams pa khang pa brtsegs pa de'i phyi rol gyi phyogs
gzhan zhig nas srog chags brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang /
lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po du mas mdun du byas te g.yas g.yon nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po rnams kyis phyag bya zhing / yul de na
gnas pa gnyen bshes su 'ong ba'i bram ze brgya stong mang pos bskor cing mdun du byas te/ khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i
snying po logs su 'ongs pa mthong nas dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa gang na ba de logs su
mngon du bltas te thag ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas tshong dpon
gyi bu nor bzang la bltas te 'khor kun la lag pa g.yas pas bstan nas yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bsngags te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ltos shig bsam
pa yongs su dag pa 'di/ /nor bzang nor rnams rab tu brtan pa'i bu/ /byang chub spyod pa dam pa yongs tshol zhing / /mkhas pa nga yi drung du nye bar 'ongs/ /legs par 'ongs
sam snying rje byams byung khyod/ /byams pa'i dkyil 'khor yangs par legs 'ongs sam/ /legs par 'ongs sam blta na rab zhi ba/ /spyad pa spyod tshe dub par ma gyur tam//
rnam dag bsam ldan tshur shog 'ongs pa legs/ /skyo med yid ldan tshur shog 'ongs pa legs/ /dbang po ma zhum tshur shog 'ongs pa legs/ /mkhas pa spyod tshe dub
pa med grang ngo / /chos rnams thams cad rnam dbye'i don byung ba/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam 'dul rab brtson pa/ /bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur rab
zhugs pa/ /brtul zhugs mi g.yo brtan pa khyed 'ongs legs/ /dge ba'i lam gyis 'ongs pa bder 'ongs sam/ /yon tan lam la gnas pa bder
'ongs sam/ /rgyal ba'i lam du zhugs pa bder 'ongs sam/ /lam rnams gang du'ang ngal bar ma gyur tam/ /yon tan rang bzhin tshur shog bder 'ongs sam/ /dge
bas mngon brlan tshur shog bder 'ongs sam/ /mtha' yas spyod yul legs par bder 'ongs sam/ /'gro ba kun na khyod mthong shin tu dkon/ /thob dang ma thob
mnyam pa'i yid ldan pa/ /smad dang sdug bsngal ma grags rnam par spangs/ /'jig rten chos la ut+pal pad+mo bzhin/ /yid la 'khrul med legs par bder
'ongs sam/ /g.yo dang sgyu bral bsam pa dge ldan pa/ /nga rgyal dregs med snod kyi dam pa po/ /khro dang 'tshig med khengs shing 'gying pa med/ /blta na sdug pa
khyod mthong legs pa yin/ /tshur shog phyogs kun spyod yul mngon gyur pa/ /tshur shog rgyal ba'i mdzod rnams sgrub byed pa/ /tshur shog rgyal ba'i mdzod rnams
'phel byed pa/ /yid la dub med legs par khyod 'ongs sam/ /tshur shog dus gsum yul ldan 'ongs pa legs/ /chos kyi dbyings la mos pa'i dkyil 'khor
ldan| |sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan snying por byung / /mkhas pa legs par 'ongs sam mi ngal lam/ /tshur shog 'jam dpal ye shes pad+mo'i mchog /tshur shog sprin dpal
char pas rnam spel ba/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyis btang ba tshur/ /khyod la bsgribs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan/ /ltos shig smon lam dra ba ci 'dra ba/ /chos dbyings rgyas
'gengs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lam bsgrubs pa/ /rgya che yang byed nor bzang 'dir 'ongs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshol byed
cing / /rdul dang bral ba'i spyod pa 'gro ba'i phyir/ /smon lam rlabs chen yongs su 'dri byed cing / /skyo ba'i yid med 'di ni 'dir 'ongs so/ /'das pa'i mgon pos gang la bslabs
mdzad de/ /de bzhin ma byon rnams kyang slob 'gyur la/ /bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i spyad par bya ba rnams/ /yongs su dri phyir 'di ni 'dir 'ongs so/ /'di ni bdag gi dge
bshes chos smra ba/ /chos kun nan tan yongs su ston byed pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod lam yongs ston pa/ /yin zhes sems gcig bsam nas 'dir 'ongs so/ /byang chub
sems dpa' bdag gi blo skye ba/ /sangs rgyas sras po byang chub skyed byed pa/ /'di dag bdag bshes sangs rgyas bsngags pa zhes/ /de ltar dge ba'i sems kyis 'dir 'ongs so/ /
'di dag skyed pas bdag gi ma lta bu/ /yon tan 'o ma ldud pas ma ma 'dra/ /byang chub yan lag yongs su skyong ba yin/ /dge bshes 'di dag gnod pa
rnam par zlog /rga shi thar byed sman pa lta bu ste/ /bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs brgya byin lha dbang 'dra/ /zla ba lta bur dkar po'i phyogs kyis rgyas/ /zhi ba'i phyogs ston nyi ma gsal
ba 'dra| |dgra dang grogs la ri bo 'dra ba ste/ /rgya mtsho bzhin du mi 'khrug sems dang ldan/ /yongs su skyong dang mnyan pa 'dra ba zhes/ /de 'dra'i sems kyis nor bzang
'dir 'ongs so/ /'jigs med skyob pas dpa' bo lta bu ste/ /ded dpon mgon dang skyabs su gyur pa yin/ /'di dag bdag la bde stob mig yin zhes/ /de 'dra'i
sems kyis dge bshes bsnyen bkur byed/ /chos kyi phyogs rnams rtag tu ston pa ste/ /sangs rgyas yon tan ye shes ston pa yin/ /ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad
sbyong bar byed/ /dge bshes 'di dag bdag la dge ba ston/ /'di dag rgyal ba'i mdzod kun stob pa yin/ /'di dag rgyal ba kun gyi mdzod srung ste/ /'di dag
rgyal ba kun gyi gsang 'dzin ces/ /de ltar mkhas pa 'di ni dge bshes bsnyen/ /ye shes phun ldan 'di las rnam par dag /gzugs dang longs spyod tshe rigs
phun sum tshogs/ /'di las phun sum tshogs kun dkon pa min/ /bsam pa de 'dras 'di ni 'dir 'ongs so/ /bsam pa rlabs chen 'di la kun kyang ltos/ /mkhas pa'i dge
bshes rnams la 'di sten cing / /mkhas pa 'di blo ci 'dra skyed pa ltos/ /khyod kyis rtag tu de ltar bslab par bya/ /'di ni sngon gyi bsod nams dge ba'i rgyus/ /byang chub zhugs
te 'jam dpal mthong gyur nas/ /de yi gdams ngag rjes su mthun spyod cing / /skyo ba med par rgyu ba 'di la ltos/ /'dis ni dga' ba de thams cad kun spangs te/ /lha rdzas lta bu'i
khyim yang yongs su spangs/ /pha ma ma ma skyid pa rgya chen kun/ /yongs su spangs shing bran ltar bshes gnyen sten/ /mkhas pa 'dis ni bsam pa rnam sbyangs te/ /bdag gis mi
lus yongs su spangs byas nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi pho brang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de phyir 'bras bu de 'dra'ang thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni rga dang nad kyis yongs mnar ba'i/ /srog
chags sdug bsngal brgya yis gces pa rnams/ /skye shi mya ngan 'jigs pas gdungs mthong nas/ /de dag don du snying rje'i sems kyis spyod/ /'gro rgyud lnga yi 'khor lo'i dkyil
'khor du/ /sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor btsir ba'i 'gro mthong nas/ /sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo 'joms pa yi/ /ye shes rdo rje sra ba 'di tshol lo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang
rtswa sdong tsher ma can/ /lta chags rtswa mang yongs su 'dzings pa yi/ /sems can zhing ni yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir/ /shes rab gshol brtan bzang po
'di tshol lo/ /gti mug ma rig thibs po'i bsam pa can/ /'gro ba shes rab mig stor dmigs med pa/ /de la phyogs bde ston pa'i mthu yod pa/ /'gro ba'i ded
dpon bzang por 'di 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i go bgos rnam thar bzhon pa zhon/ /ye shes ral gris mya ngan dgra 'joms pas/ /mi 'jigs stob pa'i dpa' bor gyur pa
'di| |'gro ba rnams kyi lam ston 'gyur ba yin/ /'di ni chos kyi gru rab sbyor ba ste/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i lam la slob pa'o/ /zhi ba rin chen mchog gi gling skyel
ba| |'di ni khams gsum mtsho yi skya ba 'dzin/ /ye shes 'od zer smon lam dkyil 'khor can/ /sems can kun gyi gnas su snang byed pa'i/ /chos dbyings mkha' la
'od chen rab ldan par/ /'di ni khams gsum nyi mar 'char bar 'gyur/ /byams pa'i dga' ldan ting 'dzin dang bsil ba'i/ /sems can kun la snyoms sems 'od
bzang la/ /dkar po'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs rgyas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas zla ba 'di ni 'char bar 'gyur/ /bsam pa'i gzhi rten brtan la rab gnas pa/ /byang chub
spyod pas rim gyis 'phags pa ste/ /chos kun rin chen 'byung gnas ldan pa yi/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems kyi klu yi dbang gis byung / /chos
kyi dbyings kyi mkha' la mngon par 'phags/ /dkar po'i 'bras bu'i lo tog 'phel byed pa'i/ /'di ni 'gro bar chos sprin char 'bebs 'gyur/ /dag pa'i snying po dri gsum mun
sel ba| |byams pa'i snum yod dran pa'i snod brtan pa/ /dri med byang chub sems bskyed 'od bzang ba'i/ /chos kyi mar me 'di ni 'bar byed 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni mar mer
snying rje sko/ /byams pa rdos pa mi g.yo bsam pa mkhregs/ /byang chub yan lag mthar gyis byung ba yi/ /sangs rgyas sras su 'di ni yang dag skye/ /bsod nams snying po mngon par
'phel bar byed/ /ye shes snying po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur/ /'di ni shes pa'i snying po 'char bar byed/ /smon lam ji bzhin snying po yang dag byung / /snying rje byams pas sprul pa
'di 'dra ba/ /sems can dgrol blo phan pa'i bsam ldan pa/ /rnam dag yid can 'di ni ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra'i 'gro ba lha dang mir bcas dkon/ /'di 'dra'i bsam pa rab tu rtsa brtan
la| |'di 'dra'i sbyor ba brtan pas rnam 'phel cing / /srid gsum yog par byed pa 'di 'dra ba'i/ /ye shes shing chen 'bras bu 'byung ba dkon/ /'di ni yon tan kun sgrub don du
gnyer| |chos rnams thams cad yongs su dri bar mos/ /the tshom thams cad rnam par bsal don du/ /le lo med par bshes gnyen thams cad sten/ /'di
ni bdud kyi dkrug ma nyon mongs 'joms/ /'di ni lta ba'i dri ma srid pa sel/ /'di ni 'gro ba thams cad dgrol la brtson/ /mkhas pa 'di ni rtag tu khyad par tshol/ /yon tan
lam la ma nor 'di gnas pas/ /'di ni ngan song thams cad sbyong bar 'gyur/ /mtho ris lam yang nye bar ston par 'gyur/ /thar pa'i lam du 'gro ba 'dzud par 'gyur/ /'di
ni 'gro rgyud kun gyi sdug bsngal sel/ /'di ni 'gro rgyud kun gyi bde ba stob/ /'di ni srid pa kun gyi zhags pa thub/ /srid pa'i 'gro rgyud thams cad sel bar 'gyur/ /lta
ba dog pa rnam par 'byed par 'gyur/ /sred pa'i 'khri shing dra ba gcod par 'gyur/ /chags pa'i 'dod chags nye bar sbyong bar 'gyur/ /srid gsum lam yang yongs su
ston par 'gyur/ /'di ni 'jig rten mgon dang skyabs yin te/ /'di ni 'gro ba kun la 'od byed pa'o/ /rnam pa kun tu srid pa sel la mkhas/ /sa gsum kun gyi 'dren
par 'di 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs gnyid log 'gro ba sad par byed/ /'dod pa'i 'dam las mkhas pa 'di sgrol te/ /'du shes chags las yongs su 'di yang 'grol/ /
bcings pa kun las thar bar byed par 'gyur/ /chos dbyings gzhi yi bye brag snang bar byed/ /'jig rten khams kyi bye brag sbyong bar 'gyur/ /chos kun gzhi yi bye brag pha rol phyin/
nor bzang khyod ni dga' ba skyed par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa khyod kyi sbyor ba'i tshul dag dang / /dag cing khyod la smad pa med tshul dang / /khyod kyi bsam pa'i yon tan ldan tshul las/ /bsam
pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /khyod kyis bdag nyid dge bar byas tshul gyis/ /ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas kun mthong 'gyur/ /ring por mi thogs zhing rnams
kun 'gror 'gyur/ /chos kun ring por mi thogs shes par 'gyur/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/ /sems can rgya mtsho rnam par 'grol bar 'gyur/ /spyod
pa rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi nan tan rgya mtsho de 'dra'o/ /khyod kyi mos pa'i dkyil 'khor tshul las na/ /khyod ni yon tan rnams kyi snod du 'gyur/ /khyod
ni dge ba yang dag 'byung gnas 'gyur/ /khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi smon lam dkyil 'khor tshul las na/ /khyod kyis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor
pham par byas/ /khyod kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyangs/ /nyon mongs dkyil 'khor khyod kyis dag par byas/ /ye shes rgyud ni rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/ /chos
kyi rgyud ni rab tu brjod par 'gyur/ /las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor rgyud/ /ring por mi thogs rnam par zlog par 'gyur/ /'jig rten
'khor lo srid pa'i 'khor lor brten/ /shu ba'i lam rgyud lnga yi 'khor lor rmongs/ /'gro kun sdug bsngal 'khor lo gcod pa yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar 'gyur
sangs rgyas rigs ni rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rigs ni yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur/ /dge 'dun rigs ni yongs su sdud par 'gyur/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i 'byung
gnas khyod 'gyur ro/ /sred pa'i dra ba rnam par zlog par 'gyur/ /lta ba'i dra ba thibs po de bzhin te/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dra ba 'grol bar 'gyur/ /smon lam dra ba
de ni khyod kyis sbyangs/ /sems can khams ni yongs su smin byed 'gyur/ /'jig rten khams ni yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur/ /ye shes khams ni shin tu dag byed 'gyur//
khyod kyi bsam pa'i khams ni de 'dra'o/ /nor bzang dga' ba 'phel bar byed pa khyod/ /sems can kun la phan bde dga' byed 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs
rgyud dga' byed cing / /sangs rgyas thams cad smon lam dga' byed 'gyur/ /sems can kun gyi 'gro ba'i gnas ston pa/ /zhing rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan
snang ston pa/ /chos rnams thams cad snang ba rab ston pa'i/ /blta na bzang ba'i rgyal bar khyod 'gyur ro/ /chos dbyings snang bar byed pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /sems can khams
rnams bde byed 'od ldan pa/ /ngan song thams cad zhi byed 'od ldan pa'i/ /srid gsum sdug bsngal zhi bar byed par 'gyur/ /mtho ris lam ni nye bar ston par 'gyur/ /
sangs rgyas lam ni 'gro la 'byed par 'gyur/ /thar pa'i lam du 'gro ba khrid par 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i lam ni khyod kyis rnam par sbyangs/ /log pa'i lam ni rnam par zlog par
'gyur| |skye bo 'phags pa'i lam la 'dul bar 'gyur/ /brtan pa'i blo gros le lo med pa khyod/ /mi g.yeng byang chub lam ni de ltar tshol/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor gnas pa'i
lus can rnams/ /sdug bsngal mthar phyin bya bar khyod brtson pa/ /'gro ba srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi yon tan mtsho chen de 'dra'o/ /ye shes nyi
ma mchog gi 'od zer mtshos/ /lus can nyon mongs rgya mtsho yongs bskams shing / /de dag nan tan mtsho la bkod byas nas/ /ye shes rgya mtshor rab tu 'god par
'gyur| |blo gros rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ /spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam rgya mtsho la/ /ring por mi thogs yongs
su 'jug par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa khyod ni blo gros rgya mtsho'i mthus/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang por phyin par 'gyur/ /'khor rnams rgya mtsho mang
po mthong bar 'gyur/ /chos mang rgya mtsho yongs su 'thung bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sprin mang khrag khrig mthong bar 'gyur/ /mchod sprin shin tu rgya chen byed par
'gyur| |chos kyi sprin mang khrag khrig thos par 'gyur/ /khyod ni smon lam de 'dra'i sprin kyang byed/ /sems can thams cad gnas mang rgyas 'gengs 'gyur/ /zhing
rnams kun gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas su phyin par 'gyur/ /khyod ni de 'dra'i phyogs su zhugs pa yin/ /khyod ni ting 'dzin gnas
su 'jug par 'gyur/ /khyod kyis rnam thar gnas rnams thob par 'gyur/ /khyod ni mngon shes gnas la spyod par 'gyur/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu
gnas| |nyi zla'i gzugs rnams rab tu snang ba ltar/ /sems can kun gyi gnas su 'char bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan sngar mngon 'byung 'gyur/ /khyod
kyi 'byung ba'i lam chen de 'dra'o/ /'jig rten kun la mi gnas spyod yul dang / /nam mkha'i spyod yul bzang por khyod spyod 'gyur/ /khyod kyi spyod yul rab tu
zhi bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi mngon shes spyod yul de 'dra'o/ /mig 'phrul dra ba'i bye brag gzhi mkhas khyod/ /zhing gi dra ba'i bye brag ji snyed gzhi/ /ser po mkha' la chags pa med
pa ltar| |ring por mi thogs rgyas par 'gengs par 'gyur/ /chos dbyings 'byams klas khong du chud par 'gyur/ /'byams klas 'jig rten khams su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byams klas kun/ /mthong bar 'gyur gyi nor bzang dga' bar gyis/ /khyod kyis de 'dra'i rnam thar de lta bu/ /mthong la mthong zhing
da dung mthong bar 'gyur/ /de bas mkhas pa skyo bar ma byed cig /dga' yangs zang zing med pa nyams su longs/ /nor bzang khyod ni yon tan snod bzang ste/ /khyod ni
rgyal ba rnams kyi gdams ngag mthun/ /khyod kyis tshul 'di yongs su gzung bar gnas/ /de bas rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong / /sangs rgyas sras po gnas med
spyod yul can/ /gang rnams mthong bar bskal pa khrag khrig tu/ /shin tu dka' na legs brjod mi smos pa/ /de dag spyod legs spyod tshe khyod kyis mthong / /de ltar 'jam
dpal mngon du mthong gyur te/ /de 'dra'i yon tan snod du gyur byas pa/ /khyod kyi thos pa rgya che bsam mi khyab/ /mi yi srid par khyod ni legs par 'ongs/ /ngan song
lam rnams thams cad rnam par zlog/ mi khom ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ /sdug bsngal chos rnams khyod kyis thams cad bor/
mi dga' thams cad yongs su spang bar gyis/ /byis pa'i sa ni khyod kyis rnam par bzlog /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan sa la gnas/ /ye shes sa yi dam pa yongs
bskang zhing / /sangs rgyas sa rab ring por mi thogs 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho snyed/ /sangs rgyas ye shes nam mkha'i mdzod dang mtshungs/ /de
yi tshad kyi smon lam gang chen mtsho/ /khyod kyis btsal zin shin tu dga' bar gyis/ /de ltar dbang po yongs su mi skyo la/ /bsam pa brtan zhing sbyor ba nges pa
rnams| |gang dag 'di 'dra'i bshes gnyen sten byed pa/ /de dag ring por mi thogs mgon por 'gyur/ /khyod kyi byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sems
can mang po dul bar 'gyur mthong zhing / /chos kun sgo yi byang chub spyod pa la/ /nam yang yid gnyis byed par ma gyur cig / de ltar phun sum tshogs pa 'di
'dra 'di/ /sangs rgyas sras pos de ring 'dir mthong ba/ /don chos yon tan dad pa phun sum tshogs/ /khyod kyi bsod nams phun ldan bsam mi khyab/ /de ltar
rgyal sras rnams kyis rgyun 'brel bar/ /rang rang so so'i smon lam bstan byas te/ /khyod kyis de dag ma lus mthun rtogs pa/ /khyod kyis thob pa chen po ci 'dra ltos/ /byang
chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i snod gyur pa/ /de 'dra srid pa brgyar yang dkon pas na/ /de phyir rgyal sras de dag rgyun 'brel ba/ /khyod la rnam thar tshul rnams yongs su ston/ /
bskal pa khrag khrig bye bar 'gro ba gang / /bde gshegs sras dang lhan cig 'grogs gyur ba/ /de dag de rnams spyod yul mi shes te/ /de dag yon tan snod du bdag ma
byas| |khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i tshul 'di thos par gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam 'phrul pa/ /'gro ba kun na dkon pa khyod kyis mthong / /de ltar nor bzang dga' ba'i
yid du gyis/ /khyod la sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs pa mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyod gzung phyir yang gnas/ /khyod kyang de dag rjes su bstan la gnas/ /legs so
nor bzang khyod kyi 'tsho ba dge /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi chos la gnas/ /khyod ni rgyal sras yon tan rnams la slob/ /bde bar gshegs rigs rnam par 'phel
byed 'gyur/ /nor bzang dga' ba rgya chen nyams su longs/ /sangs rgyas mnyam med thams cad khyod kyi pha/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad khyod dang spun/ /byang chub
yan lag thams cad khyod gyi gnyen/ /khyod ni bde gshegs thugs las skyes pa'i sras/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyud 'dzin pa/ /byang chub sems
dpa'i rigs rgyud 'phel bar byed/ /ring por mi thogs chos rgyal 'thob 'gyur gyi/ /nor bzang dbang po tshim zhing dga' bar gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur dam
pa yang / /ring por mi thogs rmad byung thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sras dang mtshungs shing mnyam par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi spyod pa'i tshul mthun de 'dra'o/ /mi gang
ci 'dra'i sa bon 'debs byed pa/ /de ni de 'dra'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur/ /dga' ba rgya chen bsam yas nyams su longs/ /ngas ni de ring khyod kyi dbugs kyang
dbyung / /tshe gcig khyod kyis gang rnams thog gyur pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig bsam yas pa/ /bskal pa khrag khrig byang chub spyod spyod pa/ /de dag
gis kyang phun sum 'di ma rnyed/ /'di rnams thams cad mos pa'i 'bras bu ste/ /brtson 'grus bsam pa dag ni de bzhin no/ /gang zhig spyod pa 'di 'drar dga'
ba yang / /nor bzang spyod pa gang yin de la spyod/ /spyod pa thams cad smon lam byung ba yin/ /chos rnams thams cad mos las yongs su gyur/ /nor bzang de
ltar khyod kyis yongs su bsgrubs/ /rtag tu khyad par spyod pa btsal bar gyis/ /klu yi bsam pa ji snyed byung gyur pa/ /de snyed char pa yongs su 'bab par 'gyur/ /smon lam
ye shes spyod yul ji snyed pa/ /de snyed byang chub spyod pa rgyas par 'gyur/ /nor bzang bzang po'i spyod ces bya ba 'di/ /tshul 'di khyod la bstan pa 'di yin gyi/ /de
shes gyis la dge bshes rang bzhin gyis/ /bsnyen bkur byed tshe 'jigs par ma byed cig /lus rnams bye ba sngon chad khyod kyis kyang / /'dod pa'i don du don med
zad byas soms/ /da ni byang chub yongs su tshol gyur na/ /brtul zhugs bzang po brtul bas zhig ko 'dod/ /khyod kyis bskal pa bye ba 'das byas te/ /'du byas
sdug bsngal thams cad nyams su myong / /gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas mnyes ma byas/ /'di 'dra'i tshul yang thos par ma gyur to/ /de las da ni khom par mir yang
skyes| |sangs rgyas byung mthong dge bshes 'di 'dra ste/ /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa'ang thos par gyur/ /rnam dag sems su de ko cir mi 'gyur/ /bde bar
gshegs pa yang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dge bshes de bzhin chos mnyan thos par 'gyur/ /gal te bsam pa yongs su ma sbyangs na/ /tshul 'di phyin chad thos
par dka' ba yin/ /de bas dad dang mos dang bsam pa rnams/ /yongs su skyed la bla ma phu dud kyis/ /the tshom lta ba yongs su skyo spongs la/ /
yang dang yang du 'di 'dra'i tshul nyon cig /gang gis spyod la 'jug pa 'di 'dra 'di/ /thos nas de 'dra'i smon lam mngon bsgrubs pa/ /de dag mi yi srid par
legs par 'ongs/ /gang gis de 'dra'i mos pa sbyangs pa ni/ /de la dge bshes thams cad mi dkon no/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi sras dang spun/ /de la phyin
chad byang chub the tshom med/ /gang zhig 'di 'dra'i tshul 'dir zhugs gyur ba/ /des ni log par ltung ba thams cad spangs/ /des ni sdug bsngal chos rnams thams
cad bsal/ /des ni yon tan thams cad bsdu bar byas/ /lus ni bor nas ring por mi thogs su/ /yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro /byang chub sems dpa'i
gnas su 'jug par 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /nor bzang khyod kyi sngon gyi rgyu sdug pas/ /da ltar byung la mos pa nges pa
yis| |khyad par don gnyer dge bshes bsten byas pas/ /chu las ut+pa la bzhin de phyir 'phel/ /dge bshes thams cad phu dud bsam pa dang / /sangs rgyas
thams cad dgyes bya'i bsam pa dang / /chos kun yongs su dri ba'i bsam pa can/ /brtul zhugs bzang po ldan pa dal gyis longs/ /chos kyi nan tan kun la rab gnas pa/ /
lam rnams rjes su kun tshol rab gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi smon lam rab gnas pa/ /yon tan chos rnams kun gyi snod khyod longs/ /mos pa phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra
bas| |khyod kyis nga la phyag 'di byas pa ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor du mngon sum du/ /ring por mi thogs yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /skyo ba'i yid med nor bzang
legs pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam sems ldan pa/ /brtul zhugs brtan khyod ring por mi thogs par/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan mthar phyin 'gyur/ /ye shes spyod
yul rnam thar mthar phyin pa'i/ /'jam dpal gan du nor bzang khyod song ste/ /bzang po'i spyod pa dam pa mchog dris shig /de tshul khyod 'jug de ni byed par 'gyur/ /de ltar
byams pa chags med spyod yul gyis/ /nor bzang yang dag legs pas 'phags mthong nas/ /'khor rnams kun la mngon par bstan byas te/ /de yi yon tan legs mdzod
'di brjod do/ /'di 'dra'i rjes su bstan pa dam pa dang / /gdams ngag de 'dra nor bzang thos gyur nas/ /dga' ba'i shugs kyis dbang po mngon brlan pas/ /mchi ma'i rgyud
mang rab tu des kyang blags/ /dga' ba'i nyams chen nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /dbang po tshim nas shugs kyis dbugs kyang phyung / /nor bzang langs te
thal mo rab sbyar nas/ /byams pa de la bskor ba rab tu byas/ /de yi lag tu 'jam dpal sems dbang gis/ /me tog phreng ba rin chen mdzes pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon
pas mngon thon pa/ /yid du 'ong ba mang po byung bar gyur/ /nor bzang de tshe rab tu dga' gyur nas/ /dga' bar de dag khyams pa de la gtor/ /de tshe de yi mgo la kun nas byugs/ /
byams pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras/ /rgyal ba'i sras po nor bzang legs so legs/ /de ltar khyod ni yongs su mi skyo bas/ /nga dang 'jam dpal ci 'dra ci bzhin
du| |yon tan snod du khyod ni myur te 'gyur/ /thos nas nor bzang dga' ba'i tshig brjod pa/ /'di 'dra'i dge bshes bdag dang phrad pa ni/ /srid pa brgya phrag bgrangs
par shin tu dkon/ /bdag gis de ring 'dir phyin shin tu legs/ /yon tan kun gyi pha rol phyin gyur pa/ /'jam dpal khyod kyi byin rlabs bzang po yis/ /bdag
gis bshes gnyen 'di dag dkon pa rnyed/ /khyod dang bdag tu myur du 'grogs par 'gyur// //shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes
bya ba las/ sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste/ bam po brgya bcu gnyis pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i mdud
du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/ ji ltar byang chub
sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa byams pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku tshe gcig gis thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ste/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sku tshe
gcig gis thogs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa lags/ des ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu brnyes
pa lags/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa rab tu zhugs pa lags/ des ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa lags/ de ni/ bzod pa'i sgo thams
cad du zhugs pa lags/ des ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu brnyes pa lags/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thams cad la rnam par
rol pa lags/ des ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su sgrub pa lags/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud thams cad rtogs par thugs su chud pa
lags| de ni/ gzungs dang spobs pa snang ba'i tshul thams cad rab tu brnyes pa lags/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la mnga' thob pa lags/ des
ni| byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad shin tu bsags pa lags/ de ni/ shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa'i tshul la rnam par rol pa lags/ des ni/ mngon par
shes pa chen po dang / rig pa dang / ye shes snang ba'i tshul bskyed pa lags/ de ni/ bslab pa thams cad la byung ba lags/ des ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs
su sbyangs pa lags/ des ni/ smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa lags/ des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung bstan pa rab
tu blangs pa lags/ de ni/ theg pa thams cad kyis 'byung ba'i sgo la mkhas pa lags/ des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par
blangs pa lags/ des ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yongs su bzung ba lags/ des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod bzung ba
lags| des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin pa lags/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
kyi spyi bor phyin pa lags/ de ni/ nyon mongs pa'i dpung thams cad rnam par dkrug pa la shin tu dpa' ba lags/ de ni/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par lus pa rnams kyi
lam ston pa lags/ de ni/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi sman par gyur pa lags/ de ni/ sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin pa lags/ de ni/ 'jig
rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi dbang po lags/ de ni/ 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi thu bo lags/ de ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtso bo
lags| de ni/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la rgyu ba rnams kyi skya ba 'dzin pa lags/ des ni/ sems can gdul ba'i thabs kyi rgya mtsho chen po bshal ba lags/ de ni/ 'gro ba yongs
su smin pa rnams kyi dbang po rnam par gzigs pa lags/ de ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la brtson pa lags/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa lags/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad la yang dag par 'gro bar brtson pa lags/ de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na gnas pa lags/ de ni/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du mngon par 'phags pa lags/ de ni/ 'gro ba thams cad
kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan snang ba lags/ de ni/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa lags/ de ni/ bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das
pa lags/ de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su bzhud pa lags/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad la sgrib pa med pa brnyes pa lags/ de ni/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par brtson pa lags/ de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa lags/ de ni/ dbang bskur
ba'i thabs thob pa lags/ de ni/ chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la dbang bskur ba lags/
de ni| sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu byung ba lags/ de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bsgyur ba'i mthar phyin pa lags na/ 'phags pa/ ji
ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas nan tan du
bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi khams ji ltar gnyer ba'i tshul bzhin du rim gror bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / yi dam
ji ltar bcas pa'i tshul bzhin du mthar phyin par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chen po brtsams pa grub par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
rten dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ba dang / bdag dang / sems can dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun slu bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi
gcod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs stong par mi 'byin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de thams cad la bltas te tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la nye bar bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs
kyi bu dag /tshong dpon gyi bu 'di 'di ltar nga la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan yongs su sgrub pa 'dri ba la ltos/ bzod pa can dag/ tshong dpon gyi
bu 'di ni/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa 'di lta bu dang / don du gnyer ba 'di lta bu dang / mos pa'i yi dam 'di lta bu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa 'di lta bu dang
brtson 'grus mi ldog pa 'di lta bu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis mi ngoms pa 'di lta bu dang / khyad par yongs su btsal ba 'di lta bu dang / mgo'i
thod la me 'bar ba lta bur spyod pa 'di lta bu dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong bar 'dod pa 'di lta bu dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med
pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yongs su tshol zhing yongs su dri ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba byed cing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas btang nas
grong khyer dpal gyi 'byung gnas nye bar bzung ba nas lho phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad du rgyus te dge ba'i bshes gnyen brgya rtsa bcu la yongs su dri ba byed cing / tha ma
nga'i drung 'di'i bar du skyo ba thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas phyin te/ rigs kyi bu dag /rnam pa 'di lta bur theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
pa| yi dam chen po la yang dag par gnas pa/ bsam pa chen po la rab tu rtul ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ snying rje chen po'i go bgos pa'i ngad dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen
pos sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i blo gros can/ brtson 'grus chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu brtson pa/ sems can gyi lam grogs mang
pos yongs su bskyang ba la mngon par brtson pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las sems can bsgral ba la zhugs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam chen po la zhugs
pa| chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par bsham pa la brtson pa/ chos chen po dang bsod nams rin po che yongs su bsdu ba la rab tu rtul ba/ chos kyi mchod sbyin chen po'i
tshogs bsags pa la brtson pa rnams kyi ming thos pa'am/ gzugs kyi lus mthong ba'am/ gzugs kyi lus mthong ba'am/ spyod yul du 'grogs pa'am/ spyod pa dang skal ba mnyam pa ni/ shin
tu dkon no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ skyes bu dam pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i don du byung ba ste/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal
las yongs su thar par byed pa dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par bsal ba dang / mi khom pa'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / lam nyam nga ba thams cad yongs
su spang ba dang / mi shes pa'i mun pa nag po thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi
'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / gnas kyi rten thams cad las gyen du bskyod pa dang / rten gyi
gzhi thams cad las bskul ba dang / 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du mi gnas par bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i 'dam nas yang dag par gdon pa dang / dga'
ba'i 'dod chags spang ba dang / lta ba'i bcings pa gtub pa dang / 'jig tshogs la mngon par zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'du shes kyi zhags pa yang dag pa gcad
pa dang / phyin ci log gi lam nas rnam par bzlog pa dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal ba dang / bag la nyal ba'i zug rdu yang dag par dbyung ba dang / sgrib pa'i sgo
glegs gzhom pa dang / sgrib pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang / srid pa'i dra ba nas gdon pa dang / ma rig pa'i kun tu sbyor ba las dbye ba dang / sred pa'i chu bo las
bsgral ba dang / g.yo dang sgyu spang ba dang / sems kyi rnyog pa dang ba dang / the tshom dang / yid gnyis dang / nem nur bsal ba dang / mi shes pa'i chu po chen po las
bsgral ba dang / 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad rnam par smad pa'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ skyes bu dam pa 'di ni/ sems can rnams chu bo bzhi las
yongs su bsgral ba'i phyir chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par bsham par 'dod pa'o/ /lta ba'i 'dam du bying ba rnams kyi chos kyi rkang stegs chen po dgod par 'dod
pa'o| |gti mug gi mun par 'thoms pa rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba dbyung bar 'dod pa'o/ /'khor ba'i mya ngan du 'khyams pa rnams la 'phags pa'i lam bstan par 'dod
pa'o| |nyon mongs pa'i nad chen pos gzir ba rnams la chos kyi sman sbyin par 'dod pa'o/ /skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi bas gtses pa rnams la 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings sbyin
par 'dod pa'o/ /me gsum rab tu 'bar ba rnams la zhi gnas kyi chus rab tu zhi bar bya bar 'dod pa'o/ /mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug
pas gdungs pa rnams la dbugs phyin pa chen po sbyin par 'dod pa'o/ /srid pa'i btson ras 'khor ba rnams la ye shes kyi mtshon cha sbyin par 'dod pa'o/ /lta ba'i bcings
pas glags pa rnams la shes rab kyi mtshon chas bstud par 'dod pa'o/ /khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyis 'khor ba rnams la thar pa'i sgo bstan par 'dod pa'o/ /phyogs
mi bde bar mngon par gzhol ba rnams la bde ba'i phyogs bstan par 'dod pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i chom pos gtses pa rnams la dbugs phyin pa chen po sbyin par 'dod
pa'o| |ngan song gi g.yang sas 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams la 'ju sa'i lag pa brkyang bar 'dod pa'o/ /phung po'i gshed mas gtses pa rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i
grong khyer bstan par 'dod pa'o/ /khams kyi sprul gyis kun nas 'khor ba rnams la 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'byung ba bstan par 'dod pa'o/ /skye mched
kyi grong stong pa na gnas pa rnams shes rab kyi snang bas gdon par 'dod pa'o/ /mu stegs ngan pa la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mu stegs su gzud par 'dod
pa'o| |bshes gnyen ma yin pa'i lag tu lhung ba rnams la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan par 'dod pa'o/ /byis pa'i chos kyi spyod yul la mngon par mos pa
rnams 'phags pa'i chos la rab tu dgod par 'dod pa'o/ /'khor ba'i khyim la mngon par dga' ba rnams gyen du bskyod de thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzud par 'dod
pa'o| |rigs kyi bu dag /de ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di ni/ sems can yongs su skyob pa'i blo gros de lta bus byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnam par dag par bya ba yongs su btsal
ba la rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/ /theg pa chen po yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yongs su skyo ba med pa'o/ /chos kyi sprin thams cad la 'thung bas mi ngoms pa'o/ /tshogs thams
cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rtag tu brtson pa'i/ /chos kyi sgo thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir mi gtong ba la brtson pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
thams cad spyad pa'i phyir brtson 'grus mi gtong ba'o/ /smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams
cad mthong bar bya bas mi ngoms pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bas lus la dub par 'gyur ba med pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad
kyi gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag /sems can gyi 'jig rten na sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de lta bu'i sems can dkon no/ /de bas kyang gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs
te brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sdud pa dang / mos pa drag po 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang /
don du gnyer ba 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur byed
pa dang / mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba ltar spyod pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngag dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan
pas nan tan du byed pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa dang / mthun par len pa 'di lta bus byang chub
kyi yan lag yongs su sgrub pa dang / khe dang / bkur sti dang rnyed pa don du mi gnyer ba 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i khams dang 'gal bar mi byed
pa dang / khyim dang | longs spyod dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / pha ma dang / gnyen bshes dang / dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med par yongs su btang ba
'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i grogs yongs su tshol ba dang / lus dang / srog la phangs par mi rtsi ba 'di lta bus thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos par byed
pa de lta bu'i sems can ni/ chos dkon no/ /rigs kyi bu dag /'dis ji ltar cher skyes pa 'di gcig la ji snyed cig thob pa dang / khong du chud pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
de ma yin pa gzhan gyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba thob pa dang / khong du
chud pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'am/
chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'am/ pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'am/ spyod pa'i dra ba rgya cher bya ba'am/ smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs
par bya ba'am/ bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub
par bya ba dang / yongs su dag par bya ba'am/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la yang dag par 'byung ba
med do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi yon tan dang / legs pa yang dag par yongs su brjod pa byas nas de la
brten te srog chags brgya phrag stong gi byang chub kyi yan lag gi bsam pa brtan par byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod
kyi 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de ltar sems bskyed
pa ni| khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo/ /khyod kyis mi'i lus legs par thob bo/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten du khyod legs par 'tshos so/ /khyod kyis
sangs rgyas byung ba dgyes par byas so/ /khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'jam dpal legs par mthong ngo / /khyod kyis bsam pa'i rgyud snod bzang por gyur to/ /khyod ni/ dge ba'i
rtsa bas mngon par brlan to/ /khyod ni/ dkar po'i chos kyis legs par brtan no/ /khyod kyis mos pa rlabs chen po dang / dge ba'i bsam pa legs par shin tu sbyangs so/ /khyod
ni| sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legs par dgongs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis legs par bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub kyi sems
ni| sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon lta bu'o/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi chos dkar po rnam par 'phel bar byed pas zhing lta bu'o/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu rten pas sa
lta bu'o| |nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dag par byed pas chu lta bu'o/ /'jig rten thams cad la rten pa med pas rlung lta bu'o/ /lta ba'i nye bar len pa'i rtsa ba thams cad rab
tu sreg pas me lta bu'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi gnas snang bar byed pas nyi ma lta bu'o/ /chos dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas par byed pas zla ba lta bu'o/ /chos
kyi snang ba byed pas sgron ma lta bu'o/ /mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yongs su mthong bar byed pas mig lta bu'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin par byed pas lam lta
bu'o| |mu stegs ngan pa rnam par spong bas mu stegs lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par gnas pas bzhon pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams
cad kyi sgor 'jug par byed pas sgo lta bu'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi khang pa na gnas par byed pas gzhal med khang lta bu'o/ /chos kyi dga' ba dang mos pa nyams su myong bar byed pas bza'
shing gi ra ba lta bu'o/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pas gnas lta bu'o/ /'jig rten thams cad la phan pa skyed pas rten lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa thams cad spyod
par byed pas gzhi lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su srung bas pha lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi ma lta bu'o/ /thams cad las yongs su skyong
bas ma ma lta bu'o/ /slob pa dang mi slob pa dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems zil gyis gnon pas rgyal po lta bu'o/ /smon lam thams cad kyis khyad par du 'phags pas dbang
po lta bu'o/ /yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'du bas rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o/ /sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas ri chen po lta bu'o/ /'jig rten thams cad rten pas
khor yug lta bu'o/ /ye shes kyi sman rnam par 'phel bar byed pas gangs kyi ri lta bu'o/ /yon tan gyi spos thams cad kyi gnas su gyur bas spos kyi
ngad ldang ba lta bu'o/ /yon tan rgya che bas nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pas pad+ma lta bu'o/ /sems dul zhing cang shes pas glang po lta bu'o/ /
rgod pa thams cad dang bral bas rta cang shes lta bu'o/ /theg pa chen po yongs su skyong ba'i sngon du 'gro bas kha lo sgyur ba lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i nad sos par byed pas sman lta
bu'o| |mi dge ba'i chos thams cad zad par byed pas sa'i 'og lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad nges par khong du chud par byed pas rdo rje lta bu'o/ /yon tan gyi dri zhim par byed pas
spos kyi snod lta bu'o/ /'jig rten thams cad kyi blta na mngon par dga' bas me tog dam pa lta bu'o/ /'dod chags kyi gdung ba bsil bar byed pas kha ba'i tsan+dan lta bu'o/ /chos
kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas a ga ru nag po lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad 'joms pas sman gyi rgyal po blta na sdug pa lta bu'o/ /bag la nyal ba'i
zug rngu thams cad yang dag par 'byin pas 'bral bar byed pa'i sman lta bu'o/ /dbang po thams cad la dbang sgyur bas dbang po lta bu'o/ /dbul ba thams cad yongs su sel bas
ngal ba so po lta bu'o/ /yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byed pas dpal lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdzes par byed pas lhab lhub lta bu'o/ /nyes byas thams
cad sreg pas bskal pa 'tshig pa'i me lta bu'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pas rtsa ba ma grugs pa'i sman gyi rgyal po chen po lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i
dug thams cad rnam par sel bas klu'i rin po che lta bu'o/ /rnyog pa thams cad sel bas nor bu rin po che chu 'dang lta bu'o/ /don thams cad yongs su grub pas yid bzhin rin po
che'i rgyal po lta bu'o/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bum pa bzang po lta bu'o/ /yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan gyi char mngon par 'bebs pas 'dod sbyin gyi shing
lta bu'o| |'khor ba'i skyon thams cad dang ma 'dres pas gos dang ris can lta bu'o/ /rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas shing bal gyi rgyud lta bu'o/ /sems can gyi bsam pa'i zhing rnam
par spyod pas gshol bu lta bu'o/ /'jig tshogs kyi go cha brtol bas mde'u thung lta bu'o/ /sdug bsngal gyi 'ben nges par 'bigs pas mda' lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i dgra las
rnam par rgyal bar byed pas mdung lta bu'o/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'gebs pas go cha lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i klad pa 'gems pas ral gri lta bu'o/ /nga rgyal dang dregs
pa dang rlom pa'i go cha 'dral bas ral gri'i so lta bu'o/ /bag la nyal gyi go cha gshog pas mda' ste'u kha lta bu'o/ /nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan snyol bas
dpa' bo'i ru mtshon lta bu'o/ /mi shes pa'i shing sgyel bar byed pas lag cha lta bu'o/ /sdug bsngal gyi shing rab tu gcod pas sta re lta bu'o/ /gnod pa thams cad las yongs su
skyob pas mtshon cha lta bu'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus yongs su srung bas lag pa lta bu'o/ /yon tan thams cad la so sor 'god pas rkang pa lta bu'o/ /ma rig pa'i dri'i ling
tog yongs su sel bas mig mkhan lta bu'o/ /'jig tshogs kyi zug rngu yang dag par 'byin pas skam pa lta bu'o/ /bag la nyal gyi tsher ma 'byin pas tsher zungs lta bu'o/ /'khor
ba'i bcing pa las yongs su 'grel bas mdza' bo lta bu'o/ /gnod pa thams cad sel bas nor bu lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis 'byung ba'i lam
mngon par shes par byed pas gtsug lag lta bu'o/ /bsod nams mi zad pas gter lta bu'o/ /ye shes mi zad pas chu mig lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad kyi gdong gi gzugs
brnyan ston pas me long gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/ /'go ba med pas me tog puN+Da rI ka lta bu'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsdu ba'i dngos po rgyun du 'bab pas chu klung chen po lta bu'o/ /
chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pas klu'i rgyal po chen po lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po yongs su 'dzin pas 'tsho ba'i dbang po lta bu'o/ /
'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su phyin par byed pas bdud rtsi lta bu'o/ /'dul ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su sdud cing 'dren pas kun nas 'khor ba'i snying lta bu'o/ /'khor ba'i chu
la rgyu ba mngon par 'don pas mchil ba lta bu'o/ /yon tan thams cad kyi dri zhim po 'dzin pas spos kyi snod lta bu'o/ /shin tu nad med par byed pas dug sman lta bu'o/ /'dod pas
dga' ba'i dug med par byed pas dug gi gnyen po lta bu'o/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i dug thams cad 'byang bar byed pas sngags dang gzungs lta bu'o/ /sgrib pa dang bar chad kyi rtswa
thams cad rnam par 'thor bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas rin po che'i gling lta bu'o/ /chos dkar po
thams cad 'byung bas rigs lta bu'o/ /yon tan gyi chos thams cad skye ba'i sgor gyur pas 'byung gnas lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshong pa thams cad kyis spyod pas tshong dus
lta bu'o| |las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang dri ma thams cad yongs su sbyong bas chu'i khams lta bu'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sbrang
rtsi'i gnas lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du phyin par byed pas lam lta bu'o/ /chos dkar po thams cad yongs su 'dzin
pas snod lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad mi snang bar byed pas char pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa thams cad ston pas gnas lta bu'o/ /nyan
thos kyi rnam par grol ba dang mi 'dra bas rdo ba khab len lta bu'o/ /rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pas bai DUR+Ya lta bu'o/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi
shes pa thams cad zil du brlag pa dang zil gyis non par byed pas in+d+ra nI la lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sad par byed pas mtho ris kyi rnga
lta bu'o| |rnyog pa med pas chu dwangs pa lta bu'o/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs zil du rlag par byed pas dzam+bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan lta
bu'o| |'jig rten gsum las mngon par 'phags pas ri'i rgyal po chen po lta bu'o/ /skyabs tshol ba yongs su mi gtong bas skyabs lta bu'o/ /don ma yin pa 'joms pas
don lta bu'o/ /snying dga' bar byed pas dbyig lta bu'o/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pas mchod sbyin gyi yo byad lta bu'o/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi gtso
bo dang thu bor gyur pas na/ rgan pa lta bu'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzin pas gleng gzhi lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang smon lam thams cad sdud pas mdo
lta bu'o| |'jig rten thams cad skyong bas rdzi'u lta bu'o/ /sdig to thams cad rnam par zlog pas srung ma lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin 'dren pas dbang po'i mig 'phrul lta bu'o//
'dul ba 'dren pas chu'i zhags pa lta bu'o/ /bag chags dang bag la nyal ba dang nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhob tu rlog pas dbang po'i me lta bu'o/ /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams la mchod rten lta bu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar byang chub kyi sems ni/ yon tan de dag dang / yon tan gyi khyad par gzhan dag kyang tshad med pa dang ldan
pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ mdor na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ji snyed pa de snyed du byang chub kyi sems la yon tan dang legs pa yod par blta'o/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'byung ba ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams
cad kyang 'di las 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de bas na/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang /
lhag pa'i bsam pas shin tu bzung bas yon tan tshang med pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'jigs pa med pa
zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de 'chang na/ 'jigs pa lnga mi 'byung ste/ 'di ltar mes mi 'tshig go /dug gis mi tshugs so/ /mtshon gyis mi chod do/ /chus mi 'khyer ro/ /du bas
mi 'chi'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi rtsi 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dod chags kyi mes mi 'tshig go /yul gyi dug gis mi
tshugs so/ /nyon mongs pa'i mtshon gyis mi chod do/ /srid pa'i chus mi 'khyer ro/ /yongs su rtog pa'i du bas mi 'chi'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rnam par mi
gtong ba zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de 'chang na/ gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems
kyi ye shes kyi rtsi 'chang ba'ang 'khor ba'i gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mchu zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de 'chang na/ dri
tshor ba tsam gyis sprul thams cad 'byer ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsi 'chang ba'i yon tan gyi dri tsam gyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i sbrul thams
cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsi 'chang na ni/ dgra'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /de bzhin
du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsi 'chang ba yang bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad kyis thub par dka'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di
lta ste| dper na/ rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de bcangs na/ zug rdu thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems rnam par
sel ba 'chang ba ni/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi zug rngu thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtsi'i rgyal po chen po blta na sdug pa zhes
bya ba yod de/ de bcangs na/ nad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems rtsi'i rgyal po chen po blta na sdug pa 'chang ba yang nyon
mongs pa dang / mi shes pa'i nad thams cad rab tu sel bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtsi'i shing chen po sbyor ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i shun pas rma la reg
ma thag tu rma thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gang nas bshus pa de'i shun phrags kyang phyir skye'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon las skyes pa'i shing thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid du sbyor ba yang mthong ma thag tu rigs kyi bu dad pa rnams kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i rma yongs su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
shing de la yang 'jig rten thams cad kyis rma dbyung ba'am/ nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtsi chen po'i rnam par tsa ba ma grugs pa zhes bya ba
yod de| de'i mthus 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing thams cad kyang yan lag thams cad rnam par 'phel lo/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems rtsa ba ma grugs pa'i rtsi chen po'i mthus
kyang slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos kyi shing rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /'di lta ste/ dper
na| dga' ba 'thob pa zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de su'i lus la thogs pa'i lus dang / sems nad med par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dga'
ba 'thob par byed pa'i rtsi yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus dang / sems nad med pa yongs su skyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dran pa 'thob pa
zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de bcangs na/ sems kyi dran pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dran pa thob par byed pa'i
yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i dran pa rnam par dag par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma chen po
zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de zos pa tsam gyis tshe'i tshad bskal par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems pad+mo chen po'i rtsi zos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bskal pa
grangs med pa'i tshe la dbang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de bcangs na/ mi dang mi ma yin pa
thams cad kyis mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsi mi snang bar 'gyur bar bcangs te 'dres pas rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bdud kyi yul thams
cad du mi snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po rin po che thams cad yongs su sdud pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de 'jig
rten gyi khams gzhan du ma 'phos na/ rgya mtsho chen po la bsal pa tshig pa'i me thams cad kyis kyang ta la tsam yang skam par nus pa'i gnas med skabs med do/ /de bzhin du byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nor bu rin po che thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po bsam pa dang sems kyi rgyud la
yod pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngos pa 'ga' zhig rnam par chud za bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med skabs med de/ de ni/
mi srid de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yongs su btang ba zhig tu gyur na ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang skam par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste /
dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'od thams cad yongs su 'dus pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de mgul du btags na/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyang zil gyis non
par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems 'od thams cad yongs su 'dus pa'i rin po che chen po bsam pa'i rgyan du thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang /
rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed pa'i rin po che'i rgyan thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po chu 'dang zhes bya ba
yod de| de chur bcug na/ 'dam dang rnyog pa thams cad rab tu dang bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems chu 'dang gi nor bu rin po che yang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam dang /
rnyog pa thams cad rab tu dang bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po chu dang 'grogs pa zhes bya ba thogs pa'i nya pa ni/ chur mi 'chi'o/ /
de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems chu dang 'grogs pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du mi 'chi'o/ /
rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che klu'i nor bu'i go cha zhes bya ba yod de/ de lag na 'dug na/ nya pa la sogs pa chu las 'tsho ba rnams klu'i gnas thams cad du
dong yang klu'i sbrul thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ye shes klu'i nor bu'i go cha 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yang
'dod pa'i gnas kyi khams thams cad du 'gro yang nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par chags pa thogs pa'i lha'i
rgyal po brgya byin ni/ lha'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems brgya byin mngon par chags pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal
po chen po smon lam gyi cod pan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang khams gsum pa thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor
bu rin po che chen po yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thogs pa'i mi ni/ 'phongs pa thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yid
bzhin gyi rgyal po'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang yo byad dang 'tsho ba'i bag tsha ba thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/ /
rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che nyi mas mdzes pa ni/ nyi ma la bstan na/ me 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa
nyi mas mdzes pa'i nor bu rin po che yang shes rab kyi 'od zer gyis phog na/ ye shes kyi me 'byin to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che zla bas
mdzes pa zhes bya ba la zla ba'i 'od kyis phog na/ chu'i rgyun 'byin to/ /de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zla bas mdzes pa'i rin po che chen po yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
bsngos pa'i zla ba'i 'od kyis phog na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi smon lam gyi chu'i rgyun 'byin to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi
rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa'i klu'i rgyal po chen po rnams la gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems snying rje chen po'i nor bu rin po
che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la'ang ngan song dang / ngan 'gros gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'gro ba'i rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bas nam yang byang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyan gyi dam pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po yang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam
yongs su rdzogs par bya bas nam yang byang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po ni/ mun pa thams cad
yongs su sel cing 'gro ste/ khyim gyi nang na gnas na yang rab tu snang bar byed do/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i nor bu rin po
che chen po yang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel cing 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du 'gro ste/ 'dod pa'i khams na gnas na yang ye shes kyi snang ba chen po rab tu 'gyed do/ /rigs
kyi bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang ci yang rung ste/ nor bu rin po che chen po in+d+ra nI la'i 'od kyis phog pa de dag thams cad ni/ nor bu rin po che chen po in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog tu
'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po in+d+ra nI la'ang chos gang dang gang la rnam par spyad pa dang / yongs su btang
ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci yang rung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pas yongs su bsngos pa de dag thams cad kyang thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi nor bu rin po che chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya ni/ lo brgya phrag stong du mi gtsang ba'i nang
zhig na 'dug kyang dri mi zhim pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas te/ de'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba ni/ de bzhin du gsal zhing shin tu dri ma med do/ /de bzhin du thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya yang bskal pa brgya phrag stong zhig tu 'dod pa'i khams thams cad du gnas kyang 'dod pa'i khams kyi skyon
thams cad kyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba ni/ de bzhin du shin tu dag par gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma med pas rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba ni/ rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de bzhin du thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma med pas rnam par dag pa'i 'od kyang so so'i skye bo dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas zil gyis gnon to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rin po che chen po me 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni/ gcig pu gnas kyang
mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che me 'byung ba lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig pu yang tshul bzhin
yid la bya bas mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po nas grus blangs pa'i nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa
tshong pa'i lag tu 'ongs pa ni/ grong khyer du phyin na/ nor bu mching bu brgya phrag stong yang kha dog dang / rin thang gi zil gyis gnon to/ /de bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po na
gnas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang med pa smon lam gyi grur bcug pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed
pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud la 'dug ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du ma phyin kyang rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer du phyin na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas nor
bu mching bu lta bu thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling
na gnas kyang dpag tshad stong phrag bzhi bcu na gnas pa'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyim gzhal med khang gi gzugs brnyan gyi rgyan yongs su ston
to| |de bzhin du yon tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po yang 'khor ba'i
gnas na 'dug bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i spyod yul las rgyu ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i nyi zla dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi dkyil
'khor thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan gyi rgyan yongs su ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ji srid du nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis snang bar byed pa de srid
du nor dang / 'bru dang / rin po che'i rnam pa dang / gser dang / dngul dang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / gos dang / longs spyod gang ji snyed pa de dag
thams cad kyis nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po'i rin du mi chog go /de bzhin du ji srid du dus gsum la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings kyi yul
snang bar mdzad pa de srid du lha dang / mi dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa yod pa'am/ zag pa med pa gang ji snyed pa de dag
thams cad kyis kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po'i rin du mi chog go /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po rgya
