mtsho'i rgyan gyi dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni/ rgya mtsho'i rgyan thams cad yongs su ston to/ /de bzhin du byang chub du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi dam
pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul rgya mtsho'i rgyan thams cad yongs su ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po yid bzhin gyi rgyal
po ma gtogs par lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las lhag par 'phags pa gang yang med do/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nor bu rin po che chen po yid
bzhin gyi rgyal po ma gtogs par byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las lhag par khyad par du 'phags pa gang yang med do/ /rigs kyi bu/
'di lta ste/ dper na/ klu'i tshogs grub par 'gyur ba'i sprul 'dul ba ni/ klu dang sprul thams cad la dbang sgyur ro/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed
pa'i nan tan gyi klu'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sprul 'dul ba yang nyon mongs pa'i klu dang sprul thams cad la dbang sgyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ dpa' bo lag cha dang ldan pa ni/ dgra'i 'khor gyis tshugs par dka'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lag cha
dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis thub par dka'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha rdzas kyi
tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po'i phye ma srang gcig gis ni/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim pos rgyas par 'gengs te/ de zho gcig tsam la yang stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po ches yongs su gang bas rin du mi chog go /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po lhag
pa'i bsam pa gcig la gnas pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings thams cad yon tan gyi dri zhim pos rgyas par 'gengs te/ slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi sems kyi sems kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tsan+dan rin po che chen po kha ba'i tsan+dan zhes bya ba ni/ gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi
bar byed de/ lus thams cad kyang rab tu bsil bar byed do/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i kha ba'i tsan+dan rin po che yang nyon mongs pa'i kun tu
rtog pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gdung ba thams cad kyang rab tu sel to/ /ye shes kyi lus kyang rab tu sim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper
na| ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du ji snyed cig nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gang su'ang rung ste/ thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur
ro| |rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing sus kyang mi tshugs pa dang kun nas 'du ba'i shun phrags kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba de lta bu ni/ '+dzam+bu'i gling gi me tog par shi ka
dang / me tog dzA ti dang / me tog su ma na la sogs pa me tog gi rnam pa thams cad la'ang med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed
ba'i sa bon las byung ba'i smon lam gyi shing gi yon tan dang / ye shes kyi shun phrags kyi dri zhim po'i ngad 'byung ba de lta bu ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dma' ba dang ldan pa thams
cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi me tog par shi ka dang / me tog dzA ti dang / me tog su ma na'i tshul khrims pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par
grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zag pa med pa dang ldan pa thams cad la'ang med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
shing sus kyang mi thub pa dang / kun nas 'du ba kha 'bus par gyur na/ me tog stong phrag mang po'i 'byung gnas su gyur par shes par bya'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i shing kun nas 'du ba dge ba'i rtsa bas kha 'bus par gyur na/ lha dang mi grangs med pa'i byang chub kyi me tog zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med
pa'i skye gnas su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing kun nas 'du ba'i me tog gis nyi ma gcig tu bsgos pa'i gos sam/ til mar
las dri zhim pa'i ngad 'byung ba de lta bu yang me tog tsam pa ka dang / me tog su ma nas nyi ma brgya phrag stong du bsgos pa'i gos sam/ til mar las kyang mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin
du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi rgyud tshe gcig tu yongs su bsgos ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang / ye shes kyi dri zhim po'i ngad phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhabs kyi drung du ldang ba de lta bu ni/ bskal pa brgya phrag stong du bsgos pa'i nyen thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems las kyang zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
ba dang chos kyi ye shes kyi dri zhim po mi 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing gi rigs na li ke re zhes bya ba rgya mtsho gnod pa dang bral ba nas skye ba yod do/ /de'i
rtsa ba yan chad me tog gi bar du yang dus thams cad du nam yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba med do/ /de bzhin du snying rje chen po dang / smon lam gyi rtsa ba
yang dag par skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang thog ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba phyin chad dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i mthar thug gi bar
du nam yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dngul chu'i rigs gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod do/ /de
ni| srang gcig gis kyang lcags srang stong gser du sgyur ro/ /dngul chu srang gcig po de ni/ lcags srang stong po des zad par bya ba'am/ lcags su bsgyur bar mi nus so/ /de
bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ro'i khams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pa'i ye shes kyis bzung ba ni/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i
lcags thams cad zad par byas te/ chos thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu byed kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ro'i khams gcig po de
ni| las dang nyon mongs pa'i lcags thams cad kyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'am/ zad par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper
na| me ni/ ji tsam du chung du zin kyang rkyen ji tsam dang phrad pa de tsam gyi me lce yongs su skyed do/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me ji tsam du
chung du zin kyang dmigs pa rgya chen po'i tshogs kyi rkyen ji tsam dang phrad pa de tsam du ye shes kyi 'od 'phro ba rab tu dgye bas rnam par 'phel bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/
'di lta ste/ dper na/ me mar gcig las me mar bye ba brgya phrag stong zhig bus kyang me mar de ni/ de snyed byung bas mi zad de/ mthar thug pa med do/ /de bzhin du thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar gcig las 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid du thugs bskyed pa'i me mar mang po 'bar yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar gcig po de ni/ de snyed kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems
bskyed pa'i me mar byung bas mi zad de/ mthar thug pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me mar gcig cig khyim mam khang bu ji lta bur bcug kyang rung ste/
bcug ma thag tu lo stong du bsags bsags pa'i mun pa yang rnam par sel cing snang bar byed do/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang sems can
gyi bsam pa'i khyim thibs po ma rig pa'i mun pa dang ldan pa ci lta bu yang rung ste/ de'i rgyud du phyin na/ de phyin ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong brjod du med par bsags pa'i las
dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / mun pa thams cad rnam par sel cing ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su skyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me mar ni/ snying po ji tsam
pa de'i rkyen tsam du snang bar byed de/ mar gyi tshogs ji srid du gnas pa de srid du 'bar ro/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar yang byang chub sems
dpa'i smon lam gyi snying po'i khyad par ci 'dra ba de lta bur chos kyi dbyings yongs su snang bar byed de/ snying rje chen pos spyod pa'i me mar gyi tshogs ji srid du gnas pa de srid du sems
can gdul ba dang / zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku don sgrub pa la yongs su 'bar bar gnas so/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po
che zhes bya ba las/ sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste/ bam po brgya bcu gsum pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan lha'i
rgyal po dbang sgyur ba'i mgo la thogs pa ni/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyis mi 'phrog go /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
sems bskyed pa lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan nan tan dang / yon tan la rab tu gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi smon lam chen po'i
mgo la thogs pa ni/ byis pa tha dad pa'i skye bo dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrog go /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na /
ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng+ge'i nga ros ni/ seng+ge'i phru gu skyes nas ring po ma lon pa'ang nyams su bde zhing rta'i ri dwags thams cad ni/ kun tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du
de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu'i seng+ge chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nga ro byang chub kyi sems yongs su brjod pa phyung bas ni/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' seng+ge'i phru gu rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis nyams su bde zhing rta'i dmigs pa la gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ni/ kun tu 'byer ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta
ste| dper na/ seng+ge'i rgyus pa las rgyud du byas pa'i pi wang gi sgras ni/ pi wang thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su 'chad do/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i pha rol
tu phyin pa'i sku mnga' ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rgyus pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i sgras 'dod pa'i rgyud kyi dga' ba'i pi wang thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi gtam thams cad kyang yongs su 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po pa
dang / ma he dang / ra'i 'o mas yongs su gang ba'i nang du seng+ge'i 'o ma thigs gcig blugs pas/ 'o ma de dag thams cad 'gyes par 'gyur te/ 'dur mi btub bo/ /de bzhin
du bskal pa brgya phrag stong du bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa kun gyi 'o ma'i rgya mtshor yang de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu'i seng+ge chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed
pa'i 'o ma thigs pa gcig blugs pas thams cad ma lus par zad par 'gyur te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa rnams kyang mi gnas mi
'du'o| |rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bya ka la ping+ka'i phru gu sgo nga'i sbubs nas ma byung ba la nga ro'i mthu'i khyad par yod pa de lta bu ni/ gangs kyi ri la gnas pa'i
bya'i tshogs mthu dang shugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad la yang med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ka la ping+ka'i phru gu las dang po pa 'khor ba'i sgo
nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa la snying rje chen po dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi nga ro'i mthu'i khyad par yod pa de lta bu ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
thams cad la med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' lding chen po'i phru gu skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la gshog pa'i rlung gi stobs dang / mthu
bdog pa dang / mig yongs su dag pa'i yon tan yod pa de lta bu ni/ de ma yin pa'i bya lus tshad du phyin pa gzhan thams cad la'ang med do/ /de bzhin du de bzhin
gshegs pa nam mkha' lding chen po'i rigs dang / rgyud du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' lding chen po'i phru gu sems dang po bskyed pa la thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i gshog pa'i rlung gi stobs dang / shugs bdog pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mig yongs su dag pa'i yon
tan yod pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas bskal pa brgya stong tshang bas byung ba thams cad la med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu chen po'i lag
nas spyad pa'i mde'u thung gis ni/ go cha ji tsam du sra yang brtol to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan po dang ldan pa'i lag nas spyad pa'i thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i mde'u thung gis kyang lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba'i go cha thams cad mi brtol ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mthu bo
che chen po khros te rngam pa'i 'phral ba la thor bu ji srid du gnas pa de srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyis kyang mi thub bo/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che chen
po snying rje chen pos rngam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i gdong la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i thor bu ji srid du gnas pa de srid du 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad du gtogs pa'i bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi las thams cad kyis kyang mi thub bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'phong gi slob dpon gyi mchan bu ma byang ba
'phong gi thabs la ma goms pa la 'phong gi gnas dang / thabs kyi mthu dang / khyad par bdog pa de lta bu ni/ thams cad la byang yang 'phong mi shes pa rnams la med do/ /
de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' cad shes las dang po pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma goms pa la smon lam gyi ye shes dang mos pas spyod pa'i mthu'i khyad par ci bdog
pa de lta bu ni/ byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can thams cad dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta
ste| dper na/ 'phong slob pa'i 'phong gi rgyus thams cad la ni/ dang por rkang pa'i stangs la goms par bya ba sngon du 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa la slob pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la yang dang por thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed
pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par gnas pa sngon du 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang / yul thams cad yongs
su ston pa'i bya ba thams cad ni/ dang por sngags kyi dngos grub mngon par sgrub pa yid la byas na/ 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang / rnam
par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad la yang dang po sems bskyed pa'i smon lam mngon par sgrub pa ni/
yongs su grub pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i sngags dang / rig sngags thams cad ni/ gzugs med la bstan du med pa yin yang sems
bskyed pas sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang / gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su ston to/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yang gzugs med la
bstan du med de/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad sems bskyed pa la dbang bsgyur ba tsam gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad yon tan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad kyis rnam
par sgrub bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byi la'i mig gis bltas pa tsam gyis byi ba thams cad kun tu 'byer ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba tsam gyis las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na /
'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan btags na/ rgyan thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan
thogs pa yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyan zil gyis gnon to/ /zil tu rlags par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo ba khab
long gi rgyal po khams ji tsam du chung yang lcags sgrog sra ba thams cad zhig par byed do/ /de bzhin du sems thag pa nas bskyed pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems
bskyed pa'i khams ji tsam du chung yang lta ba'i rnam pa dang / ma rig pa dang / sred pa'i sgrog thams cad zhig par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo ba khab
long gi khams ni/ gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der lcags phal ba thams cad 'gyes shing mi gnas la mi 'du'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i khams kyang las sam/ nyon mongs pa'am/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba gang dang gang du byung ba de dang de dag
gi las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa thams cad kyang 'byer zhing mi 'khong mi 'du'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di
lta ste| dper na/ chu srin gyi tshal gyi zegs ma gcig zos pa'i nya ba ni/ chu'i srog chags thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin te/ chu srin gyis sos btab
kyang lus la mi tshugs so/ /de bzhin du lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi sems kyi cha gcig zos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i las dang / nyon
mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par khong du chud par bya ba'i nang na 'dug kyang yang dag pa'i
mtha' mngon du bya ba'i lam gol bar ltung bas gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs pa'i skyes bu ni/ gzhan gyis
gnod par bya ba thams cad kyis mi 'chi'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs pa yang nyan thos
dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sar mi 'chi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i smon lam las kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ bsku ba grub pa'i skyes bu ni/ mi'i gnas thams cad rnam par spyod kyang mi kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed
pa'i shes rab dang / smon lam gyis nye bar brtan pa bdud kyi yul thams cad la rnam par spyod kyang bdud thams cad kyis mi mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper
na rgyal po chen po la brtan pa'i skyes bu ni/ skye bo ma rabs thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed
pa chos kyi rgyal po chen po la brten pa yang sgrib pa dang / bar chad dang / ngan song thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa phug gi khyim na
gnas na/ sa'i gseb thams cad rlan gyis yangs su gang bas me'i 'jigs pa med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyud byang chub sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas
mngon par brlan pa la'ang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi mes 'jigs pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
dpa' bo la brten pa'i mi ni/ dgra thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i dpa' bo la brtan pa yang
spyod pa ngan pa'i dgra thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin rdo rje'i lag cha thogs pa ni/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs thams
cad rab tu 'joms so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa brtan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje'i lag cha thogs pa yang bdud dang
phas kyi rgol ba'i lha ma yin gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'joms so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtsi ro'i bcud 'thungs pa'i skyes bu ni/ tshe shin tu ring par gnas
so| |nyam chung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rga bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ro'i bcud kyi tshogs 'thungs pa
yang bskal pa grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor yang yongs su skyo ba med la 'khor ba'i skyon gyis mi gos so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sman gyi ro sbyar ro
cog thams cad du chu ni/ sngon du 'gro ba ste/ gang la yang skyon du mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi tshogs sbyar ba thams cad du
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa ni/ sngon du 'gro ba ste/ gang la yang skyon du mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi'i don du bya ba thams cad
la ni| srog gi dbang po sngon du 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par blang ba la'ang byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro'o/ /
rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu srog gi dbang po dang bral ba ni/ las thams cad la mthu med pas pha ma dang / gnyen bshes kyi tshogs kyis kyang nye bar 'tsho
bar byar med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dang bral ba yang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par bya ba la mthu med pas/ sems
can thams cad kyis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan gyis nye bar 'tsho bar byar med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ dug thams cad kyis
gdug par mi nus so/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems skyed pa'i rgya mtsho chen po yang las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su
sems bskyed pa'i dug thams cad kyis gdug bar mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni skar ma thams cad kyi
'od kyis thub par mi nus so/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skar ma thams cad kyi
yon tan zag pa med pa'i 'od kyis mi thub bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po'i bu skyes nas yun ring du ma lon pa yang blon po'i mchog tu bya ba nas rgan pa
thams cad rigs su rigs dang ldan par skyes pa dang / dbang gis zil gyis gnon to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ring po ma lon pa /
chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa'i las dang po pa yang yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod spyod pa'i nyan thos nas rgan pa thams cad byang chub kyi sems
kyi snying rje chen po'i dbang gis zil gyis gnon to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ blon po ji tsam du rgan pas kyang rgyal bu gzhon nu ji tsam du chung ba la'ang phyag bya
dgos so/ /rgyal po'i bus kyang blon po rgan po la rim gro mi bya ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ji tsam du rgan la/ ji tsam du tshangs pa'i spyod
pa ring du spyod spyod pa rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa la 'dud bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro med
par bya ba ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po'i bu thams cad kyis mi dgos par bya ba zhig na'ang rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan na/ rigs kyi btsun pas rgyal
po'i blon po dam par bya ba thams cad dang yang mi mnyam mo/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' las dang po las dang nyon mongs pa'i nye bar len pa thams cad kyis non pa
yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i mtshan dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi btsun zhing che bas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mchog tu phyin pa thams
cad dang yang mi mnyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che yongs su dag pa ni mig la rab rib kyi skyon yod na/ yongs su ma dag par snang ngo / /de
bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rin po che rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa yang sems can dang pha'i mig mi shes pa'i rab rib kyi skyon dang ldan pa rnams
la yongs su ma dag par snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtsi'i gzungs sngags dang rtsi thams cad bsdus te byas pa ni reg gam/ mthong ngam/ 'grogs na
yang sems can gyi nad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi smon lam dang / ye shes kyi lus dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang /
shes rab dang / thabs kyi sngags dang / rtsi thams cad las bsgrubs pa byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa ni/ thos sam/ mthong ngam/ 'grogs sam/ rjes su dran
pa'i tshul gyis kyang sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gos dang ba'i mtshan nyid can ni/ 'dam gyi nyes
pa thams cad kyis mi gos so/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi gos dang ba'i mtshan nyid can ni/ 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i 'dam gyi skyon thams cad kyis kun
nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing gi gzugs mgo gzer gyis btab pa ni/ yongs su 'gyes par mi 'gyur te/ bya ba
thams cad kyang byed do/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon pa'i ye shes kyi lus kyi spyi bo byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i smon lam gyi gzer gyis btab pa yang
byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad la mthu yod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi ye shes las lus su grub pa yin pas yongs su 'gyes par mi
'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzer dang mi ldan pa'i 'khrul 'khor ni/ shing gi yan lag de nyid yin yang dgos pa bya ba'i mthu med do/ /de bzhin du
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang mi ldan na/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs de nyid yin yang sangs rgyas kyi
chos sgrub pa la mthu med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la rin po che a ga ru nag po glang po'i snying po zhes bya ba yod pa des
bcugs ma thag tu rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs thams cad kyang nam mkha' la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid du sems bskyed pa a ga rus bdugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang khams gsum pa thams cad las rnam par 'das te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i ye shes nam mkha'i spyod yul 'dus ma byas pa thams cad kyi mthar thug par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje ni/ rin po che ma rabs
kyi 'byung khungs nas mi 'byung gi /rdo rje'i 'byung khungs sam/ gser gyi 'byung khungs nas 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu'ang
sems can gyi bsam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma rabs kyi rin po che'i 'byung gnas nas mi skye ste/ gzhan du na sems can yongs su skyob pa'i snying rje
chen po'i rdo rje'i 'byung khungs sam/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la lhag par dmigs pa'i gser gyi 'byung khungs chen po nas 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta
ste| dper na/ shing gi rigs rtsa ba med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i rtsa ba mthar thug pa mi dmigs mod kyi/ shing rnams la yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang /
me tog shin tu rgyas pa dra ba lta bur gyur pa snang ngo / /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthar thug pa'ang mi dmigs mod kyi/
'jig rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa smon lam chen po'i dra
bar gyur pa'ang yongs su snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje ni/ snod ngan pa'i gzhi la 'dug na mdzes par mi snang ngo / /snod ma rdol ba ma gtogs par
snod rdol ba dang bu ga can gyis gzung bar mi nus so/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje chen po yang sems can mos pa zhan pa'i snod dang /
ser sna can nam/ tshul khrims ngan pa can nam/ gnod sems can nam/ le lo can nam/ dran pa 'khrugs pa'am/ shes rab 'chal ba can rnams la mi mdzes te/ byang
chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rin po che'i snod ma gtogs par sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa log pa la zhugs pa blo mi brtan pa'i snod kyis kyang gzung bar mi nus
so| |rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje ni/ rin po che thams cad 'bigs so/ /de bzhin du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje yang sangs rgyas kyi
chos rin po cha thams cad 'bigs par khong du chud par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje ni/ brag thams cad shigs par 'dzems so/ /de bzhin du thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje yang lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi brag shigs par 'joms so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje rin po che ni/ chag kyang
thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i gser gyi rgyan zil gyis gnon to/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje rin po che bsam pa log par zhugs
pas chag par gyur kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi gser gyi rgyan zil gyis gnon to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje rin po che ni/
chag kyang phongs pa thams cad rnam par sel to/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje rin po che nan tan med pas chag
par gyur kyang 'khor ba'i phongs pa thams cad rnam par sel to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje'i khams ni/ ji tsam zhig tu chung yang nor bu dang rdo thams
cad gcog pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de bzhin du dmigs pa ji tsam du chung ba la zhugs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i khams ni/ mi shes pa
thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje rin po che ni/ skye bo ma rabs kyi lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje rin po che yang ma rabs kyi bsam pa dang ldan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan don can gyi lha dang mi'i lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur
ro| |rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rin po che yongs su brtag pa la mi mkhas pa'i skyes bu ni/ rdo rje rin po che'i yon tan nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du
shes rab 'chal ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag kyang byang chub kyi sems rdo rje rin po che chen po'i yon tan la mi mkhas pas kyang de'i yon tan gyi khyad par
nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje ni/ zhu bar mi nus so/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyur gyur pa'i byang chub tu sems
bskyed pa'i rdo rje yang zhu bar mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje'i lag cha chen po ni/ gzhan du na mthu bo che chen po'i stobs ltar khyad par du 'phags
pa'i mthu stobs kyi shugs drag po ma gtogs par stobs po che chen pos kyang gzung bar mi nus so/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i lag cha
chen po yang gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyu'i stobs kyi brtan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chad med pa'i mthu bo che chen po'i stobs ltar khyad par du
'phags pa stobs kyi shugs chen po rab tu thob pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas stobs po che thams cad kyis kyang yongs su gzung bar mi nus so/ /rigs
kyi bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mtshon cha thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa gang du yang rdo rjes mi tshugs pa med de/ kha mi 'bab bo/ /de bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba
dang / gdul ba'am/ dus gsum gyi bskal par spyad pa'i sdug bsngal dang 'grogs par bya ba gang du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi smon lam dang / ye shes kyi mtshon
chas rdugs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i mtshon cha chen po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyo ba'i yid
med pas ni/ mi bzod pa med de/ kha mi 'bab bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje ni/ gzhan du na rdo rje nyid las gyur pa'i gzhi ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs
gang gis kyang gzung bar mi nus so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i smon lam gyi tshogs kyi rdo rje ni/ gzhan du na lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems
bskyed pa'i rdo rje brtan pa'i sa'i gzhi ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzung bar mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho
chen po'i snod rdo rje'i gzhi sra zhing gseb med pas/ chu gsang du 'dzag par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje gseb
med pa yongs su bsngos pa'i gzhi can la gnas pa yang srid par skyes pa thams cad kyis zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje'i gzhi la
brtan pa'i sa chen po ni/ 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/ /dma' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje sra ba'i gzhi la brtan pa'i byang chub sems
dpa'i smon lam rnams kyang khams gsum thams cad du 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/ /dma' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje ni/ chus bangs pa'am
rul bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje yang las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi chur bskal par gnas kyang rul bar ma 'gyur/ bangs
par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje ni/ me thams cad kyi drod kyis kyang tshig par mi 'gyur/ yongs su gdung bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje yang 'khor ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i drod thams cad kyis mi tshig go /nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi me'i gdung bas
gdungs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snying po byang chub la bzhugs
shing bdud rgol du gzhug pa mdzad pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams kyi gdan ni/ gzhan du na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i lte ba'i sa'i gzhi ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis gzung bar mi nus so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang / spyad pa spyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / bzod pa la 'jug pa
dang / sa thob par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / lung bstan pa yongs su nod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi tshogs thams cad
nye bar ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa dang / chos kyi sprin chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs dang /
drag shul de dag kyang gzhan du na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa smon lam thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje sra ba'i lte ba can ma gtogs par sems gzhan gyis
yongs su gzung bar mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa ni/ yon tan de dag dang / gzhan tshad med pa nas yon tan gyi khyad
par brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang yon tan
gyi chos de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to/ /ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/
yon tan 'di dag rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba ni/ khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod na re/ ji ltar
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bya/ ji ltar nan tan du bya zhes zer ba ni/ rigs kyi bu/ khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying
po 'di nyid kyi nang du song ste ltos shig dang / der khyod kyis ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / bslab nas kyang yon tan ji lta bu
yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba shes par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces
smras so| |'phags pa/ pho brang brtsegs pa'i chab sgo dbyer gsol nang du mchi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan
gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i sgo drung du phyin te/ lag pa g.yas pas se gol gtogs te sgra byung ba dang / de'i sgo de'ang rang bye bar gyur pa dang / des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ da khang
pa brtsegs pa 'dir song zhig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang ngo mtshar chen po thob par gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du phyin pa dang / phyin ma thag tu sgo de yang rang
chad par gyur to/ /des mthong ba khang pa brtsegs pa de shin tu rgya che zhing yangs la/ rgyar dpag tshad brgya stong mang po dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings
kyi tshad kyis gzhal ba/ 'khor thams cad du nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan grangs med pas brgyan pa/ rin po che
grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ mu tig gi phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu dbyangs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu dpyangs pa'i rgyan gyis
brgyan pa/ mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu dpyangs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ seng+ge'i mu tig gi phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu dpyangs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/
seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ zla ba dang zla gam grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dar gyi lnga ldi sna tshogs grangs med pa rab tu dpyangs pa'i
rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dar gyi ba dan sna tshogs grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che mang po grangs med pa'i 'od kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra ba grangs
med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i snam bu grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi lcags bod rin po ches spras pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/
dril bu sgra snyan pa'i byung ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba bskyod na yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lha
rdzas kyi me tog mang po'i char mngon par 'bab pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i lnga ldi mngon par dpyangs pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gam
yo nas smos kyi snod nas bdug spos 'thul ba'i yo byad grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi phye ma'i char rab tu 'bab pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ pu shu'i
dra ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ skar khung grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rta babs grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ ba gam grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan
pa| me long gi dkyil 'khor grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i pha gu grangs med pa gtams pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rtsig pa grangs med pa'i rgyan
gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i ka ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i gos kyi sprin grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan
pa| rin po che'i khri 'phang grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i lam grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che grangs med pa'i ba dan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/
sa'i gzhi rgyan sna tshogs grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che grangs med pa las brtsegs pa'i khang pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po
che'i khri grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i bu mo grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i snam bu grangs med pa bting ba'i 'chag sa'i rgyan gyis brgyan
pa| 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi chu shing gi ka ba shin tu rnam par phye ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis
brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bya'i tshogs sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin
po che'i pad+mo grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i srog shing 'dzin pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rdzing bu grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ me tog
puN+Da rI ka grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i them skas grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i stegs bu rnam par bkod pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis
brgyan pa| rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas spras pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po'i 'od grangs med pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po
che thams cad rnam par phye ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ yon tan dang legs pa phun sum tshogs pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'dug par mthong ste/ khang pa brtsegs
pa de'i nang na yang khang pa brtsegs pa gzhan brgya stong 'di lta bu'i rgyan dang / /lhab lhub kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i bdag grangs med
pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa nas yon tan dang legs pa phun sum tshogs pa grangs med pa'i bar gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pas gang bar mthong ngo / /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyang
de ltar rgya che zhing yangs pa/ de ltar tshad med de nam mkha'i mdzod du gyur pa kun nas shin tu spa bar 'khod par mthong ngo / /des khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par phye ba de dag thams cad
kyang dmigs pa gcig la phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang / phan tshun ma 'dzings pa dang / phan tshun sa la gsal bor 'dug par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du de la snang bar gyur te/ dmigs
pa gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du dmigs pa ma lus pa de dag thams cad la'ang snang bar mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par
snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i yul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa de lta bu dag mthong nas dga' ba'i thugs dpag tu med pa rnam par
'phel ba'i spro ba dang / mos pa chen pos lus dang sems mngon par brlan pa dang / 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad rnam par bsal pa'i yid dang /
sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zlog pa'i sems dang / rmongs pa thams cad dang rnam par bral ba dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i phyogs la rab tu gzhol ba dang / thams cad la
thogs pa med pa'i dran pas rnam par dmigs pa'i rna ba dang ldan pa dang / yid la bya ba'i rnam par 'khrug pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med
pa'i tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i blo dang / dmigs pa thams cad la sgrib pa med par mig rab tu 'gro bar gyur nas phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad la mngon du bltas pa'i
lus kyis phyag bya bar mngon par sgrub pa'i stobs thams cad du khyab pa dang ldan pa'i lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas so/ /de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
gis phyag byas ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyi nang du bdag nyid phyin par shes par gyur
to| |khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad du'ang rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul can rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa mang po yang mthong bar gyur to/
khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thog ma rigs ni/ gang du skyes te/ ming ci zhes bya bar gyur pa zhig gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang /
yongs su bskul ba gang dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang gis yang dag par bskul ba dang / tshe'i tshad ni/ ji tsam zhig tu/ bskal pa'i ming ni/ ci zhes bya bar/ de bzhin
gshegs pa ni/ gang la/ rgyan ni/ ji lta bu zhig dang ldan pa'i zhing du/ 'khor ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu/ smon lam gyi khyad par ni/ ji lta bu zhig mngon par bsgrubs te bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam gyi sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /shes par gyur to/ /khong du chud par gyur to/ /de'i tshe
sems can de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad dang / tshe'i tshad ji srid gcig tu gyur pa de tsam gyi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs kyi drung na bdag
nyid 'dug par yang shes par gyur te/ bya ba de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thog ma gang du
byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa dang / dus gang nas bzung ste de'i ming byams pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de dag mthong bar gyur to/ /la lar ni/ gang du spyod pa spyad pa
dang / la lar ni/ gang du pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang / la lar ni/ gang du bzod pa la zhugs pa dang / la lar ni/
gang du sa non pa dang / la lar ni/ gang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bzung ba dang / la lar ni/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su bzung ba
dang / la lar ni/ gang du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang / la lar ni/ gang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang /
rnam pa ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu lung bstan pa dang / lung ni/ sus bstan pa dang / yun ni/ ji srid gcig gis lung bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /khang
pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa
mthong bar gyur to/ /la lar ni/ 'jig rten gyi mgon por gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad kyis sems can rnams la nye bar sdud pa dang / la
lar ni| brgya byin du gyur te/ 'dod par yon tan gyi dga' ba las sems can rnams rnam par zlog pa dang / la lar ni/ tshangs par gyur te bsam gtan dang /
tshad med pa'i dga' ba sems can rnams la yongs su rjod pa dang / la lar ni/ lha'i dbang po rab mtsho mar gyur te tshad med pa'i yon tan sems can rnams la yongs su
rjod pa dang / la lar ni/ lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / la lar ni/ lha'i rgyal po
rab 'phrul dga' bar gyur te/ lha'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sprul pa'i rgyan yongs su ston pa dang / la lar ni/ lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur du gyur te/
lha rnams la chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba yang dag par ston pa dang / la lar ni/ bdud du gyur te lha rnams la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mi rtag par ston pa dang /
la lar ni/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i gnas su skyes te lha ma yin gyi 'khor na nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rlom pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / ye shes kyi rgya
mtsho chen por 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi rgyu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa mthong ngo / /khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten mthong
bar gyur te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'od kyis sems can dmyal ba thams cad snang bar byed cing / sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi
sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa mthong ngo / /khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ yi dwags kyi gnas mthong bar gyur
te| de na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa sems can yi dwags kyi gnas su skyes pa rnams la kha zas dang / btung ba mang po nye bar sgrub cing bkres pa dang / skom pa rab
tu zhi bar byed pa mthong ngo / /khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ byol song gi skye gnas na skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyis byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs
pa'i sems can mang po 'dul ba mthong ngo / /khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ rgyal po chen po'i khams su gtogs pa'i lha'i 'khor na 'jig rten gyi mgon po rnams la
chos ston pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi 'khor na/ la lar ni/ lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i 'khor na/ la lar ni/ lha'i rgyal po rab dga'
ldan gyi 'khor na/ la lar ni/ lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i 'khor na/ la lar ni/ lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi 'khor na/ la lar ni/ bdud kyi 'khor na/ khang
pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ tshangs pa'i dbang po'i 'khor na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chos ston pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni/ klu dang lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor
na| la lar ni/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i 'khor na/ la lar ni/ dri za dang mi 'am ci'i 'khor na/ la lar ni/ lha ma yin dang gsod 'phrog gi dbang po'i 'khor na/
la lar ni/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po'i 'khor na/ la lar ni/ mi'i 'khor na/ khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chos ston pa mthong ngo //
la lar ni/ nyan thos kyi 'khor na/ la lar ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor na/ la lar ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor na/ khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems thog ma bskyed pa las dang po pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chos ston pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni/ spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams la/
la lar ni/ bzod pa thob cing phyir mi ldog pa rnams la/ la lar ni/ tshe gcig gis thogs shing dbang bskur pa rnams la/ khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ byang chub
sems dpa' sa dang po la gnas pa rnams la sa'i khyad par yongs su brjod pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni/ sa bcu la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams
dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa sa thams cad kyi khyad par yang dag par bgro ba byed pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni/ pha rol tu phyin
pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / la lar ni/ bslab pa thams cad la mngon du 'jug par bya ba kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / la lar ni/ ting nge 'dzin
gyi sgo la 'jug pa rgya chen po dang / la lar ni/ rnam par thar pa'i tshul zab mo dang / la lar ni/ bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa
dang / mngon par shes pa zhi ba'i yul gyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / la lar ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / 'dul ba dang / thabs kyi sgo la 'jug pa dang /
la lar ni/ smon lam mngon par sgrub pa rgya che ba dang / khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa skal pa mthun par spyod pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' rnams dang 'grogs shing 'jig rten la phan par bya ba'i don du bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang / gtsug lag gi khyad par sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
bde bar 'gyur ba dang / 'byor pa rnams yang dag par bgro ba mthong ngo / /la lar ni/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams dang 'grogs shing /
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la dbang bskur ba'i sgo yang dag par bgro ba mthong ngo / /khang pa brtsegs ba la lar ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'chag pa byed
cing lo brgya stong du mar mi gtong ba la brtson pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni/ lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba la brtson par/ la lar ni/ chos kyi sgo rab tu brtag pa la brtson
par| la lar ni/ dam pa'i chos bgro ba la brtson pa/ la lar ni/ dam pa'i chos bri ba la brtson par/ la lar ni/ byams pa la mnyam par bzhag par/ la lar ni/
bsam gtan dang tshad med pa thams cad la mnyam par bzhag par/ la lar ni/ rgyas pa'i skye mched dang / rnam par thar pa thams cad la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / khang pa
brtsegs pa la lar ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa sgrub pa'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa mthong ngo / /
khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa yod pa la mnyam par bzhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po mthong ste/ de dag gi lus
thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa thams cad kyi sprin mang po 'byung ba mthong ngo / /la lar ni/ lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/ lha'i ris kyi sprin
mang po 'byung ba mthong ngo / /la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sprin mang po 'byung ba dang /
la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/ khams kyi rgyal po'i sprin mang po 'byung ba dang / la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/ rgyal bu gzhon nu'i
sprin mang po 'byung ba dang / la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/ tshong dpon dang / blon po dang / khyim bdag gi sprin mang po dang / la la'i lus dang ba spu'i
sgo thams cad nas ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang po dang / la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku'i sprin mang po dang / la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/ sems can thams cad du sprul pa'i sprin tshad med pa 'byung ba mthong ngo / /la
la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/ chos kyi sgo rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba thos par gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsngags pa'i sgo dang /
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / smon lam dang /
stobs dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / gzungs dang / spobs pa dang / bden pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / rnam
par thar pa'i sgo dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / rten pa dang / chos kyi mdo dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam dang / theg pa
chen po'i gtam dang / sa dang / bzod pa dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi sgo dang / de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa'i sgra mang po 'byung ba thos so/ /khang
pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du kun nas 'dus par mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi rnam pa tha dad pa rnam
pa sna tshogs skye ba dang / rigs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sku rnam par phye ba tshad med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sku tshe rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
zhing rnam pa tha dad pa dang / bskal pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'byung ba'i sgo rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dam pa'i chos gnas pa
rnam pa tha dad pa nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par
snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po de'i dbus su khang pa brtsegs pa gcig cig gzhan pas che la yangs shing khang pa brtsegs pa gzhan thams cad kyi
rgyan ma lus pa thams cad pas kyang ches lhag par 'phags pa'i rgyan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa zhig 'dug par mthong ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang na stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dug pa mthong ngo / /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na yang gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dang /
'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas bye ba phrag brgya 'khod par mthong ngo / /'dzam bu'i gling de dag thams cad na'ang byang chub sems dpa'
byams pa pad+mo'i nang nas skye ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pas yongs su blangs pa dang / gom pa bdun du 'gro ba dang / phyogs bcur rnam par bltas pa dang /
seng+ge'i nga ro chen po sgrog pa dang / gzhon nu'i sa thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas pa dang / bza' shing gi ra bar 'gro ba dang / thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs te mngon par byung nas rab tu 'byung ba dang / dka' ba'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang / zas za ba dang / snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba
dang | bdud rgol du 'jug pa dang / byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / byang chub kyi shing la mig mi 'gebs pas lta ba dang / changs pa chen pos gsol ba
gdab pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i yul sna tshogs yongs su bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / tshul dang ming rnam pa sna
tshogs bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
zhing rnam par dag pa'i tshul bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam brjod pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos bstan cing rnam
par dgod pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / ring bsrel bgo ba dang / bstan pa gnas pa'i
byin gyi rlabs yongs su bstan pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing / lha'i gnas su 'gro ba mthong ste/ de dag thams cad na yang tshong dpon
gyi bu nor bzang nyid rkang pa'i drung na 'dug par rang gis shes par gyur to/ /de 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / bya ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / tshe'i
tshad rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad la dran pa ma nyams pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyi sa la gnas pas khang pa brtsegs
pa de dag gi dril dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang / rol mo dang / glu la sogs pa'i dmigs pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad las chos kyi sprin gyi
'brug sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung ba thos par gyur te/ la la las ni/ byang chub kyi sems rnam pa tha dad pa dang / la la las ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa
dang / smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / la la las ni/ sa tshad med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / la la las ni/ mngon par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par
'phrul pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / la la las ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / la la las ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnam pa tha
dad pa dang / la la las ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sprin tshad med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi sgra gong du ji skad du brjod pa thams cad
thos par gyur to/ /la la las ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i sgra thos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig ces bya bar byang chub sems dpa' ming dang che ge
mo zhig gis chos kyi sgo ni/ che ge mo zhig ces bya ba thos/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ che ge mo zhig gis yang dag par bskul/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ che ge mo zhig
gi zhabs kyi drung du/ bskal pa'i ming ni/ 'di zhes bya bar/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ 'di lta bu zhig tu/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/
dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ 'di lta bu zhig bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni/ 'di lta bu dag cig thos te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa ni/ 'di lta bu dang / smon lam gyi rnam
pa ni| 'di 'dra ba zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas des bskal pa ni/ 'di snyed cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bskal pa 'di snyed cig gis bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ni/ 'di zhes bya/ sku tshe'i tshad ni/ 'di tsam
zhig ste| sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang / rgyan phun sum tshogs pa 'di 'dra ba dang / smon lam gyi khyad par 'di lta bu zhig dang / sems can rnam par gdul
pa 'di 'dra ba zhig dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor kun nas 'dus pa 'di 'dra ba zhig go /de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal pa 'di snyed cig
tu dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gyi don ni/ 'di tsam zhig tu 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra thos so/ /la la las ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge
mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' ming dang / che ge mo zhig sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ gtang bar dka' ba 'di lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba brgya ni/ byed
do| |byang chub sems dpa' che ge mo zhig ni/ tshul khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go /shes
rab kyis rnam par dbye ba la brtson no/ /byang chub sems dpa' che ge mo zhig ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs su btsal ba'i don du rgyal po'i srid yongs su gtong
bar byed do/ /rin po che yongs su gtong ba dang / bu yongs su gtong ba dang / chung ma yongs su gtong ba dang / rkang lag dang / mig dang / mgo yongs su gtong bar byed
do| |mer mchong bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' ming dang / che ge mo zhig gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzung ste chos smra ba byed do/ /chos kyi sbyin
pa gtong ngo / /chos kyi mchod sbyin byed do/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ngo / /chos kyi rnga rdung ngo / /chos kyi dung 'bud do/ /chos kyi char 'bebs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i bstan pa 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brgyan pa byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgyan pa byed do/ /sems can la bde ba'i
yo byad kyis sdud do/ /dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod srung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i sgra thos so/ /la la las ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs
pa mtshan che ge mo zhig dbang bskur ba ming dang che ge mo zhig gis 'khor 'di lta bu zhig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bu zhig dang / bskal pa 'di lta bu zhig la sku tshe'i
tshad 'di tsam zhig dang / chos bstan pa 'di lta bu dang / sems can 'dul ba 'di 'dra ba dang / 'di lta bu'i smon lam gyis mngon par 'tshang rgya bas da ltar bzhugs
shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du dril dang / dril bu dang / g.yer kha'i dra ba dang / rol mo la sogs pa'i dmigs pa
thams cad las chos kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa'i sgra thos par gyur te/ sgra de dag thams cad thos pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' ba'i shugs
rgya chen pos mngon par brlan pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sgo de dag thos nas la lar ni/ gzungs kyi sgo mang po thob par gyur to/ /la lar ni/ spobs pa'i sgo mang po
thob par gyur to/ /la lar ni/ bzod pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to/ /la lar ni/ spyod pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to/ /la lar ni/ smon lam gyi sgo mang po
thob par gyur to/ /la lar ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to/ /la lar ni/ mngon par shes pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to/ /la lar ni/ rig pa
dang ye shes snang ba'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to/ /la lar ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to/ /la lar ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor 'jug pa mang
po thob par gyur to/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste/ bam po brgya bcu bzhi pa/ me long
gi dkyil 'khor de dag las kyang gzugs brnyan gyi rgyan rnam par dmigs pa tshad med pa mthong bar gyur te/ la lar ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs
pa dang / la lar ni/ nyan thos kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
gyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la
lar ni| kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni/ rnam par dag pa'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang /
la lar ni/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
zhing gi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni/ sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la
lar ni/ sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni/ chung ba'i 'jig rten
gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni/ che ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni/
phra ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni/ rgya che ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs
pa dang / la lar ni/ mig 'phrul gyis 'jug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni/ snrel zhi'i 'jig rten
gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni/ spyi'u tshugs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la
lar ni| sa'i gzhi mnyam par 'dug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol
song dang / yi dwags kyi gnas kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni/ lha dang mis gang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /'chags de dag dang / gnas de dag dang / stan de dag la byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dgos
pa sna tshogs la brtson pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur te/ la lar ni/ 'chag pa dang / la lar ni/ bsam gtan byed pa dang / la lar ni/ lta ba dang / la lar ni/ sems
can rnams la snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / la lar ni/ gtsug lag gi tshul sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi don du 'gyur ba sgrub pa dang / la lar ni/ lung
nod pa dang / la lar ni/ kha ton byed pa dang / la lar ni/ yi ge 'bri ba dang / la lar ni/ dri ba yongs su 'dri ba dang / la lar ni/ phung po gsum pa'i bshags
pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la brtson pa dang / la lar ni/ smon lam mngon par sgrub par byed par mthong ngo / /ka ba de dag las kyang rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od
kyi dra ba mang po 'byung ba mthong ste/ la la las ni/ kha dog sngon po dang / la la las ni/ kha dog ser po dang / la la las ni/ kha dog dmar po dang / la la las ni/
kha dog dkar po dang / la la las ni/ shel gyi kha dog dang / la la las ni/ gser gyi kha dog dang / la la las ni/ in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog dang / la la las ni/
'ja'i kha dog dang / la la las ni/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog dang / la la las ni/ 'od thams cad du sna tshogs pa'i kha dog
lus dang sems kyi bde ba skyed pa/ blta na mchog tu mdzes pa mthong bar gyur to/ /'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi chu shing gi ka ba de dag dang / rin po che thams
cad kyi gzugs de dag kyang lag nas me tog gi sprin mngon par sbyong bar mthong ste/ lag nas phreng ba'i lda ldi dang / lag nas gos dang / lag nas gdugs
dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / lag nas spos dang / gdug spos dang / byug pa dang / lag nas nor bu rin po che'i dra ba dang / lag nas rin po che sna tshogs
dang / gser gyi lcags pod sna tshogs dang / lag nas mu tig sna tshogs kyi se mo do dang / lag nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi se mo do mngon par sbyong ba dang / lag
nas rgyan thams cad thogs par mthong ngo / /la lar ni/ gtsug gi rin po che dang / cod pan gyis 'dud cing mig mi 'gebs par lta ba dang / thal mo sbyor zhing
phyag 'tshal bar mthong ngo / /mu tig gi phreng ba de dag las kyang spos sna tshogs kyis dri zhim por byas pa'i chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i char gyi rgyun phra mo
'bab par mthong ngo / /rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i phreng ba'i dra ba de dag las kyang mar me'i phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba mang po mthong bar gyur to/ /rin po che'i gdugs de dag kyang rgyan
dang / lhab lhub thams cad kyis mdzes par brgyan te/ rin po che'i dril dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / chun po dang / rin po che'i shar bu
dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi sgo ngas yongs su brgyan pa'i snying po dang ldan par mthong ngo / /rdzing de dag nas kyang rin po che'i me tog pad+mo dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da
dang / puN+Da ri ka grangs med pa mngon par thon par mthong ste/ la la ni/ mtho gang 'khor ba tsam/ la la ni/ 'dom gang 'khor ba tsam/ la la ni/ shing rta'i 'khor lo
tsam ste| de dag la yang gzugs sna tshogs kyi rgyan mang po 'khod par mthong ste/ 'di ltar bud med kyi gzugs dang / skyes pa'i gzugs dang / khye'u'i gzugs
dang / bu mo'i gzugs dang / brgya byin gyi gzugs dang / tshangs pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po'i gzugs dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri
ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
gzugs dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa'i lus kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa mang po thal mo sbyar
te lus 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar 'khod pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa skyil mo krung du
bcas te bzhugs pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /sa chen po'i gzhi bai DUR+Ya las grub pa mig mang ris su 'dug pa'i mig mang ris re re nas kyang gzugs brnyan rnam par
dmigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mang po mthong bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa la la las ni/ zhing gi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa/ la la las ni/
byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa/ la la las ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par mthong bar gyur te/ khang pa
brtsegs pa de dag gi rgyan dang / lhab lhub ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mig mang ris re re la gzugs brnyan du snang bar mthong ngo / /rin po che'i shing rin po
che'i me tog dang 'bras bu'i mdzod sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag thams cad las kyang lus phyed tsam byung ba'i gzugs dbyibs sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs
su 'dug pa mang po thon par mthong ste/ la la las ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku phyed tsam byung ba dang / la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsam byung ba dang / la la
las ni/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i lus phyed tsam byung ba dang / la
la las ni/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po'i lus phyed tsam byung ba dang / la la las ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / mi'i dbang po'i lus
phyed tsam byung ba dang / la la las ni/ rgyal bu gzhon nu dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo
dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i lus phyed tsam byung ba mthong ste/ la la'i lag nas ni/ me tog gi phreng ba sbyong ba dang /
la la'i lag nas ni/ rin po che'i phreng ba mngon par sbyong ba dang / la la'i lag nas ni/ rgyan thams cad mngon par thogs pa dang / la la ni/ lus 'dud cing thal
mo sbyar te mig mi 'gebs par lta zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang / la la ni/ mngon par bstod pa dang / la la ni/ mnyam par bzhag pa dang / la la ni/ gser gyi kha
dog tu 'dug pa dang / la la ni/ dngul gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang / la la ni/ byi ru'i kha dog tu 'dug pa dang / la la ni/ rin po che
bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i kha dog tu 'dug pa dang / la la ni/ rin po che in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog tu 'dug pa dang / la la ni/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i kha dog tu
'dug pa dang / la la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang / la la ni/ me tog tsam pa ka'i kha dog tu 'dug pa dang / la la ni/ 'od kyi lus dang /
la la ni/ mtshan gyis rnam par bris pa'i lus su mthong bar gyur to/ /zla gam de dag las kyang nyi zla dang / gza' skar gyi gzugs brnyan grangs med pa mang po
thon te phyogs bcur snang bar byed pa mthong bar gyur to/ /khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i rtsig ngos de dag thams cad kyang rin po che
thams cad kyis mig mang ris sna tshogs su bris par mthong ste/ rin po che'i mig mang ris de dag thams cad las kyang byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod pa rim pas ji ltar spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rim par mthong bar gyur to/ /mig mang ris la la las ni/ byang chub
sems dpa' byams pas mgo byin pa mthong ngo / /la la las ni/ mig byin pa dang / la la las ni/ lag pa byin pa dang / la la las ni/ gtsug gi rin po
che byin pa dang / la la las ni/ thor pag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che byin pa dang / la la las ni/ so byin pa dang / la la las ni/ lce byin pa dang / la
la las ni/ rna ba byin pa dang / la la las ni/ sna byin pa dang / la la las ni/ snying byin pa dang / la la las ni/ sha dang rkang byin pa dang / la la las ni/ khrag
byin pa dang / la la las ni/ pags pa dang phri byin pa dang / la la las ni/ sen mo sha dang bcas par byin pa dang / la la las ni/ dra bar 'brel pa dang bcas
pa'i sor mo byin pa dang / la la las ni/ bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma byin pa dang / la la las ni/ rin po che'i phung po byin pa dang / la la las ni/ grong dang /
grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas byin pa dang / la la las ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling byin pa dang / la la las ni/ gling bzhi
byin pa dang / la la las ni/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug byin pa dang / la la las ni/ rgyal po'i khri byin pa dang / la la las ni/ bran pho mo byin pa dang / la la
las ni| btsun mo'i 'khor byin pa dang / la la las ni/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal byin pa dang / la la las ni/
gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan byin pa dang / la la las ni/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa byin pa dang / la la las ni/ nad kyi rtsi byin pa dang /
la la las ni/ kha zas dang / skom gyi rnam pa mang po byin pa dang / la la las ni/ yo byad thams cad byin pa dang / la la las ni/ gnas thams cad byin
pa dang / la la las ni/ gzhal ba'i snod rin po ches bkang ba byin pa dang / la la las ni/ rin po che'i shing rta byin pa dang / la la las ni/ btson ra na
'khod pa thar par byed pa dang / la la las ni/ gsad par chad pa las thar par byed pa dang / la la las ni/ byis pa gso ba byed pa dang / la la las
ni| lam stor ba la lam ston pa dang / la la las ni/ mnyan par gyur te chu klung gi rgyud la gru 'dor ba dang / la la las ni/ rta'i rgyal po stobs kyis
sgrol bar gyur te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i srin po'i gling du phyin par gyur pa'i sems can yongs su skyob pa dang / la la las ni/ drang srong chen por gyur te
bstan pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / la la las ni/ 'khor los bsgyur bar gyur te/ sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god pa dang / la la las ni/ sman
par gyur te na ba'i gsos byed pa dang / la la las ni/ pha ma la phu dud byed pa dang / la la las ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro byed pa dang / la la las ni/
nyan thos kyi kha dog dang / gzugs kyis sems can 'dul ba la brtson pa dang / la la las ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi kha dog dang / gzugs kyis sems can 'dul
ba la brtson pa dang / la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i kha dog dang / gzugs kyis sems can 'dul ba la brtson pa dang / la la las ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog
dang | sku gzugs kyis sems can 'dul ba la brtson pa dang / la la las ni/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi khyad par thams cad kyis skye ba yongs su bstan te sems can yongs
su smin par byed pa dang / la la las ni/ chos smra ba'i gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs te lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du
dpyad par bya ba la brtson pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan gyis brgyan par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang /
sangs rgyas mchod pa la sems can yongs su bskul ba dang / spos dang byug pa gsol zhing 'bru mar dri zhim pos byug pa dang / dril bu dang me tog
gi phreng ba gsol pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa rnam pa thams cad la brtson pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang /
bslab pa'i gnas lnga dang / gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs btsal ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / chos mnyan
pa dang / lung mnod pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba la sems can 'god par byed pa dang / chos kyi gtam bya ba'i phyir seng+ge'i stan la 'dug cing
sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rnam par 'grel ba dang / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byams pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
spyad pa de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mig mang ris de dag las rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong bar gyur to/ /des khang pa brtsegs pa la la las ni/
byang chub sems dpa' byams pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba de dag thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan thams cad kyang mthong bar
gyur te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag thams cad kyi drung du bdag nyid phyin cing / tshur shog nor bzang legs par 'ongs sam/ mi ngal lam/ 'di re byang chub sems dpa'i
rgyan dang / yul rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di dag la ltos shig /ces bsgo zhing gtam byed par shes par gyur te/ de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis
khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re dang / dmigs pa de dag re re las kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / yul rnam par sprul pa 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang grangs
med pa mang po mthong bar gyur te/ dran pa'i mthu nyams pa med pa dang / mig yongs su dag pa phyogs kun rnam par lta ba dang / lhag mthong la lta ba'i ye shes sgrib pa med
pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi dbang rab tu thob pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa la zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi sa la gnas te
mtha' yas pa'i rgyan dang / yul rnam par sprul pa de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du gzugs kyi dmigs
pa'i khyad par sna tshogs mang po zhig mthong bar gyur te/ 'di ltar khyim dang gzhal med khang mdangs dga' ba'am/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul mdangs
dga' ba'am/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal mdangs dga' ba'am/ shing dang / chu klung dang / rdzing dang /
ri mdangs dga' ba'am/ gos dang / kha zas dang / btung ba'i longs spyod nyams su bde ba'am/ glu dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra snyan pa sna tshogs kyis rtse ba
nyams su dga' ba zhig mthong ngam/ pha ma dang / gnyen bshes dang / bdag nyid 'grogs par shes par gyur pa'am/ rgya mtsho chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /
lha'i gnas thams cad dam/ 'dzam bu'i gling dag na bdag dpag tshad brgya phrag du mar gnas par shes par gyur la/ khyim mam/ gnas de'ang shin tu yangs shing
yon tan dang / rgyan thams cad kyis yongs su brgyan par mthong ste/ nyin par zhig yin par shes kyang nam de yang ring ba dang / thung bar bye brag mi 'byed la/ rmi lam
yin pa tsam du'ang mi shes so/ /bdag nyid kyang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan zhing / lus kyi 'du byed zo bdog bde la snyom pa dang / gnyid med de mi dga' ba
thams cad yongs su bsal bas dga' ba dang / bde ba rgya chen po nyams su myong ste/ yun kyang ring mo zhig lon pa snyam nas nyin gcig gam/ nyin bdun nam/ zla ba
phyed dam/ zla ba gcig gam/ lo gcig gam/ lo brgya'am/ de bas kyang ring ba zhig lon pa tsam du shes par gyur nas sad na/ de thams cad kyang rjes su dran no/ /de bzhin du
tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / khams gsum pa thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyis chung
ba'i 'du shes 'gags pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa yangs shing rgya che ba dang / sgrib pa med pa la gnas shing / byang chub
sems dpa'i rgyan gyi yul khong du chud la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i blo dang ldan pas/ rgyan rnam par sprul pa de
dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /shes par gyur to/ /nyams su myong bar gyur to/ /rnam par dpyad par gyur to/ /mtshan mar byas par gyur to/ /dmigs kyis rtogs
par gyur to/ /bdag nyid kyang de dag na 'dug par shes par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi nad pa sems kyi rgyud tha ma byung bar gyur te/ de ma thag tu skye ba'i sems nye bar
gags nas las kyi srid pa mngon du gyur na/ las ji lta bur byas shing bsags pa'i rnam par smin pas las mi dge ba'i rkyen gyis ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol
song gi skye gnas dang / yi dwags kyi yul lam/ gshin rje'i mi lag cha gnyems pa thogs pa gshe zhing khro ba dag kyang mthong bar gyur/ sems
can dmyal ba pa'i dud mo dang / 'o dod kyi sgra yang thos par gyur la ba tshwa'i chu de dag mthong ste/ spu gri'i so gshibs pa'i ri de dag dang / lcags kyi shal ma li'i
sdong po de dag dang / ral gri'i so'i nags tshal de dag kyang mthong bar gyur tam/ sems can dmyal ba de dag kyang kun nas 'bar zhing yongs su 'bar ba dang / rab
tu 'bar ba dang / lcags kyi bum pa gcig tu 'bar ba dag kyang mthong bar gyur la/ gnod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang gnod par bya zhing / tshor ba de dag kyang
nyams su myong ba tsam du shes par gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba de dag kyang me'i gdung bas sdug bsngal ba zhig tu mthong ngam/ bdag gis myong bar gyur tam/
las dge ba'i tshogs kyis lha'i khang pa dang / gnas shig mthong bar gyur tam/ lha'i 'khor dang / lha mo'i tshogs dang / rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad kyang mthong
bar gyur te/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / chu klung dang / rdzing dang / rin po che'i ri dang / yid bzhin gyi shing dang / longs spyod mang po
mthong ngam nyams su myong bar gyur te/ tshe'i yun kyang de dang mnyam par shes par gyur na/ de ni/ 'di nas kyang 'phos pa med/ der yang skyes pa med de/ mi snang bar ma gyur
bzhin du/ las kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas bya ba'i rnam pa de lta bu dag shes shing mthong la nyams su myong bar rung ngo / /de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis
byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir rgyan rnam par sprul pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu 'byung
po'i gdon gyis non pa ni/ gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mang po mthong ste/ ci dris pa de dag gi lung yang ston to/ /de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis byang chub sems
dpa'i ye shes dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus rgyan de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ klu'i khang par byin pa'i skyes bus ni/ klu'i 'du shes kyi rnam
pa la zhugs pas/ nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma bdun nam/ zla ba phyed dam/ zla ba gcig gam/ lo gcig gam/ lo brgyar yang 'du shes kyi rnam pas shes te/ klu'i 'du shes
kyi rnam pa dang bral nas mi'i 'du shes kyi rnam par na yud tsam las ma lon par mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes
kyi rnam pas ma btang ba'i blo dang ldan pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis yud tsam gcig po de yang bskal pa bye
ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por shes par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang 'gro ba thams cad na rgyan gyi dam pa phul zhes bya ba
yod de| de'i nang du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du dmigs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres par gsal
bar snang ngo / /de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis kyang rgyan de dag thams cad dmigs pa thams cad du phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang / phan tshun ma 'dzings par
gzugs rab tu byung ba mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal ba'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la rnam par spyod pa'i dge slong ni/ gcig pu gnyis su med
pa'i khang bu'am/ 'chag sa'am/ 'dug pa'i gnas na 'dug gam/ bskyed gang rung ste/ 'jig rten thams cad rgyas pa'i skye mched gang la snyoms par zhugs pa'i
yul bzhin du bsam gtan pa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab par mthong zhing nyams su myong ngo / /de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis kyang yul gang la
zhugs pa'i tshul bzhin du/ rgyan de dag thams cad mthong zhing shes te nyams su myong bar gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ dri za'i grong khyer rnams kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub
thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings la byung ba ni/ yongs su snang yang ci la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ gnod sbyin gyi gzhal med khang mi'i khang pa na
'dug pa'am/ mi'i khang pa gnod sbyin gyi khang pa'i khongs na 'dug pa ni/ phan tshun tha mi dad de/ las kyi yul rnam pa ji ltar dag pa'i tshul bzhin du snang ngo / /'di lta ste/
dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rgya'i gzugs brnyan ltar snang ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan
po ni| sngags dang / rig sngags dang / rtsi'i mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / bya ba thams cad kyang yongs su ston to/ /de bzhin du
tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs ye shes sgyu ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pas byang chub sems dpa'i
dbang dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes chos thams cad shes pa'i sgyu ma'i stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mthus rgyan gyi yul rnam par sprul pa de dag mthong bar
